            "content": "<p>像传祺GM8这样价位的MPV，更加符合本国中产阶级的消费群体，因此从销量上来讲是非常值得惊叹的！但是这款商务车在改装市场上却不受欢迎，成功和奢华的改装案例寥寥无几，普通的改装案例又拿不出手！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5f81ffac64358fce288262f06595b0ee_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"4032\" data-rawheight=\"3024\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"4032\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5f81ffac64358fce288262f06595b0ee_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：看完这款商务车内饰，我果断将贵士的这3样配置做了改装", 
            "content": "<p>买一辆MPV一直是生完二胎之后迫在眉睫的事情，普通的家庭小桥车内饰空间太过于狭窄，基本上放一个儿童座椅之后就没有其他存放物品的地方了。</p><p>经朋友介绍，日系车的耗油量少，性价比相较高一点，看了几款日系MPV都不是非常满意，最后哥们儿给参观了新买的尼桑贵士，由此勾起了我对这款车的向往！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b2520f44d5c458fdb59338a3be9967d1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b2520f44d5c458fdb59338a3be9967d1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b2520f44d5c458fdb59338a3be9967d1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b2520f44d5c458fdb59338a3be9967d1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>首先是内饰空间比较符合理想型，其次，哥们儿告诉我，在上牌之前，他将内饰做了局部的改装升级，在我眼里看来是真的又舒适又上档次。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-972cd4c3f651a17a43bfa353790f4cbd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-972cd4c3f651a17a43bfa353790f4cbd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-972cd4c3f651a17a43bfa353790f4cbd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-972cd4c3f651a17a43bfa353790f4cbd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>哥们儿将在西安改装施工过程中的图片也拿给我看！实在觉得是不可思议的事情，没有想到一辆MPV的内饰做了改装之后居然能变得和一个家一样舒适上档次！朋友告诉我，这辆贵士的内饰只做了三个项目的改装升级。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-925ea4cbdcc16126911db7a0eddb234c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-925ea4cbdcc16126911db7a0eddb234c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-925ea4cbdcc16126911db7a0eddb234c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-925ea4cbdcc16126911db7a0eddb234c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4e9ca68d65d1f11c64539a39e871dd76_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4e9ca68d65d1f11c64539a39e871dd76_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4e9ca68d65d1f11c64539a39e871dd76_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4e9ca68d65d1f11c64539a39e871dd76_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第一项配置就是底盘改装木地板；</p><p>这次木地板改装用的游艇木，改装费用不高，但是改装效果却着实惊艳！哥们儿表示：没有想到底盘改装是这个样子的，中排和三排还有一个阶梯，做工还算可以，但是第一次看到效果的时候都有一种不想安装座椅的冲动。</p><p>如此舒适的木地板铺个席子，就能坐得稳，就像家里的客厅不需要沙发一样爽朗。不过毕竟是要上路的车，座椅还是乖乖安装一下吧！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-00d2c2c84640f834608ef3395b54b3ea_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-00d2c2c84640f834608ef3395b54b3ea_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-00d2c2c84640f834608ef3395b54b3ea_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-00d2c2c84640f834608ef3395b54b3ea_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bc5199b7b2bb909f644506c67ae92e78_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bc5199b7b2bb909f644506c67ae92e78_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bc5199b7b2bb909f644506c67ae92e78_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bc5199b7b2bb909f644506c67ae92e78_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这第二项配置就是在木地板上面安装了座椅；</p><p>整个日产贵士内饰改装中，最烧钱的地方就是中排的A86航空座椅两张，其中通风、加热、气动按摩等功能全部具备，座椅扶手居然还带有隐藏功能，杯托，小桌板等。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-620bf61f6bb7244bc7ed9b714696659a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-620bf61f6bb7244bc7ed9b714696659a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-620bf61f6bb7244bc7ed9b714696659a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-620bf61f6bb7244bc7ed9b714696659a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>实话实说，这项配置的改装是最令人心动的地方，想到大宝和二宝会越来越大，坐车的时候是需要这些配置，放个水杯，伸个小桌板来放置东西或者保证安全！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-06141d5869c7aa417f4025a3e789a535_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-06141d5869c7aa417f4025a3e789a535_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-06141d5869c7aa417f4025a3e789a535_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-06141d5869c7aa417f4025a3e789a535_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7335f437684491eddce63e49ce653d4e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7335f437684491eddce63e49ce653d4e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7335f437684491eddce63e49ce653d4e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7335f437684491eddce63e49ce653d4e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第三项配置就是后座椅的安装；</p><p>朋友说，一般用作家用，三排座椅有折叠和平躺效果就足够了，没有必要改成沙发床，价格过高，家用版贵士讲究个实用经济就好！本人对此深以为然！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d3549b72073bfa30bce810272d7405d5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d3549b72073bfa30bce810272d7405d5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d3549b72073bfa30bce810272d7405d5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d3549b72073bfa30bce810272d7405d5_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3e891565d643bb57860ae845f89111d7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3e891565d643bb57860ae845f89111d7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3e891565d643bb57860ae845f89111d7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3e891565d643bb57860ae845f89111d7_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>看完这款贵士商务车的内饰案例，我对这辆商务车的倾向性和渴望感又提升了，果断也入手了这辆MPV，将贵士的这3样配置也做了同样的改装，家有二胎的车友们觉得值得吗？</p><p><br/> </p>",

            "title": "改个车：如何让你的别克GL8与众不同？在西安8成的车主选择这样做", 
            "content": "<p>别克GL8的热销，让这款车型的受众群体越来越多，同时追求个性化定制和内饰改装的车主也越来越多，而在西安，百分之八十的车主购买商务车之后都会选择进行内饰改装，以达到与众不同的目的！<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e19fe17c108ee595778d7cddd2821696_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1244\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1244\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e19fe17c108ee595778d7cddd2821696_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1244&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1244\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1244\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e19fe17c108ee595778d7cddd2821696_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e19fe17c108ee595778d7cddd2821696_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>别克GL8这款车型在内饰改装中最为常见，似乎这款车型买来就是为了做内饰改装的。不过因为其销量不错的缘故，许多的车主做了改装之后，也常常会见到与自己内饰一模一样的别克GL8，别怀疑！改装市场就这么大！小编觉得你们可能恰巧去到了同一家改装厂！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6b14855bb86066d8f7c481210a1ab10b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"978\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6b14855bb86066d8f7c481210a1ab10b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-184ff637157b0d0c436241f62751a999_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-184ff637157b0d0c436241f62751a999_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>其内饰改装项目有：</b></p><p><b>主副驾驶座椅更换，中排埃尔法座椅更换，后排沙发床座椅更换，中央扶手箱定制，木地板改装，不锈钢迎宾脚踏装车，吸顶电视安装，九宫格顶安装，个性化壁灯装车，车门板包覆，电动中门，全车座椅个性化包覆！</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d966ec6ce4bda8b46f562e8da5390f15_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d966ec6ce4bda8b46f562e8da5390f15_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a016ba8ecb086ae9a157e1b0cb74ecd4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a016ba8ecb086ae9a157e1b0cb74ecd4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>改装特色：</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c06b0b5134537c12074301ed0cd57161_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c06b0b5134537c12074301ed0cd57161_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c06b0b5134537c12074301ed0cd57161_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c06b0b5134537c12074301ed0cd57161_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6877393e92b995823178cfe8a50616bf_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6877393e92b995823178cfe8a50616bf_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1440&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6877393e92b995823178cfe8a50616bf_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6877393e92b995823178cfe8a50616bf_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>二，为了增强座椅的舒适性，在大多数别克GL8选择AV款航空座椅的时候，西安车主就大手笔地将中排座椅换成了埃尔法座椅！并且效仿大型商务车，在中排座椅下方安装旋转底座，使其中排座椅可以可以360度自由旋转！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-656bd0682abd691392088ab102251aca_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-656bd0682abd691392088ab102251aca_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1440&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-656bd0682abd691392088ab102251aca_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-656bd0682abd691392088ab102251aca_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>三，在进行内饰改装的时候，许多车主都会问第三排为什么不能改？大多数厂家会给出的建议是，车身较窄，空间不够富裕！NO，谁说别克GL8不能改装后排沙发床？本次案例中就做到了！而且是妥妥地做到了</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b4ee47c1d0fe3c2f82aa2e8b279ffd89_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b4ee47c1d0fe3c2f82aa2e8b279ffd89_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：西安2万改装本田艾力绅内饰，铺上木地板更显大气！", 
            "content": "<p>有网友留言问：为什么没有人改艾力绅？这样一款销量高，内饰又没品的MPV，怎么会没有人做内饰改装呢？</p><p>小编发现，购买艾力绅进行改装的车主，一般都是小改，不像别克GL8，或者奔驰威霆等动辄就全部经行翻新，大改的案例比比皆是。既然各位网友问到了，那小编就为大伙儿带来这样一款改装案例，仅供赏析！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d617f3060682550675b937e3cb95a5fe_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d617f3060682550675b937e3cb95a5fe_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d617f3060682550675b937e3cb95a5fe_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d617f3060682550675b937e3cb95a5fe_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>要说起本田艾力绅这款车在MPV中的口碑也是极高的，之所以做内饰改装的车主比较少，很大部分原因在于艾力绅的消费点更加偏向于省油，车主对于内饰的个性化要求意识不是特别高！</p><p>当然，还有部分原因在于内饰的空间，和别克GL8比起来尚且空间有限，由此可见做内饰改装的可塑造性有多低！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-48ef7eeb1002ed64386d3bc6bd244c4e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-48ef7eeb1002ed64386d3bc6bd244c4e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-48ef7eeb1002ed64386d3bc6bd244c4e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-48ef7eeb1002ed64386d3bc6bd244c4e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>不过想改装本田艾力绅内饰，又不知道怎么改的小伙伴们可以参考本次案例的改装项目。改装下来花销不足2万，却实打实地提升了内饰的整体效果！<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c2ba69ed872171a8e5e5c8039d890a11_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c2ba69ed872171a8e5e5c8039d890a11_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c2ba69ed872171a8e5e5c8039d890a11_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c2ba69ed872171a8e5e5c8039d890a11_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>施工中</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a8cbc9b1c4098eb116de6a3345e646cc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a8cbc9b1c4098eb116de6a3345e646cc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a8cbc9b1c4098eb116de6a3345e646cc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a8cbc9b1c4098eb116de6a3345e646cc_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>施工之后</p><p><b>改装用材</b></p><p>这辆本田艾力绅于西安改个车进行内饰改装，其中最大的改装项目就是木地板的拼接！车主选用价格相对便宜，防水防潮性能相对好的游艇木进行改装。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1c2bcb3f8bd7f574baa86fc1996ac958_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1c2bcb3f8bd7f574baa86fc1996ac958_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-70b483a3044c44795d58d874c6f670af_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-70b483a3044c44795d58d874c6f670af_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>改装特点及优势</p><p>虽然用材和改装项目都比较简单，不过本次案例改装依旧存在其独有的优势，目前市面上的商务车做内饰改装时，木地板的改装最多到主副驾驶座后背截至！</p><p>而这辆本田艾力绅的木地板改装做的是通铺，木地板拼接直接延伸至主副驾驶座的下方，底盘整体性提高。会让内饰看上去更加整洁，也更加舒适。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cfbf4a82c6c0a2a841bf144d59223110_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cfbf4a82c6c0a2a841bf144d59223110_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cfbf4a82c6c0a2a841bf144d59223110_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cfbf4a82c6c0a2a841bf144d59223110_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>改装木地板效果</p><p>商务车改装木地板的顾虑就在于异响和隔音，是所有改装这一项目的通病，这辆本田艾力绅改装木地板之前做了底盘的隔音效果，加入了隔音棉和止震版，之后又做了底盘的打底，可以有效保证木地板改装的隔音效果，防止异响的出现。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-01604724d7018336811d1540af796c17_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-01604724d7018336811d1540af796c17_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-01604724d7018336811d1540af796c17_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-01604724d7018336811d1540af796c17_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>其视觉效果来看，游艇木地板的色泽度饱和，只要内饰配色搭配合理，一定会产生意想不到的视觉体验！在进行拼接木地板改装时还加入了银色封条进行密封。之后又改装了同样色泽的迎宾脚踏，如此一来，这辆艾力绅的内饰看上去会比原车上档次得多。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e79716af5595d4bb4ba3a2a609a02a93_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e79716af5595d4bb4ba3a2a609a02a93_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：西安5万改装丰田陆巡内饰，这是一个你没见过的酷路泽！", 
            "content": "<p>许多网友留言说自己有辆SUV想要将内饰重新装饰一下，这这里小编必须要提醒各位，SUV的内饰改装做起来是有难度的！特别是小型的SUV改一个内饰包覆配色什么还行，但是要动内饰的座椅可是不容易的！并不是所有的SUV都能和丰田酷路泽这样的内饰空间相媲美！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f177a59a1232b69df35c641ac6650141_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f177a59a1232b69df35c641ac6650141_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f177a59a1232b69df35c641ac6650141_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f177a59a1232b69df35c641ac6650141_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>丰田旗下的兰德酷路泽属于中大型SUV，市场上常常被人称作陆地巡洋舰，也就是大家所认识的陆巡，内饰空间比一般的小型SUV要大，所以做起内饰改装是要比普通的SUV要得心应手得多！同样，这款车在内饰改装车型中也是很常见的，且大多数改装要求是提高其舒适度！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c6069c8e207f02d1af3d0d74c158e8a3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1110\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1110\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c6069c8e207f02d1af3d0d74c158e8a3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1110&#39; height=&#39;900&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1110\" data-rawheight=\"900\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1110\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c6069c8e207f02d1af3d0d74c158e8a3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c6069c8e207f02d1af3d0d74c158e8a3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>本次案例于西安进行内饰改装，花费5万，改装项目不多，但是对于SUV车型来说，提升这两项，就足够了！第一，内饰座椅舒适度调整；第二，气派的后排中央扶手添加！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-95e634f0c087c98ff2ca8b6df2880798_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1110\" data-rawheight=\"742\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1110\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-95e634f0c087c98ff2ca8b6df2880798_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1110&#39; height=&#39;742&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1110\" data-rawheight=\"742\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1110\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-95e634f0c087c98ff2ca8b6df2880798_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-95e634f0c087c98ff2ca8b6df2880798_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d6f9e575d1dacdd03471947f4b1e2d1c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1110\" data-rawheight=\"833\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1110\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d6f9e575d1dacdd03471947f4b1e2d1c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1110&#39; height=&#39;833&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1110\" data-rawheight=\"833\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1110\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d6f9e575d1dacdd03471947f4b1e2d1c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d6f9e575d1dacdd03471947f4b1e2d1c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>本次陆巡内饰改装第一项——座椅。</p><p>大多数网友咨询SUV内饰改装座椅时，要求将座椅后移，更有甚者希望能在内饰中添加带有腿托的座椅，小编在这里告诉大家，不是所有SUV都是陆地巡洋舰，话说回来，如果你也有一辆陆地巡洋舰，那么恭喜你具备你所想要的所有条件。</p><p>不过本次案例改装内饰中很可惜是一次小改，不过无论是主副驾还是中排座椅的更换，乘坐体验都不差，最有趣的是原车座椅中排三座的布局形式发生变更，改成车门左右两侧上客，使得乘坐更加体面和气派</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4f0094d5dca68d51f3630f8d07be0bab_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1110\" data-rawheight=\"1041\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1110\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4f0094d5dca68d51f3630f8d07be0bab_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1110&#39; height=&#39;1041&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1110\" data-rawheight=\"1041\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1110\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4f0094d5dca68d51f3630f8d07be0bab_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4f0094d5dca68d51f3630f8d07be0bab_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>陆巡内饰改装第二项——中排座椅扶手。</p><p>这个中排扶手造型是本次改装的重头戏，无论是造型设计还是其功能性都让这辆丰田陆巡魅力倍增！内饰因此被分为左右两个空间，更加显档次感，这款中央扶手的改装价位也是占了整个费用的三分之二，其中包含有储物功能，冷藏功能，手机充电功能，电子触屏控制功能等。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cd86c323eb90f2c1a71debccb4760b71_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1110\" data-rawheight=\"739\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1110\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cd86c323eb90f2c1a71debccb4760b71_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1110&#39; height=&#39;739&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1110\" data-rawheight=\"739\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1110\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cd86c323eb90f2c1a71debccb4760b71_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cd86c323eb90f2c1a71debccb4760b71_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这样一辆陆巡内饰改装效果既拥有车主最看重的舒适度，还着重改造了内饰布局，由此带来的视觉效果是你没见过的SUV！</p>",

            "title": "改个车：19款斯宾特为何能成为汽车媒体的宠儿？看完内饰就懂了！", 
            "content": "<p>对于奔驰斯宾特这款车的定位，一直以来都是明星保姆车，或有钱人的商旅车。如此高端的定位，使得19款奔驰斯宾特在各大汽车媒体上成为爆款车型！</p><p>素闻这款车凭借内饰豪华被冠以“移动别墅”之称，更是中大型商务车改装内饰的范本，究竟这款奔驰斯宾特的内饰有多豪华？小编就带大家来看一组斯宾特的内饰展示！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-41f708f0e74dee1a6e1e14e1a4362cb9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-41f708f0e74dee1a6e1e14e1a4362cb9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;960&#39; height=&#39;640&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-41f708f0e74dee1a6e1e14e1a4362cb9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-41f708f0e74dee1a6e1e14e1a4362cb9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d6ecd53a4ac6fd16fc0bc1279153414c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d6ecd53a4ac6fd16fc0bc1279153414c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;960&#39; height=&#39;640&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d6ecd53a4ac6fd16fc0bc1279153414c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d6ecd53a4ac6fd16fc0bc1279153414c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>为什么这辆19款的奔驰斯宾特能够成为各大主流汽车媒体的宠儿？看到这样的内饰配置，说实话，小编完全被惊艳到了，真当得起移动别墅的称号！归其原因无非以下两点：</p><p>第一，品牌效应带来的市场消费指导，奔驰位列BBA奢华品牌之首，虽然现在的奔驰车非常亲民，但是能代表奔驰品牌水准的车型想来也就是奔驰斯宾特了；</p><p>第二，能购买这种车型的消费者，其消费能力都处于顶尖水准，正所谓看人下菜，服务于高端消费群体的奔驰斯宾特在牌面儿上绝对堪称一绝！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-eb0a4babce90107cbcc28274b4c57638_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-eb0a4babce90107cbcc28274b4c57638_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;960&#39; height=&#39;640&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-eb0a4babce90107cbcc28274b4c57638_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-eb0a4babce90107cbcc28274b4c57638_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4b76c3c3b225f5549e0ee6593305ecf2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1280\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4b76c3c3b225f5549e0ee6593305ecf2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;1280&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1280\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4b76c3c3b225f5549e0ee6593305ecf2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4b76c3c3b225f5549e0ee6593305ecf2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>至于其他方面的原因，在看完内饰的这一刻起，小编就完全折服了，它能够成为中大型商务车内饰改装的范本，说明其舒适度和高档质感的魅力非常值得肯定！<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-66bacf0b940329fb127a4a11b3974ff9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-66bacf0b940329fb127a4a11b3974ff9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;960&#39; height=&#39;640&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-66bacf0b940329fb127a4a11b3974ff9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-66bacf0b940329fb127a4a11b3974ff9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>优势一：绝对的空间引来效仿。</p><p>奔驰斯宾特的内饰空间一般商务车是比不上的，但凡空间相对不错的商务车，会选择将其内饰所拥有的配置全部搬到自己的车里，比如国产的威霆，亦或说江铃福特等空间差不多的商务房车，都会选择以奔驰斯宾特这样的内饰为改装范本；</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bdb720be40f30e71d7cbc43ece66e789_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bdb720be40f30e71d7cbc43ece66e789_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;960&#39; height=&#39;640&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bdb720be40f30e71d7cbc43ece66e789_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bdb720be40f30e71d7cbc43ece66e789_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>优势二：内饰理念超前，打造舒适的商务房车。</p><p>能将商务房车做到极致的，奔驰斯宾特算是独一份，既有商务车的豪华质感，又有房车舒适度和功能性；例如共七座的内饰，却将航空座椅以及沙发床的展现做到了空间上的绝对优势，即便是威霆这样的中型商务车，虽然能够将其搬进内饰，却始终给人拘谨的视觉感受；</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-eef6a3f00597947d0120a5c9cfca7b7a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-eef6a3f00597947d0120a5c9cfca7b7a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;960&#39; height=&#39;640&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-eef6a3f00597947d0120a5c9cfca7b7a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-eef6a3f00597947d0120a5c9cfca7b7a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>优势三：奢华内饰配置和装潢理念的大胆运用。</p><p>奔驰斯宾特的内饰装潢不亚于一次奢华的房屋装修，更是将房的装潢理念用在了车上，只为突出奢华，高端，档次的内饰质感；例如，顶灯以及隔断，对于大部分车来讲，只是代步，即便注重内饰配置的商务车也只是点到为止，真正将其当作生活场所并追求其品质的内饰设计，奔驰斯宾特也是当仁不让！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bdbbab7509f2d2ef557af22922aa36dc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bdbbab7509f2d2ef557af22922aa36dc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;960&#39; height=&#39;640&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bdbbab7509f2d2ef557af22922aa36dc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bdbbab7509f2d2ef557af22922aa36dc_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fd0027607db413f289505bc6776a4ffc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"640\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fd0027607db413f289505bc6776a4ffc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：兰博基尼盖拉多私人定制内饰，有钱人真会玩！", 
            "content": "<p>兰博基尼盖拉多是一款暴力的超级跑车，更被誉为世界上最成功的高性能跑车之一，由此成为兰博基尼史上产量最高的车型，即便这款车型的售价在兰博基尼里面不值一提，不过在我们看来它依旧高攀不起！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f3016d44fbc2e0a55581bd32d96fc78b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1125\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f3016d44fbc2e0a55581bd32d96fc78b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1125&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1125\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f3016d44fbc2e0a55581bd32d96fc78b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f3016d44fbc2e0a55581bd32d96fc78b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>由此可见，能玩儿得起兰博基尼盖拉多的人，肯定是妥妥地有钱人！不过这款车型已经停产多年，许多售出的兰博基尼盖拉多就极少见到，现如今这款车型多用来珍藏着玩儿的。本次案例中，我们就来看看这款兰博基尼盖拉多内饰DIY的效果！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-83e454c437e3407a1cc217ce0fc3b8ba_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1125\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-83e454c437e3407a1cc217ce0fc3b8ba_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：西安5万改装丰田塞纳内饰，7座改4座，高端商务人士首选", 
            "content": "<p>丰田塞纳这款进口MPV在国内市场占比量不算多，但是站在普瑞维亚的“肩膀上”，丰田塞纳的进口销量却很值得一提！标准的子弹头车型设计，独具丰田MPV风格，不过消费者对此是十分买账的，毕竟这款丰田塞纳具备着高端MPV应该具有的硬件条件：第一，进口；第二，车身设计情怀感很强。<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b323e4fddbf9dfb405894b1330b3e3c6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b323e4fddbf9dfb405894b1330b3e3c6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b323e4fddbf9dfb405894b1330b3e3c6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b323e4fddbf9dfb405894b1330b3e3c6_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/>就是这样一款车型，在车主接受改装之前，我都不敢相信这款车型的售价居然高达六十多万，因为原车内饰确实看上去不够上档次！甚至比不上国产MPV！<br/>而车主对这辆改装最主要的要求是增大内饰的空间，将7座改为4座车，力求内饰空间的舒适性以及最大化！<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fea980f0244e96cbaaab7ded80346547_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fea980f0244e96cbaaab7ded80346547_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fea980f0244e96cbaaab7ded80346547_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fea980f0244e96cbaaab7ded80346547_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-54fbdb95c56908d123aea9624f2321ea_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-54fbdb95c56908d123aea9624f2321ea_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-54fbdb95c56908d123aea9624f2321ea_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-54fbdb95c56908d123aea9624f2321ea_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/>本次丰田塞纳案例改装总共花费5万，改装项目不多，其中座椅改装占据费用的大半！两张中排航空座椅向来是商务车内饰改装中不小的一笔花销。但是不得不承认的是，这款航空座椅的装车效果是非常惊艳的。<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2e9026293888f159cdffe0aec1f656dd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2e9026293888f159cdffe0aec1f656dd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2e9026293888f159cdffe0aec1f656dd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2e9026293888f159cdffe0aec1f656dd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-52f1ba4b96bf9cbb2b493e9ea2e463f1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-52f1ba4b96bf9cbb2b493e9ea2e463f1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-52f1ba4b96bf9cbb2b493e9ea2e463f1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-52f1ba4b96bf9cbb2b493e9ea2e463f1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/>这款座椅的功能方面非常齐全，除去一般航空座椅必要的电动靠背，电动腿托，通风按摩等功能之外，还带有触屏控制系统，隐藏式小桌板，隐藏背托等功能，舒适性绝佳！<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-64993e7bb2634e02d35c1ee0f4194c0b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-64993e7bb2634e02d35c1ee0f4194c0b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-64993e7bb2634e02d35c1ee0f4194c0b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-64993e7bb2634e02d35c1ee0f4194c0b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/>不过这款车型的宽度不足两米，装完航空座椅之后中间丝毫没有过道，不过安装完滑轨之后，这样的航空座椅可以前后移动，中排过道完全没有意义可言，所以商务车安装航空座椅一定记得要将中排滑轨尽量安装靠前，能够保证三排乘客上车。<br/>这些对于这辆丰田塞纳完全没有必要，7座改装4座后的商务车，三排看来是不打算安排乘客的。<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-81f466a0ce0bcf6d219fda719f2e2903_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-81f466a0ce0bcf6d219fda719f2e2903_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-81f466a0ce0bcf6d219fda719f2e2903_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-81f466a0ce0bcf6d219fda719f2e2903_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/>其次，本次丰田塞纳改装将底盘做了一个全面的整改，铺上了手工拼接木地板！不仅增加了内饰的舒适度，还平添了几分观赏性。<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-edc6a4a478a3a4513010242d3ce30b76_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-edc6a4a478a3a4513010242d3ce30b76_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-edc6a4a478a3a4513010242d3ce30b76_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-edc6a4a478a3a4513010242d3ce30b76_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>迎宾踏部位木板改装<br/>整个内饰以灰色为主打色，车壁车顶清一色的高级灰，下半部分为黑色，黑灰配色尽显高级质感，但是整个看上去会使得内饰显得过于压抑，原木色的手工拼接木地板打破了这种沉闷，为内饰平添几分活力的色彩，不失为一种高级的配色装饰。<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c7868745f721f3a522e58fe869925823_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c7868745f721f3a522e58fe869925823_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c7868745f721f3a522e58fe869925823_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c7868745f721f3a522e58fe869925823_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/>本次案例通过简单改装，就能将丰田塞纳塑造成高端MPV！保证了内饰空间的最大化，还原了商务车该有的舒适感和高档品质！</p><p><br/> </p>",

            "title": "改个车：西安10万改装威霆内饰，升级26项配置，展现绝美案例！", 
            "content": "<p>本案为西安商务车改装店升级的奔驰威霆内饰案例，车主花费10万有余，为低配版奔驰威霆商务车做个性化定制，其中升级配置供26项，打造出一款绝美的内饰案例，一起来感受一下吧！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6ae509d756a7e119ef0b420c7d1f56f9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6ae509d756a7e119ef0b420c7d1f56f9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;432&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6ae509d756a7e119ef0b420c7d1f56f9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6ae509d756a7e119ef0b420c7d1f56f9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>要说MPV内饰空间大有什么好处？那就是可以为所欲为！特别是奔驰威霆这样的商务车，生来就是为了让车主做内饰改装的，因为本身车身外观和品牌过硬，没有什么可以挑剔的地方，但是说到内饰，这款车还真有点儿拿不出手了，买来之后注定是需要进行一番内饰翻新的。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b85d8af7b1f32a34ca44d35d172ff759_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b85d8af7b1f32a34ca44d35d172ff759_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;432&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b85d8af7b1f32a34ca44d35d172ff759_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b85d8af7b1f32a34ca44d35d172ff759_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>本次内饰翻新，着重为奔驰威霆内饰突出舒适性、功能性、以及个性化。在此基础上，力求打造出一辆具有高端内饰品质的奔驰威霆。那么这辆奔驰威霆改装是怎么做到的呢？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-352927002eed478d0e3d75d51c2e22b4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-352927002eed478d0e3d75d51c2e22b4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-352927002eed478d0e3d75d51c2e22b4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-352927002eed478d0e3d75d51c2e22b4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>首先，从内饰配色以及配件上面来突出个性化，力求做到与众不同！</p><p>嫣红色内饰包覆从门板，侧壁，中控台，再到内饰座椅，大面积的嫣红包覆，使得威霆内饰展现出别样的精彩，如此大胆而张扬的配色，绝对与众不同。内饰也因为这样的包覆效果而非常吸睛。</p><p>奔驰大波纹桃木件被用于门板把手，中控显示屏，以及侧壁中去，这种桃木件在商务车内饰改装中被广泛运用，特别是用作商务接待的MPV，原因之一就是档次感的添加完全离不开这种小配件的装饰！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dfe89dfd8dc7a790ba6214b01bfdfc15_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dfe89dfd8dc7a790ba6214b01bfdfc15_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;432&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dfe89dfd8dc7a790ba6214b01bfdfc15_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dfe89dfd8dc7a790ba6214b01bfdfc15_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-edf82f34d5ce93c24e5c84b24dfc18ab_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-edf82f34d5ce93c24e5c84b24dfc18ab_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;432&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-edf82f34d5ce93c24e5c84b24dfc18ab_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-edf82f34d5ce93c24e5c84b24dfc18ab_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>其次，说到奔驰威霆的功能性，低配版没有任何优势可言，而本次内饰改装就为了弥补这辆奔驰威霆内饰功能性的不足之处！</p><p>本案威霆改装中，无论是主副驾驶座，还是中排座椅，亦或是三排座椅全部进行了改装甚至是更换。</p><p>第一：主副驾驶座方面，主驾座6向调节功能，副驾座4向调节，外加后背桌板的安装，方便还舒适；</p><p>第二：中排埃尔法航空座椅安装，原车座椅遭到替换，基本的电动调节，通风，按摩，前后移动，靠背腿托，还带有360度旋转功能，档次感立竿见影；</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-dfc565aba6fadc9f1b924627726533e3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-dfc565aba6fadc9f1b924627726533e3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;432&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-dfc565aba6fadc9f1b924627726533e3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-dfc565aba6fadc9f1b924627726533e3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第三：三排座椅也更换成沙发床，可前后移动，凭借奔驰威霆超大的内饰空间，更可将其放平，平躺效果完全满足两个成人休憩！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6d5bbe525826006e1a975ed284bdd57b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6d5bbe525826006e1a975ed284bdd57b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;432&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6d5bbe525826006e1a975ed284bdd57b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6d5bbe525826006e1a975ed284bdd57b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>最后聊到奔驰威霆的舒适性，应该是每一辆高端MPV都应该具备的，而本次案例改装在舒适性的基础上不忘增加其美观度！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-21c54aac15cf86320ee247bde7c77867_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"432\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-21c54aac15cf86320ee247bde7c77867_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a8156772d5d5ac0993c99cea60041b52_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a8156772d5d5ac0993c99cea60041b52_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>方向盘、仪表台包覆情况</p><p>首先，一起感受一下驾驶室的改装效果；全车包覆换皮换色，驾驶室的中控台，方向盘，以及中央扶手，正副驾驶座，全做了改装包覆！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3fdf1a188f28e448598bc8b4adb44ead_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3fdf1a188f28e448598bc8b4adb44ead_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3fdf1a188f28e448598bc8b4adb44ead_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3fdf1a188f28e448598bc8b4adb44ead_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>门板包覆</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-87cc32d3f0906e461ed53c22578b5ade_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-87cc32d3f0906e461ed53c22578b5ade_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-87cc32d3f0906e461ed53c22578b5ade_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-87cc32d3f0906e461ed53c22578b5ade_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>中央扶手改装情况</p><p>第一，方向盘以及扶手箱，门板，座椅部位用料为纳维斯－１９，触感非常地柔软，坐过一次之后，才知道这才是百万豪车该有的乘坐体验。驾驶对于驾驶员来说非常重要，超过一个小时的驾驶时间很容易产生倦怠感，而皮质的柔软可以很好地减轻这种倦怠感！</p><p>第二，从工艺上来讲，门板处的包覆与座椅的包覆改装缝制工艺是不一样的，座椅缝制工艺采用的是原车缝制技术，门板处与中央扶手处采用双压线工艺缝制！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-afe72b587fac8039da62ba77356c2807_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-afe72b587fac8039da62ba77356c2807_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-afe72b587fac8039da62ba77356c2807_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-afe72b587fac8039da62ba77356c2807_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第三，扶手箱与门板处的包覆并非只有纳维斯皮料如此简单，为了增加其美观性，以及触感，还在几个部位做了桃木件加工，采用奔驰大波纹纹路共计１２件！改装效果非常上档次！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-34526498a19d0a647c2619969ebf5816_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-34526498a19d0a647c2619969ebf5816_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-34526498a19d0a647c2619969ebf5816_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-34526498a19d0a647c2619969ebf5816_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>其次，从全局来看内饰改装包覆效果，深咖色的座椅包覆深沉不失内涵，对于SUV来说更符合这款车型的消费人群，沉稳，耐脏，大气，上档次！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2d860730278c6629223df59808201597_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2d860730278c6629223df59808201597_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2d860730278c6629223df59808201597_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2d860730278c6629223df59808201597_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-36601d6778733223452689e5ff389b1f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-36601d6778733223452689e5ff389b1f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-36601d6778733223452689e5ff389b1f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-36601d6778733223452689e5ff389b1f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>个人觉得丰田酷路泽的内饰座椅很有意思，大多可折叠，无论是后排座椅还是中排，只要有需要可以随时安放，不需要的时候可以折叠起来腾出很大的空间。</p><p>不过一辆车的内饰中，座椅还是占了很大的比例，要想确定内饰的大体风格，还是需要从内饰的座椅开始！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-264a98632be4b1897a97ce6f7fc4a74a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-264a98632be4b1897a97ce6f7fc4a74a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-264a98632be4b1897a97ce6f7fc4a74a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-264a98632be4b1897a97ce6f7fc4a74a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>朋友这辆兰德酷路泽的内饰改装下来总费用不过２万，却真的算是将内饰焕然一新的操作，令驾驶体验有了不一样的感觉。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7b58178745d26988025e62b91170dfc3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7b58178745d26988025e62b91170dfc3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7b58178745d26988025e62b91170dfc3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7b58178745d26988025e62b91170dfc3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p></p><p></p>",

            "title": "改个车：在西安2万简改了奔驰V260内饰，做一个颜值一直在线的MPV！", 
            "content": "<p>福建奔驰V260可以说得上商务接待用车中的顶级座驾，比起威霆来说，这款车型的内饰配置当真不错！拥有高级内饰的MPV车在商务接待中赚足了面子！就这样一款本次V260还是需要进行内饰改装？不少车友留言，这款车型的改装案例有没有？</p><p>小编本案中就来与大家聊一聊奔驰V260的内饰改装案例，这款车怎么改？花费多少钱改合适？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1893ad2af1093746238aa1174def1c5a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1893ad2af1093746238aa1174def1c5a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1893ad2af1093746238aa1174def1c5a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1893ad2af1093746238aa1174def1c5a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8c7f4372bc4bdfaae235aa5a9c1cca5e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8c7f4372bc4bdfaae235aa5a9c1cca5e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8c7f4372bc4bdfaae235aa5a9c1cca5e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8c7f4372bc4bdfaae235aa5a9c1cca5e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>本案是一位甘肃车友为开公司接待客户而购得的奔驰V260改装案例，于西安进行的内饰改装，其总共花销2万有余，可以说是一个简改案例。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-73034d6ecd9623bd0e15f3b84adb27d2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-73034d6ecd9623bd0e15f3b84adb27d2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-73034d6ecd9623bd0e15f3b84adb27d2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-73034d6ecd9623bd0e15f3b84adb27d2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>通过了解小编发现，改装商务接待用车，真的是一个接什么活儿，出什么装的事情，奔驰V260的采购本身不算掉价，根据需求进行改装这件事儿本身也没有什么问题！如非硬性要求可以像这位车主一样，做一个简单的配置改装，让你的商务车足够体面就可以了！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2633d51aa76517ffb5c0e07cf9d4cb5d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2633d51aa76517ffb5c0e07cf9d4cb5d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2633d51aa76517ffb5c0e07cf9d4cb5d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2633d51aa76517ffb5c0e07cf9d4cb5d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-653ed2be19c10c29cd27ebf125469ee3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-653ed2be19c10c29cd27ebf125469ee3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-653ed2be19c10c29cd27ebf125469ee3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-653ed2be19c10c29cd27ebf125469ee3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>答：底盘！为什么会说是地盘呢？没见过猪肉相信你一定见过猪跑！商务接待用车讲究的就是高大上的内饰，要求还是比较高的。用原车底盘直接出去接待确实有失体面！虽然不敢吐槽称其为客车，但是没有改装过底盘的奔驰V260绝对不是完美的商务接待用车！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18dcbf565002ece50e0303e6d29612b1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18dcbf565002ece50e0303e6d29612b1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18dcbf565002ece50e0303e6d29612b1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18dcbf565002ece50e0303e6d29612b1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3a76e606582fccffb14744269fb236f2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3a76e606582fccffb14744269fb236f2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3a76e606582fccffb14744269fb236f2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3a76e606582fccffb14744269fb236f2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这辆奔驰V260内饰改装最大的工程项目就在底盘。做过隔音棉铺垫，止震版，底盘打底的项目之后，选用了色泽度高，颜色漂亮的胡桃木用材进行手工拼接，再用银丝边进行合缝！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bc4bd1a517f661be9b2c4b445f2cea57_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bc4bd1a517f661be9b2c4b445f2cea57_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bc4bd1a517f661be9b2c4b445f2cea57_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bc4bd1a517f661be9b2c4b445f2cea57_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>当然，改装完底盘之后的问题就在于座椅的安装，车主没有更换座位，但是在木地板改装后的基础上，做了滑轨裁剪，检修拓宽，令两座椅之间的过道变宽，方便后排上下！这样整体效果都将提升一个档次。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9389ac445b0bd9ce1c5e6aeaae1c1c99_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9389ac445b0bd9ce1c5e6aeaae1c1c99_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9389ac445b0bd9ce1c5e6aeaae1c1c99_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9389ac445b0bd9ce1c5e6aeaae1c1c99_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>就这样车主只用了2万的开销，就让这辆奔驰V260的内饰换了一个不一样的面貌！</p><p>不过在小编看来，这辆奔驰V260内饰中需要进行升级的还有三排座椅以及车壁的包覆，一则，车壁偏浅色的内饰看起来比较廉价，即便内饰硬件配置不俗，没有美观度也会拉低档次感；二则，奔驰V260带有天窗，整个内饰看上去有点儿机械化，使得生硬感增强，三排座椅原车在里面更加显得没有任何观赏性！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8d651a6788e2a7670fbe5e92a32ae67f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8d651a6788e2a7670fbe5e92a32ae67f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8d651a6788e2a7670fbe5e92a32ae67f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8d651a6788e2a7670fbe5e92a32ae67f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>本次2万简单改装奔驰V260内饰就分享到这里了，希望各位车友都能拥有一辆颜值在线的MPV！</p><p></p>",
