            "title": "改个车：西安5万改装传祺GM8，车型可以低调，内饰必须高调", 
            "content": "<p>如果你问15万左右的价位能买到什么样的MPV？小编所知道的价位中上汽的大通G10，G50与广汽的传祺GM8，GM6平分秋色。而单从颜值上来看，上汽G10与广汽传祺GM8要高于自己的同胞兄弟！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-113d94608d75c1e9992929028477a1c1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-113d94608d75c1e9992929028477a1c1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-113d94608d75c1e9992929028477a1c1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-113d94608d75c1e9992929028477a1c1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>不过要说起来传祺GM8这款车型的销量还是要稍微逊色于大通G10的，原因之一就在于大通G10的内饰空间比传祺GM8要大一点儿，而价位却比其低！</p><p>不过即便如此，小编却不认为在配置上面传祺GM8会输掉，相反，小编比较欣赏的是传祺GM8，从动力系统来说，两者根本不是一个档次，传祺GM8的马力能达到252，而大通G10才达到150。而就这样一款车型如果做完内饰改装后，绝对会成为一款顶配的家用般MPV！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68dbaf530c7fca2714f88b7956fdf421_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68dbaf530c7fca2714f88b7956fdf421_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68dbaf530c7fca2714f88b7956fdf421_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68dbaf530c7fca2714f88b7956fdf421_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>传祺GM8适合家用体现在两个方面：第一，内饰空间大小合适，作为MPV虽然没有商务版的超大空间，却能成为二胎家庭的不二之选；第二，在价位合适的情况下，动力系统绝对是一大优势。如果小编说这样一款传祺GM8内饰改装之后质量不输别克GL8你信吗？一起来看一下吧！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-312970ffb0106dd7d8073d9e1a937f83_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-312970ffb0106dd7d8073d9e1a937f83_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2951745a1f4d6bf08e60b5ac297b31c2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2951745a1f4d6bf08e60b5ac297b31c2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这款车型的内饰空间不经让小编想起了丰田塞纳，后座可折叠，感觉特别像SUV的后备箱空间！</p><p>但是一款MPV最需要保证的就是舒适度，这款车型的价位内饰座椅其实很一般，内饰改装换掉座椅后的乘坐体验小编觉得完全可以和高端商务车相媲美。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ab9b4cc4920dc524f81db4b3330d9a07_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ab9b4cc4920dc524f81db4b3330d9a07_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ab9b4cc4920dc524f81db4b3330d9a07_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ab9b4cc4920dc524f81db4b3330d9a07_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>本案中的传祺GM8改装的座椅，是一款最新款的航空座椅，兼具电动调节功能，靠背，腿托调节，外加按摩功能，扶手触屏调节，自带小桌板，杯托等设备，可谓功能齐全！全车座椅包覆选用红色拉斯纳帕皮进行改装，打造张扬而个性的舒适内饰体验。</p><p>不知道这样的航空座椅舒适度你给几分呢？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7f3af17ed494ec117d7180ff0e73715b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7f3af17ed494ec117d7180ff0e73715b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "content": "<p>应看客要求，小编本案中就为大家带来的是传祺GM8的内饰改装案例！这款MPV说起来不算奢华，却在同款车型中的销量惊人！且在MPV热销榜上排名第18名，可见这款车型的国民基础，受众群体庞大！尽然有小伙伴在评论区要求小编更新一款传祺GM8的改装案例！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ccb26ec71fba2603c97ff3f0de0b1dac_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ccb26ec71fba2603c97ff3f0de0b1dac_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：西安大众T6商务车内饰改装，14万凯路威内饰升级展示！", 
            "content": "<p>大众MPV在不少消费者眼里，虽然不算高端，但也绝对不掉档次！唯一令人失望的地方估计的就是内饰，特别是低配版内饰中控台部分，满满的塑料质感！一不小心还能开出货车既视感！所以内饰改装升级对于大众MPV来说势在必行！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a5fb5b36054058dccfd7d01070eb1052_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"430\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a5fb5b36054058dccfd7d01070eb1052_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;683&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"683\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f1a876b2dd1bb79b5978c1f34723c900_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f1a876b2dd1bb79b5978c1f34723c900_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>大众T6凯路威中控台</p><p>广告图修饰得再精致，也难以掩饰内饰工艺的粗糙！这也是为什么大众商务车需要改装内饰的理由，但是整车内饰升级的费用确实不低，想要整改内饰，大多数消费者会选择购买大众T6凯路威，内饰空间可改造性强，改装比较划算。那么整改后的大众T6会呈现怎样的效果呢？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-38e2bc77243b278f8a669821bbaee1e1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1877\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-38e2bc77243b278f8a669821bbaee1e1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;1877&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1877\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-38e2bc77243b278f8a669821bbaee1e1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-38e2bc77243b278f8a669821bbaee1e1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>本次案例改装费用为14万，具体的内饰配置，配图中做了详尽的呈现，整改后的大众T6凯路威内饰质感高级，其主要目的是为了将大众凯路威的商务用途最大化，在驾驶室做了仪表台的包覆，卡其色的翻毛皮加桃木件装饰，顶部门板处兼做了改装！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e1455843aad36d80c4c9ce9971421099_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1280\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e1455843aad36d80c4c9ce9971421099_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;1280&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1280\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e1455843aad36d80c4c9ce9971421099_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e1455843aad36d80c4c9ce9971421099_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>本次大众T6凯路威内饰整改最大的亮点应该放在后车厢，真正还原并模拟了商务车洽谈中所需要的座谈环境，内置隔断打造了一个高端舒适的“商务会所”！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dc164b66addce8e20c0944a7c9b173c9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1280\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dc164b66addce8e20c0944a7c9b173c9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;1280&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1280\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dc164b66addce8e20c0944a7c9b173c9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dc164b66addce8e20c0944a7c9b173c9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>摒弃了大众T6凯路威内饰中的2+2+3的原车座位布局，在后车厢实现2+2的对坐形式，宽裕的内饰空间足以在车壁处做造型，使得商务洽谈环境尽善尽美！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dee341367017d5689328b98ab930928e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1280\" data-rawheight=\"1920\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1280\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dee341367017d5689328b98ab930928e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1280&#39; height=&#39;1920&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1280\" data-rawheight=\"1920\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1280\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dee341367017d5689328b98ab930928e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dee341367017d5689328b98ab930928e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这辆大众T6凯路威为单开门，所以侧壁改造空间可以说是相当可观，在左右两侧兼可以打出侧壁柜，放置茶水容器，隔断处的两张秘书座椅下方更是“暗藏玄机”！商务洽谈所需要的茶具器皿得以存放！</p><p>这样的布局并没有影响大众T6凯路威内饰的空间，反而敞亮了不少，更上档次感！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b31c18e56c2f2426e42905aad1ab921c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1280\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b31c18e56c2f2426e42905aad1ab921c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;1280&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1280\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b31c18e56c2f2426e42905aad1ab921c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b31c18e56c2f2426e42905aad1ab921c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>卡其色的皮质与翻毛皮包覆再加上桃木装饰，从内饰整体看来非常高级，简直可以称为商务接待用车的标准配置</p>",

            "title": "改个车：西安10万改装奔驰v260商务车内饰，想上档次就得这样改！", 
            "content": "<p>都说BBA是一线奢华品牌，近些年来，一众合资车型的出厂可以说让BBA不再遥不可及。然而，就是这种“亲民”，令BBA的奢华档次在内陆消费者的心中大打折扣。<br/>就拿奔驰MPV来说，国产的威霆以及V260做得并没有人们想象中的高端，特别是威霆的中控台，很多朋友吐槽：这和五菱宏光有得一拼哪！<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e466cda0bf37558060c59dd9f02086ad_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e466cda0bf37558060c59dd9f02086ad_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e466cda0bf37558060c59dd9f02086ad_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e466cda0bf37558060c59dd9f02086ad_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/>使得很多购买国产奔驰MPV的消费者都逃不过需要改装内饰的命运，小编本案中为大家带来的是奔驰V260的10万内饰改装效果！<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-083a40b3aab82d9a7522a1e706ce2413_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-083a40b3aab82d9a7522a1e706ce2413_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-083a40b3aab82d9a7522a1e706ce2413_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-083a40b3aab82d9a7522a1e706ce2413_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/>关注奔驰MPV的车友们一定知道，威霆和V260兼为奔驰合资车，也就是国产，要说起来国产车并非不上档次，也不一定比进口车差在哪里，之所以进行内饰改装，是改装这件事本身对于MPV有着难以抵挡的魅力。<br/>对于V260这种本就在同款车型中高瞻远瞩的MPV来说，只会让档次感更上一层楼！<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8d7e5a7822aded7b16934412ac65d8dd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8d7e5a7822aded7b16934412ac65d8dd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8d7e5a7822aded7b16934412ac65d8dd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8d7e5a7822aded7b16934412ac65d8dd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/>本案例的奔驰V260内饰改装花费10万有余，包含<b>十多个改装项目</b>才拥有这样的内饰视觉体验，其中最不能错过的3大项目，是哪几项呢？<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-36c47ba5f199658eb145e3c3452de8ce_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-36c47ba5f199658eb145e3c3452de8ce_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c9d1c681a939067c38cd216e2338e879_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c9d1c681a939067c38cd216e2338e879_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/><b>第一，座椅更换！</b>奔驰V260后面乘客舱大都会选择改装一下，所以原车座椅其实和“豪华”二字完全不沾边儿！然而，换上豪华航空座椅之后的奔驰V260内饰，视觉体验就非常豪气。<br/>大家都知道普通航空座椅的费用确实不便宜，不过肯为奔驰V260这款车花钱的消费者，对于这种投资势在必行呀，所以改装V260的车，对于原车后舱的配置一般不作要求，反正都是拆下来扔掉。<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a92c956dfa5f56bb74792c8bc3b67630_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a92c956dfa5f56bb74792c8bc3b67630_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a92c956dfa5f56bb74792c8bc3b67630_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a92c956dfa5f56bb74792c8bc3b67630_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/><b>第二，铺上地板！</b>悄悄告诉你，随着内饰改装市场的逐渐成熟，像奔驰V260这种常改车型，在市场上非常容易找到套件，甚至常改的木地板也能找到整块儿版型合适的地板。这辆奔驰V260的内饰底盘升级中，就是采用了一整块的木地板进行铺覆，高端奢华档次质感立显！<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-64d97825d285ddbb6b910e8e7ebe0ce3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-64d97825d285ddbb6b910e8e7ebe0ce3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-64d97825d285ddbb6b910e8e7ebe0ce3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-64d97825d285ddbb6b910e8e7ebe0ce3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d426aedb357b0a5cd24a8e7a38038854_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d426aedb357b0a5cd24a8e7a38038854_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;427&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d426aedb357b0a5cd24a8e7a38038854_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d426aedb357b0a5cd24a8e7a38038854_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/><b>第三，装上漂亮的顶灯。</b>一辆车的内饰灯可以决定内饰的主题风格，根据内饰包覆而定，这辆奔驰V260的内饰包覆就比较庄重素雅，所以内饰灯光造型不需要太复杂的造型灯光，再者，奔驰V260这样带有天窗的MPV，在内饰灯光上的改装可选择空间不是很大，但是可以参照这样来改。<br/><br/>视频尚未发布，暂时无法播放<br/><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-03b0bec7f7ee2adb294df867a8564b87_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"427\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-03b0bec7f7ee2adb294df867a8564b87_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：西安8万改装雷克萨斯LX570内饰，SUV也能改装木地板？", 
            "content": "<p>雷克萨斯LX570作为丰田旗下一款奢华品牌，其口碑与品牌形象折服了一众土豪，它以纯进口的方式保持了自身品牌的原滋原味，而且在质量上也是做得最好的。尽管这款车在沿海地区的销量总体高出内陆销量一大截，却也凭借知名度在内陆有着“土豪座驾”般的地位。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7d2d718d7880b56159e1437c603fefaf_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7d2d718d7880b56159e1437c603fefaf_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7d2d718d7880b56159e1437c603fefaf_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7d2d718d7880b56159e1437c603fefaf_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>内饰改装在逐渐被人们认知的今天，改装市场上也不乏雷克萨斯LX570的身影，即便西安这样的内陆城市中也会出现改装内饰的雷克萨斯LX570，本案中小编为大家带来的就是一款8万改装内饰的雷克萨斯LX570。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-99fe05a442579897e049dbb59f645f39_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-99fe05a442579897e049dbb59f645f39_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1440&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-99fe05a442579897e049dbb59f645f39_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-99fe05a442579897e049dbb59f645f39_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>有网友问到：这车不是用来玩越野的么？如此豪华有什么作用？问得好！像奔驰大G这样的越野车，确实是用来玩越野的，但是有许多SUV车型，虽然是一款越野车，但是它们所对应的消费群体对它们的期待，可不仅仅是用来“玩儿”的。</p><p>像丰田旗下的陆地巡洋舰（酷路泽），像路虎，像雷克萨斯LX570，人们对它们的定位可不仅仅为了玩越野，更多的是身份的象征，是品味的展现，更是它需要内饰升级和改装的必要。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fc3297069b1198205d5c7b69cf9eb3c4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fc3297069b1198205d5c7b69cf9eb3c4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1440&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fc3297069b1198205d5c7b69cf9eb3c4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fc3297069b1198205d5c7b69cf9eb3c4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>本案中的雷克萨斯LX570内饰改装最大的亮点就是玩转了舒适度与豪华感并存的内饰品质！</p><p>内饰使用了大量视觉高端的装饰材料，仅仅一个驾驶室就能从方向盘和仪表台两处，利用桃木件与皮质相结合的改装，进行美观度和实用性上面的提升。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-39c864440f378bcc62468cdbd852226e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-39c864440f378bcc62468cdbd852226e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-39c864440f378bcc62468cdbd852226e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-39c864440f378bcc62468cdbd852226e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>当然，像雷克萨斯LX570的内饰空间，升级底盘这样的改装项目中究竟能否做木地板改装？答案：当然没有问题！雷克萨斯LX570是兼具强动力，越野型，宽敞舒适于一身的SUV，有些车主买来玩越野，就有消费者愿意将其豪华和舒适性做到最大化，完全没有问题！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c473e9a68a22d1a33fb7a68d9ff35079_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c473e9a68a22d1a33fb7a68d9ff35079_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c473e9a68a22d1a33fb7a68d9ff35079_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c473e9a68a22d1a33fb7a68d9ff35079_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>并且做完木地板改装的雷克萨斯LX570在视觉上就能给人以奢华质感的冲击力。打开车门第一眼你就会发现：这绝对是一款不一样的越野车！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c830687a9c05a25f24ba0f575e32d154_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c830687a9c05a25f24ba0f575e32d154_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c830687a9c05a25f24ba0f575e32d154_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c830687a9c05a25f24ba0f575e32d154_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-15e0f4096afda473a09de9056be88cd9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-15e0f4096afda473a09de9056be88cd9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：西安10万改装奔驰威霆内饰，无愧于“移动别墅”的称号！", 
            "content": "<p>说实话，接下来这组奔驰威霆的改装案例未必人人喜欢，审美不同所带来的争议性还是挺大的，本次案例是西安改个车在十一小长假期间为一位车主量身定制，案例配色为车主亲自制定，那么这辆奔驰威霆改装费用和效果又是怎样的呢？一起来看一下吧！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bdd3feb6f996bf40283b791a868a9f0d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bdd3feb6f996bf40283b791a868a9f0d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bdd3feb6f996bf40283b791a868a9f0d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bdd3feb6f996bf40283b791a868a9f0d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>奔驰威霆具有“移动别墅”之称，内饰空间非常大，可改造余地也非常多，做内饰改装的费用更是参差不齐，差价非常大。</b>前段时间，有网友留言咨询奔驰威霆10万预算的改装，小编就想起来这辆改装案例可以为大家提供！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b5b26eaa8bfe7b7f0e704c5ab3f68706_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b5b26eaa8bfe7b7f0e704c5ab3f68706_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b5b26eaa8bfe7b7f0e704c5ab3f68706_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b5b26eaa8bfe7b7f0e704c5ab3f68706_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>驾驶室改装效果</p><p>本次内饰改装花费10万有余，而个性化的定制也能看出车主是一位有追求，有独特审美的人，关于细节部分，我们可以细细来品味一番。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-87a6cdb7725dc87cf917f0b583762a7c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-87a6cdb7725dc87cf917f0b583762a7c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-87a6cdb7725dc87cf917f0b583762a7c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-87a6cdb7725dc87cf917f0b583762a7c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>深咖色和深蓝色的碰撞，这样配色许多人是不敢轻易尝试的，一不小心就会后悔不已，但是这位奔驰威霆的车主却特立独行，非常自信地为这辆车选用了如此大胆的配色。<br/></p><p>由于内饰空间是宽裕，在做内饰造型的时候，这辆奔驰威霆还加入了隔断！要知道，目前MPV中能加入隔断后还显敞亮的就属这款车无疑了！一起来看一下后车效果吧！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b47e54ec5b3fc29393d7e9cee25b4604_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b47e54ec5b3fc29393d7e9cee25b4604_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b47e54ec5b3fc29393d7e9cee25b4604_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b47e54ec5b3fc29393d7e9cee25b4604_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>加入<b>隔断</b>后的奔驰威霆后车内饰并没有显小，反而更加的有气场，“移动别墅”既视感一览无余！还加入了吧台造型，<b>音响，氛围灯，贮藏柜台造型</b>，真的是应有尽有，实现了功能美观一体化。</p><p>唯一美中不足的就是隔断处预留出来的<b>电视格</b>，其实并没有物尽其用，只是用一个窗帘布将其遮住，取而代之的是上方发吸顶电视，其实这样空间的奔驰威霆，吸顶电视的安装效果真的不如之间在隔断处安装升降电视的档次高！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4ef0430b50d87d23d28ecf16eeeee815_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4ef0430b50d87d23d28ecf16eeeee815_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4ef0430b50d87d23d28ecf16eeeee815_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4ef0430b50d87d23d28ecf16eeeee815_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>座椅升级</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ba29914ffdb1bb8dce2fb145f23ac9fa_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ba29914ffdb1bb8dce2fb145f23ac9fa_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ba29914ffdb1bb8dce2fb145f23ac9fa_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ba29914ffdb1bb8dce2fb145f23ac9fa_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>航空座椅升级</b>，这款舒适性，功能性更好的座椅其实是整个内饰改装中花费最高的，座椅为与内饰颜色相称，做了全面的包覆！更是在扶手处加入了个性化的桃木件做装饰，与吧台面的改装效果相得益彰！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-16a8460e1c93aac418c1495044a1e6f2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-16a8460e1c93aac418c1495044a1e6f2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-16a8460e1c93aac418c1495044a1e6f2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-16a8460e1c93aac418c1495044a1e6f2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>顶部做了造型灯，钻石顶灯光造型非常浪漫，又做了顶部包覆，深咖色翻毛皮的视觉和触感都是很棒的，相比原车来说要强很多了！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b8c1874975c9756b73c868d8a53aba03_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b8c1874975c9756b73c868d8a53aba03_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b8c1874975c9756b73c868d8a53aba03_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b8c1874975c9756b73c868d8a53aba03_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>很多人对沙发床有着深深的执念，如果你也拥有一辆奔驰威霆，不用怀疑，加个沙发床绰绰有余，这辆奔驰威霆的三排座椅别看丑萌丑萌的，但是当它平放下去的那一刻，感觉车里就是家！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-385a517ef8318a9c0d42203f3ffb620f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-385a517ef8318a9c0d42203f3ffb620f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：6万改装家用版别克GL8，19项内饰配置升级案例展示！", 
            "content": "<p>还没有买车的时候就咨询过改装，内饰定制出来的效果怎么说也比裸车回来看着要高大上，所以在改装内饰上面，我是认真的。</p><p>最后是在改装厂的建议下，购得了这辆别克GL825S，原因有二：<b>第一，我用作家用，别克GL825S的价位，比起ES来说要划算得多；第二，基于对内饰改装的执念，这款车型的内饰可改造空间足够，还特意买了个内饰配置不那么高的，费用便宜，省下来的钱，宁愿花到个性化定制上面。</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-64c5ec0399009ded6c69dff275963763_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-64c5ec0399009ded6c69dff275963763_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-64c5ec0399009ded6c69dff275963763_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-64c5ec0399009ded6c69dff275963763_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>我定居咸阳，内饰改装就近找的装潢店，好在西北地区的汽车内饰装潢厂家较多，最后在西安汽配城一家改装体验店里面做了内饰升级。6万的预算，可谓是做了一个内饰的“改头换面”，原先的内饰就不往出来拿了，买这款车的车友们心里都有数！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-55bb84e40a15077cf025d83ddc87f00c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-55bb84e40a15077cf025d83ddc87f00c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-55bb84e40a15077cf025d83ddc87f00c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-55bb84e40a15077cf025d83ddc87f00c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>说出来你可能不信，一款别克GL825S内饰升级居然能有19项之多，谈方案的时候这个也想要，那个也想要，所以不觉得有什么，列方案的时候着实惊到了，也许是项目列的比较细致吧！总之，我的这款别克GL825S内饰改装方案如下：</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f55d6e4661550cd0693583f0549532be_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f55d6e4661550cd0693583f0549532be_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5c4bbdd66afec1e3f177297f6487a683_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5c4bbdd66afec1e3f177297f6487a683_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>中央扶手抽纸箱</p><p>1、速比特电动中门两个，质保为3年；</p><p>2、科派的电动尾门1个，质保是6年；</p><p>3、恒新航空座椅两只，骨架质保终身（也就是说，只要你不嫌弃它用旧了，你可以一直用）；<br/></p><p>4、手工中央扶手造型，带有冰箱+USB充电+220V电源，桃木件装饰，扶手造型一体；</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2b15bca2e7c9f5da7f717b6430282515_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2b15bca2e7c9f5da7f717b6430282515_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e1f6fc48bdd5fe82e1365c856a72f09c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e1f6fc48bdd5fe82e1365c856a72f09c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>6、红色手工木地板加隔音，（没有做改装之前的别克GL825S底盘隔音确实不怎么样，方正都翻新了，做个木地板隔音还是非常有必要的）；</p><p>7、主副驾驶后背脚垫，（这款脚垫是手工定制的，与木地板用材一致，整体感会更好，四周包覆皮质与座椅皮质包覆也为同一用材，由于木地板改装位置只到主副驾驶座后背，空出来的位置实在不好看，放两个脚垫美观又舒适）；</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8d1b0394a67ee348a2b6880111702ed5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8d1b0394a67ee348a2b6880111702ed5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2eede70f412210319184cb7d46d3bb99_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2eede70f412210319184cb7d46d3bb99_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>8、木地板保养膜（别误会，我知道自己多此一举，但是真的这种反光质感我是抗拒不了的，实在好看极了！）；</p><p>9、1排与3排的座椅包覆，与航空座椅的面料，纹路一致；</p><p>10、除此之外，主驾驶座6向调节，福驾驶座4项座椅电动调节；</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-28e1459fea6c97f674f081f8674ea5ba_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-28e1459fea6c97f674f081f8674ea5ba_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-28e1459fea6c97f674f081f8674ea5ba_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-28e1459fea6c97f674f081f8674ea5ba_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-64130c816ea7727683d6247926aa8244_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-64130c816ea7727683d6247926aa8244_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-64130c816ea7727683d6247926aa8244_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-64130c816ea7727683d6247926aa8244_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>11、车顶、ABCD柱，遮阳板等包覆，考拉绒质感超赞！</p><p>12、真皮方向盘包覆；</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-120738157f25cc5be6046dd7d1963046_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-120738157f25cc5be6046dd7d1963046_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a6f891979cf48f59492aa6690a6fe31c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a6f891979cf48f59492aa6690a6fe31c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>14、带氛围灯的吸顶电视；</p><p>15、伯乐款360度全景记录仪；</p><p>16、音响升级；</p><p>除去内饰方面的配置升级，有些“硬件儿”，也做了升级改装。</p><p>17、氙气大灯（欧司朗透镜+灯泡+安定器）；</p><p>18、四门不锈钢贴片+后备箱保险杠贴片；</p><p>19、后视镜折叠+加热</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dabd85396bc12709d00d91cadf095abe_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dabd85396bc12709d00d91cadf095abe_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dabd85396bc12709d00d91cadf095abe_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dabd85396bc12709d00d91cadf095abe_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>说实话，这样个性化的内饰定制，改装效果完全不输高配版的别克GL8ES内饰，整车改装下来也是比较满意的，最关键的是，买家庭版MPV用车，别克GL8这样的配置简直绝了！</p>",

            "userLink": "https://www.zhihu.com/people/1576ccbf9fd3b4e526179a77a60a477e", 
            "upvote": 0, 
            "title": "改个车：1万小改奥迪Q7内饰，50万舒适型也能媲美100万尊贵版Q7？", 
            "content": "<p>2019款的奥迪Q7总共有5个价位不等的版本，60万左右的舒适型，70-85万左右的运动款，75左右的技术型，还有近100万的尊贵型。</p><p>当然，价位跨度如此之大，其区别在发动机，而非内饰！但是，50万的舒适型和100万的尊贵版在内饰上终究还存在区别的！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2b96221a6a9c62965309434a3a945e6b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2b96221a6a9c62965309434a3a945e6b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2b96221a6a9c62965309434a3a945e6b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2b96221a6a9c62965309434a3a945e6b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-53900244eb76d92e6898cac5b1325856_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-53900244eb76d92e6898cac5b1325856_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-53900244eb76d92e6898cac5b1325856_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-53900244eb76d92e6898cac5b1325856_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>第一，辅助操控配置。舒适版</b>拥有的是，简单的倒车影像，定速巡航！而百万<b>尊贵版奥迪Q7</b>，驾驶辅助影像配置的是360度全景影像！巡航系统配置为全速自适应巡航！尊贵版奥迪Q7还拥有自动泊车入位，可变悬架功能自动调节以及空气悬架！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-87179628df67a255640ff9a15946e4df_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-87179628df67a255640ff9a15946e4df_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-87179628df67a255640ff9a15946e4df_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-87179628df67a255640ff9a15946e4df_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>第二，内部配置</b>。百万尊贵型奥迪Q7拥有<b>HUD抬头数字显示仪</b>，又叫平视显示系统。</p><p>它可以把重要的信息，映射在风窗玻璃上的全息半镜上，使驾驶员不必低头，就能看清重要的信息。驾驶员不必在观察远方的道路和近处的仪表之间调节眼睛，可避免眼睛的疲劳，可提高汽车的安全性，当然也成为奥迪Q7高档与否的重要标致！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-416ca38ef64f82010725ea1fe59e5fd2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-416ca38ef64f82010725ea1fe59e5fd2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-416ca38ef64f82010725ea1fe59e5fd2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-416ca38ef64f82010725ea1fe59e5fd2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>奥迪Q7这样的中大型SUV，内饰的部分配置也是可圈可点，比如，许多SUV内饰就没有桃木件这样的装饰品，而奥迪Q7却在内饰中加入这一具有观赏性的装饰件！</b><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5e8e552d8304084bdde7f9d2651aff64_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5e8e552d8304084bdde7f9d2651aff64_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5e8e552d8304084bdde7f9d2651aff64_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5e8e552d8304084bdde7f9d2651aff64_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-595ccf65baa3772b685120ee2c84bb07_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-595ccf65baa3772b685120ee2c84bb07_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-595ccf65baa3772b685120ee2c84bb07_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-595ccf65baa3772b685120ee2c84bb07_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-478db0900dec97e59ca45f2bc0019413_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-478db0900dec97e59ca45f2bc0019413_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-478db0900dec97e59ca45f2bc0019413_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-478db0900dec97e59ca45f2bc0019413_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>除此之外，内饰的多媒体，灯光，玻璃，后视镜，空调，冰箱等配置的选配都大同小异，作为一款中大型SUV，<b>奥迪Q7的内饰座椅配置在价位不同的两款车中，也有明显的差异</b>。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8ff5db5d9f43e448f63ae535980c3f21_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8ff5db5d9f43e448f63ae535980c3f21_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8ff5db5d9f43e448f63ae535980c3f21_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8ff5db5d9f43e448f63ae535980c3f21_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>首先，在主副驾座椅调节方式中，主座位的调节中带有腿托调节，还带有通风加热按摩等功能。而作为舒适版的奥迪Q7在这方面远远逊色于尊贵版。</p><p>不过，将50万舒适型奥迪Q7与100万尊贵版Q7作为比对之后，依旧有不少的消费者愿意为舒适版的不足“买单”。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-dbe8a227e35f4bf51387f2c90ffc9a53_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-dbe8a227e35f4bf51387f2c90ffc9a53_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-dbe8a227e35f4bf51387f2c90ffc9a53_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-dbe8a227e35f4bf51387f2c90ffc9a53_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>原因其实也不值得推敲。</p><p>1、舒适版与尊贵版之间价位差距非常大，如非必要，低价位也能入手奥迪Q7，2.0T虽然差3.0T发动机一大截，但是涉及50万差价，谁会在意这些“细节”！</p><p>2、内饰配置在实用性上其实相差无几，综上所述，HUD抬头数字显示仪是内饰价位差的最大配置。花费一些小钱，稍作改动，至少在舒适性和美观性上不输百万奥迪Q7。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8b92ebd35ed301f8e7b390addef9f8b3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8b92ebd35ed301f8e7b390addef9f8b3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8b92ebd35ed301f8e7b390addef9f8b3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8b92ebd35ed301f8e7b390addef9f8b3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7698424af4470f3f748ac9436fbe0c07_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7698424af4470f3f748ac9436fbe0c07_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7698424af4470f3f748ac9436fbe0c07_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7698424af4470f3f748ac9436fbe0c07_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这辆奥迪Q7在内饰改装中，将主副驾以及中排座椅做了改动，选用了耐磨性更高的拉斯纳帕皮进行“换装”。底部靠背打孔，依旧可以在座椅配置上添加通风加热，甚至是按摩等功能，弥补座椅舒适度的不足之处。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-761fee10098a23cac712849b98e891f8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-761fee10098a23cac712849b98e891f8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：西安6万改装丰田酷路泽内饰，香车配美人，就得这么改！", 
            "content": "<p>究竟一款SUV的内饰应该是什么样子的？有人摒弃舒适奢华的内饰，以为单单追求性能就能满足心目中的SUV，每每车展一回来，就望着自家那辆“金玉其外，败絮其中”的SUV发愁，现在的改装市场如此成熟，小编不禁想问，这有什么好纠结的？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ad409190f7709e72b3b37e8e6f755af9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1081\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ad409190f7709e72b3b37e8e6f755af9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;1081&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1081\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ad409190f7709e72b3b37e8e6f755af9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ad409190f7709e72b3b37e8e6f755af9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0c7706584737bab0902bccff63a9a0bf_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1081\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0c7706584737bab0902bccff63a9a0bf_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;1081&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1081\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0c7706584737bab0902bccff63a9a0bf_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0c7706584737bab0902bccff63a9a0bf_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>首先，我们以内饰配置本身就过硬的丰田酷路泽来说，它应该是中高端SUV中数一数二的品牌，内饰空间大，兼具舒适体验与优越性能于一体，就这样一辆车，你也绝对会在改装市场上面见过它，原因只有一个，没有最好的内饰，只有更好！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f0a490060593105fde49834e5a8d3116_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1081\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f0a490060593105fde49834e5a8d3116_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;1081&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1081\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f0a490060593105fde49834e5a8d3116_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f0a490060593105fde49834e5a8d3116_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>像丰田酷路泽这样的中大型越野车，最值得改造的部位就是中排位置，很多城市越野的中排座位呈两座或者三座，三排位置大多选择摒弃，省下一大半的空间，载些物品。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-aadb855a30a46f066ebc5e63884b16a5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1144\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-aadb855a30a46f066ebc5e63884b16a5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;1144&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1144\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-aadb855a30a46f066ebc5e63884b16a5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-aadb855a30a46f066ebc5e63884b16a5_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>那么中排位置究竟可以做哪些改装呢？怎样的内饰改装才符合国人审美？这套6万改装下来的丰田酷路泽告诉你答案！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f449749483f4d98b15933aeeea9c98cb_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1082\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f449749483f4d98b15933aeeea9c98cb_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;1082&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1082\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f449749483f4d98b15933aeeea9c98cb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f449749483f4d98b15933aeeea9c98cb_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fafabc105a7965f1a785319d512a3f7d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1082\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fafabc105a7965f1a785319d512a3f7d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;1082&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1082\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fafabc105a7965f1a785319d512a3f7d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fafabc105a7965f1a785319d512a3f7d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>浅色偏灰调的整体色彩搭配有一种极其和谐的内饰美感，体现了丰田酷路泽的内饰品质格调，现代化的简约与时尚内饰环境更符合中国人的审美，如此美观度极佳的内饰改装，在视觉上就能给人以美到享受。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6853a24c9089acd5ebbc3e9a400c17c6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1082\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6853a24c9089acd5ebbc3e9a400c17c6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：商务车木地板改装那些事儿！底盘改装如何选材？", 
            "content": "<p>商务车内饰改装项目中，你会发现木地板的改装似乎成为一项车主们喜爱且热衷的事情，今天就商务车改装那些事儿一起来学习一下底盘改装应该如何选材。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cc0846cacd6b8fa3e24e184d6d45c65a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cc0846cacd6b8fa3e24e184d6d45c65a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cc0846cacd6b8fa3e24e184d6d45c65a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cc0846cacd6b8fa3e24e184d6d45c65a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-65d512b0cc5d54bf9f021978d4e0f732_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-65d512b0cc5d54bf9f021978d4e0f732_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-65d512b0cc5d54bf9f021978d4e0f732_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-65d512b0cc5d54bf9f021978d4e0f732_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>缅甸柚木，</b>世界公认的名贵树种，纵有“万木之王，千年不腐”的美誉，称为缅甸国宝级木材，其中以泰国，缅甸柚木为上品，木纹典雅，色泽金黄，用在正式场合装修中，更显尊贵，富丽堂皇，此类柚木用作工艺来讲，从生长到成材至少半个世纪之久，取材周期长，因此价格不菲！<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c1caf7ac53065ec8ffcd9e366be8335a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c1caf7ac53065ec8ffcd9e366be8335a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c1caf7ac53065ec8ffcd9e366be8335a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c1caf7ac53065ec8ffcd9e366be8335a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7d3b2949797ade4d91b5180b4060e589_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7d3b2949797ade4d91b5180b4060e589_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1440&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7d3b2949797ade4d91b5180b4060e589_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7d3b2949797ade4d91b5180b4060e589_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>游艇柚木</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7abf93cd95109dbc0e54e2dd1b99bb6a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7abf93cd95109dbc0e54e2dd1b99bb6a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1440&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7abf93cd95109dbc0e54e2dd1b99bb6a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7abf93cd95109dbc0e54e2dd1b99bb6a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>游艇柚木：</b>内饰改装中常用的木地板，顾名思义，这款木地板具有防水，防潮，日晒的特点，温度适用于零下三十度到七十度的内饰环境。常常被运用在甲板等的装饰，高级豪宅，奢华庭院，甚至是浴室，价位相对来说，比起缅甸柚木便宜。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4a92b5eeed15b788f64626d7b7beaa75_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4a92b5eeed15b788f64626d7b7beaa75_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4a92b5eeed15b788f64626d7b7beaa75_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4a92b5eeed15b788f64626d7b7beaa75_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1223b6ad7f07fef866b47267cfa2aee8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1223b6ad7f07fef866b47267cfa2aee8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1223b6ad7f07fef866b47267cfa2aee8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1223b6ad7f07fef866b47267cfa2aee8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>房车柚木：</b>顶级游艇柚木工艺，德国进口欧诗木木蜡油，进口游艇胶，防水防晒，经久耐用，防虫耐磨，耐候性强。木蜡油深入木材的内部，并且会在木材表层形成薄膜，增强木材的防水性能，以及它的稳定性，可以承受各种极端气候侵袭，严寒酷暑，潮湿，暴晒，甚至式雨雪。这种木材的光泽度非常好，用作商务车内饰改装，美观还漂亮</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b6ca5637b06202f3f976a7690a12a8b6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"600\" data-rawheight=\"800\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"600\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b6ca5637b06202f3f976a7690a12a8b6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;600&#39; height=&#39;800&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"600\" data-rawheight=\"800\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"600\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b6ca5637b06202f3f976a7690a12a8b6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b6ca5637b06202f3f976a7690a12a8b6_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>以上介绍的三种木材，是商务车，房车底盘改装的常用木材，有些车友会问，改装木地板的质保有几年？会不会出现裂痕，鼓涨之类的，一般改装木地板，质保都在五六年，所以如果是新车的话，到你年检的时候，差不多也该做一次维修了，最起码六年之内完全没有问题。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-69185064f0a72a3582270f9c84059b15_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-69185064f0a72a3582270f9c84059b15_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1440&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-69185064f0a72a3582270f9c84059b15_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-69185064f0a72a3582270f9c84059b15_b.jpg\"/></figure><p></p>",

            "title": "改个车：奔驰GL400内饰豪华改装升级，4座隔断版效果案例！", 
            "content": "<p>2006年在北美车展上奔驰GL级SUV亮相，其轴距和宽度都做到了同款车型之最，被称为SUV中的“巨无霸”，随后其卓越的性能优势，更是被冠上了“强悍”的名头。这样一款SUV要是与同款车型为伍，将内饰座椅布局规规矩矩地定义为7座车，未免让人觉得失望。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ef58c15dd7e57eb3dc7391bab5cb4b22_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"670\" data-rawheight=\"502\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"670\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ef58c15dd7e57eb3dc7391bab5cb4b22_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;670&#39; height=&#39;502&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"670\" data-rawheight=\"502\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"670\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ef58c15dd7e57eb3dc7391bab5cb4b22_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ef58c15dd7e57eb3dc7391bab5cb4b22_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>本案中带来的是一辆奔驰GL400的内饰改装升级案例，这样一款SUV注定要继承奔驰的豪华与舒适，要怎样进行内饰升级，才能让这款SUV不愧为奔驰GL级“巨无霸”！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8ea56f2185b9dd75462e8b8994f7017a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8ea56f2185b9dd75462e8b8994f7017a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8ea56f2185b9dd75462e8b8994f7017a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8ea56f2185b9dd75462e8b8994f7017a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>在SUV中添加隔断似乎是一件匪夷所思的事情，就连MPV这样的多用途车有些做隔断都略显勉强，但是奔驰GL400做到了，它确实实现了内饰添加隔断的操作。并且完美演绎了SUV内饰力与美的结合。<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1b64da59255e3df5dc268adb84d7451c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1b64da59255e3df5dc268adb84d7451c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1b64da59255e3df5dc268adb84d7451c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1b64da59255e3df5dc268adb84d7451c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这样一款具有运动属性的奔驰GL400是如何实现大型车辆内饰独有的豪华属性呢？隔断处应有的设计没有因为它是一款SUV而有丝毫的减少，它的储藏功能和娱乐功能设备完全不输商务接待用车，足以见得奔驰GL级SUV内饰空间的阔绰。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ab0b4778d0d6ef65bc6538135958604d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ab0b4778d0d6ef65bc6538135958604d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-44022c17cb82e52e7654319533a74fb5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-44022c17cb82e52e7654319533a74fb5_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2c481db58e1f985b1661aa84df67908e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2c481db58e1f985b1661aa84df67908e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2c481db58e1f985b1661aa84df67908e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2c481db58e1f985b1661aa84df67908e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>当然，隔断的添加要得益于内饰座椅布局调整，7座内饰布局调整为4座之后，内饰空间真的不是盖的，隔断才有这样的空间和余地施展！</p><p>那么四座的内饰座椅布局，到底有多豪华？其中最出彩的就是后车座椅，座椅后移车壁还能添加造型，座椅中间添加扶手，奔驰车独有的白杨瘤木做装饰件，大大提升了座椅周边的观赏性，而座椅本身的各项功能完全不输商务车内饰座椅！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9993f4df48e799e73ff59a6438cd585c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9993f4df48e799e73ff59a6438cd585c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9993f4df48e799e73ff59a6438cd585c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9993f4df48e799e73ff59a6438cd585c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>在奔驰GL400这款SUV内饰改装中你会发现，木地板并不是中大型车内饰的专属，SUV同样可以拥有漂亮美观的木地板进行内饰装扮。</p><p>同座椅周边的装饰件一样，底盘木地板的改装更是利用了这种木材，<b>白杨瘤木</b>可谓是木材装饰界的平民贵族，纹理美观，具有高档气质，虽然欧洲特有的木材，但是并不稀少，所以价位并不会特别高。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6fb8e2c154561047500c396132b386e8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6fb8e2c154561047500c396132b386e8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6fb8e2c154561047500c396132b386e8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6fb8e2c154561047500c396132b386e8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这样铺覆出来的木地板质感是不是非常值得一看呢？好了，奔驰GL400内饰豪华改装升级案例分享完毕，喜欢可以收藏哦</p>",
