            "title": "改个车：1万改装本田艾力绅，木地板装车效果展示也不错！", 
            "content": "<p>本田艾力绅这样的商务车，在MPV车型里面一直有着不错的销量，基于其庞大的受众群体，在商务车内饰改装市场上面也是最改的一款家用MPV，没有威霆一样可容纳百川的内饰容量，也没有别克GL8那样花样百出的改装配置。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2f85b2103630aeb92ec88b753ff709b4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2f85b2103630aeb92ec88b753ff709b4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2f85b2103630aeb92ec88b753ff709b4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2f85b2103630aeb92ec88b753ff709b4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>木地板脚垫装车效果</p><p>艾力绅车主改装最在意的两件事儿：一，改装费用不能太高，大部分的艾力绅车主对于改装内饰价格好像预算都不太高；二，改装效果，最好与原车比起来能够令人眼前一亮（这个要求适合用在所有做改装的车主身上，艾力绅车主当然也不例外）</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a3fcc6223be19ec4f97483f0d2e67f35_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a3fcc6223be19ec4f97483f0d2e67f35_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a3fcc6223be19ec4f97483f0d2e67f35_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a3fcc6223be19ec4f97483f0d2e67f35_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这辆艾力绅内饰改装项目主要有：<b>成品木地板，360软包脚垫，艾力绅专用电视，主副驾驶座靠背桌板</b>四大项目！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-218fd6ade807d80ae1a08cfe32dc8de4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-218fd6ade807d80ae1a08cfe32dc8de4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-218fd6ade807d80ae1a08cfe32dc8de4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-218fd6ade807d80ae1a08cfe32dc8de4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>目前市场上面出现了不少的内饰改装套件，由于艾力绅销量较高，套件成品更是不用费心订做，所以不少做内饰改装的朋友，可以直接购买套件进行内饰舒适度上面的改装</b>。</p><p>就像商务车内饰改装中常做的木地板改装，手工木地板铺覆的美观度和性价比自然是最好的，但是改装费用较高，一般装上之后，最起码也要玩儿个三年左右，要是没有个体验期，凭借一腔热情就做了木地板改装，估计你会后悔。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-961f0358251fed11bf9b86ba790272ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-961f0358251fed11bf9b86ba790272ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-961f0358251fed11bf9b86ba790272ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-961f0358251fed11bf9b86ba790272ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>还不如四五千块钱直接买个木地板成品做个改装，作为木地板前期的体验！费用不高，能体验到木地板还装的优势，还可以随时拆卸，手工安装费用成本也低，是艾力绅车主的不二选择。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bc38c10e8cd69359615f6cb62bd39a3b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bc38c10e8cd69359615f6cb62bd39a3b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-22f97f6a6eaaa7b4734d21baa4df0776_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-22f97f6a6eaaa7b4734d21baa4df0776_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>艾力绅家用吸顶电视</p><p>本田艾力绅这样的家用版内饰一定要有一款比较说的过去的娱乐装置——艾力绅专用吸顶电视，在旅途中可千万别再浪费手机电量刷视频听音乐了，安装一个吸顶电视可以解决你在途中所有的烦闷。<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-638b99e70ceb1092385bed182265e960_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-638b99e70ceb1092385bed182265e960_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-638b99e70ceb1092385bed182265e960_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-638b99e70ceb1092385bed182265e960_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>你的艾力绅改装还没想好做哪些项目？以上供你参考</p>",

            "upvote": 1, 
            "title": "改个车：奔驰威霆10万改装，改装前后天壤之别，难掩豪华质感！", 
            "content": "<p>奔驰威霆的销量在同类型MPV里面，被甩出来30名开外，这几年奔驰在国内的口碑当真是大不如前，在日系车这样的竞争对手面前更是被秒的节节败退，但是要说MPV中用作商务接待的佼佼者，奔驰威霆风采不减当年，销量的低迷并没有降低奔驰威霆在商务接待中受欢迎的程度。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-346592f36dcd5ced634352ad0ac7f635_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-346592f36dcd5ced634352ad0ac7f635_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-346592f36dcd5ced634352ad0ac7f635_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-346592f36dcd5ced634352ad0ac7f635_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>西安一位老板，最近就刚刚购得一辆奔驰威霆，但是，这辆奔驰威霆内饰的整体格调在刚刚到手的时候，都有一种“风尘仆仆”的寒酸气息。车主并不是太倚重，感觉还是不够档次，座椅也是满满的塑料感，内饰升级成为车主的当务之急。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bd4795cdb37edd24e78d3571b0bb29e4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bd4795cdb37edd24e78d3571b0bb29e4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bd4795cdb37edd24e78d3571b0bb29e4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bd4795cdb37edd24e78d3571b0bb29e4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a22db2aa3239bbad081190c3694fb9b5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a22db2aa3239bbad081190c3694fb9b5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a22db2aa3239bbad081190c3694fb9b5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a22db2aa3239bbad081190c3694fb9b5_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>上图为威霆原车局部效果，驾驶室和后排座椅看起来确实不如意，下面一起来看一下改装后的大变身吧！</p><p><b>奔驰威霆10万改装豪华内饰效果展示</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8665abee329a4b45768d0fa01b7cadcc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8665abee329a4b45768d0fa01b7cadcc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8665abee329a4b45768d0fa01b7cadcc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8665abee329a4b45768d0fa01b7cadcc_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>内饰全车包覆，比起原车单一的黑色包覆，好似一切非原色包覆都能使得内饰焕然一新，而这辆奔驰威霆内饰包覆颜色也完全是自定义，这就是为什么内饰改装行业越来越繁荣的原因，可以最大程度地满足各位车主的需求。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0cf8ab9afd2da8d879568d34bf0224b4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0cf8ab9afd2da8d879568d34bf0224b4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0cf8ab9afd2da8d879568d34bf0224b4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0cf8ab9afd2da8d879568d34bf0224b4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>内饰主打颜色被定义为卡其色，其中除去翻毛皮等顶部包覆，仪表台，门板包覆，色彩搭配统一而不失气度，高档且有格调，皮革和毛绒结合，非常上档次。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2666aec72fdedcea4551102abdb3d145_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2666aec72fdedcea4551102abdb3d145_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：10张图呈现10万改装威霆效果，打造“十全十美”商务内饰", 
            "content": "<p>谈到商务接待车型，你第一眼想到的绝对不是别克GL8，艾力绅，奥德赛这类MPV，因为它们太过于“家常”，不够上档次！<b>而奔驰MPV则不然，最大优势就在于内饰空间是它们比不了的，尤其是奔驰威霆，由内而外地散发着尊贵气质，做商务接待更是有理有面儿，</b>因此受到了不少商务人士的青睐！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-560c3e244c810b8e36708568e5651c3b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-560c3e244c810b8e36708568e5651c3b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-560c3e244c810b8e36708568e5651c3b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-560c3e244c810b8e36708568e5651c3b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>西安一位车主花费10万改装奔驰威霆的内饰，接下来内饰改装效果定会让各位眼前一亮，这是一种怎样超乎寻常的全新体验呢？一起来看一下10万改装效果！</p><p><b>威霆10万改装清单</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7ab6f85675eaf76284bb75141f8eeb28_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7ab6f85675eaf76284bb75141f8eeb28_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7ab6f85675eaf76284bb75141f8eeb28_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7ab6f85675eaf76284bb75141f8eeb28_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ee57b7f8a77d81edd57506d5ba2b705f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ee57b7f8a77d81edd57506d5ba2b705f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ee57b7f8a77d81edd57506d5ba2b705f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ee57b7f8a77d81edd57506d5ba2b705f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>阿尔法二排座椅加三排阿尔法沙发床</b>，这款座椅的舒适度在商务车里面一直处于顶尖水准，而埃尔法这款大块头航空座椅一般的MPV是放不下的，奔驰威霆在此基础上居然可以保持宽阔的过道，内饰空间可见一斑，与原车清一色的黑皮座椅比起来，大大改善了内饰乘坐体验和档次感！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-45e94b32547fdd9d146a6c84d9c516fb_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-45e94b32547fdd9d146a6c84d9c516fb_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-45e94b32547fdd9d146a6c84d9c516fb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-45e94b32547fdd9d146a6c84d9c516fb_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>驾驶室大改造</b>，中控大屏做了全方面的大改，仪表台做了包覆，主副驾驶座十项电动加包覆，卡其色拉斯皮质看上去大气且奢华。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8045d5aa0459c4dd16bf073bb06cb379_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8045d5aa0459c4dd16bf073bb06cb379_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8045d5aa0459c4dd16bf073bb06cb379_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8045d5aa0459c4dd16bf073bb06cb379_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-be89b53eca06b2b804f2c58fe3206d97_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-be89b53eca06b2b804f2c58fe3206d97_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-be89b53eca06b2b804f2c58fe3206d97_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-be89b53eca06b2b804f2c58fe3206d97_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>电动门改装，</b>电动中门，电动尾门改装，对于奔驰威霆这样的商务接待用车来说，手动开门真的非常掉价，且显得没有牌面，安装电动门的优势就在于，方便安全，且省去在商务接待中手动开门带来的尴尬！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1df32c38d08822eae8646ac65921b3e4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1df32c38d08822eae8646ac65921b3e4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1df32c38d08822eae8646ac65921b3e4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1df32c38d08822eae8646ac65921b3e4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-48a76fc4801818d430daed61946fca8a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-48a76fc4801818d430daed61946fca8a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-48a76fc4801818d430daed61946fca8a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-48a76fc4801818d430daed61946fca8a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>正副驾驶座背靠桌板</b>，杯托自带的靠背桌板，放置水杯，且安装了无线充，手机随时随处可充饱电量，非常实用且气派的项目配置。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68b58283b571fc11a8172dae7aa107e9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68b58283b571fc11a8172dae7aa107e9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68b58283b571fc11a8172dae7aa107e9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68b58283b571fc11a8172dae7aa107e9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>侧壁，门板包覆，</b>全车几乎是一次”大换脸”，原车单调的内饰配色在换完航空座椅以及ABCD柱包覆，门板包覆之后，简直像换了一辆车一样，车主在接车之后惊叹道：这还是我那辆奔驰威霆嘛？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bef5918bd6b6b3a81644a80e2c892621_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bef5918bd6b6b3a81644a80e2c892621_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bef5918bd6b6b3a81644a80e2c892621_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bef5918bd6b6b3a81644a80e2c892621_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>顶部造型灯安装</b>，小编最喜欢的内饰配置还是顶部的灯光改装，简直是太美了，水滴顶立体又大气，在整个内饰改装中是最亮眼的配置，使得这辆奔驰威霆的内饰空间感更为强烈，卡其色的顶棚包覆上安装了星空顶，几百株分布不均的光点，在内饰中闪耀着，平添几分浪漫。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f8ac6798563771a178bc67f9548c182a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f8ac6798563771a178bc67f9548c182a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "content": "<p>说实话，购买丰田酷路泽是下了血本的，几个高端SUV的可选择性依旧不少，但是考虑到性价比以及保值率，在朋友的建议之下买下来这辆丰田酷路泽，但是本人对于丰田系列的SUV内饰实在不敢恭维。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ef43d14d03c50b8334e4e6f70ae5c69_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1013\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ef43d14d03c50b8334e4e6f70ae5c69_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1013&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1013\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ef43d14d03c50b8334e4e6f70ae5c69_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ef43d14d03c50b8334e4e6f70ae5c69_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>其实也并不是说这辆车的内饰有多LOW，毕竟也花了不少钱，只是在看到原装内饰的那一刻未免期望过高，失望也比较大。后来在论坛里咨询了车友们，这样的内饰情况大家都是怎么处理的？才了解到内饰改装的行业，还好本人所在的城市做改装行业的还真不少，于是再三比较之下去了改个车。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5905c01be4b9b5d43b1ad5182db2aec0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1620\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1620\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5905c01be4b9b5d43b1ad5182db2aec0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "upvote": 0, 
            "title": "改个车：内饰改装雷克萨斯LX570，三大项目提升内饰气质！", 
            "content": "<p>作为LX系列的第三代产品，雷克萨斯LX570可谓是将豪华SUV做到了极致，其越野和行驶性能都到达了一个新的高度。这样一款高逼格的百万级别豪车，真的是一款会令人心潮澎湃的存在，其内饰更是只有更好，没有最好。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1d1fbd025981a4073e43719a7c65f839_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"731\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1d1fbd025981a4073e43719a7c65f839_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;731&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"731\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1d1fbd025981a4073e43719a7c65f839_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1d1fbd025981a4073e43719a7c65f839_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>即便百万豪车SUV雷克萨斯LX570内饰在同类型车型中也可称为佼佼者，但还是逃不过被改装的命运，这源于人们对于内饰的舒适度，档次感，功能性，配色感的不同定义，对于内饰的自定义也就各有千秋，因为每一位拥有雷克萨斯的车主，都值得拥有一款打入人心的内饰。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c52d0fd7a67b9ac650a3dc8b824ec7ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c52d0fd7a67b9ac650a3dc8b824ec7ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1440&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c52d0fd7a67b9ac650a3dc8b824ec7ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c52d0fd7a67b9ac650a3dc8b824ec7ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3d0600942c9299c49fc83049b5c016df_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3d0600942c9299c49fc83049b5c016df_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1440&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3d0600942c9299c49fc83049b5c016df_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3d0600942c9299c49fc83049b5c016df_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>你要知道，改装对于内饰来说是具有何其的魅力，改装后的雷克萨斯LX570才是魅力尽显的时刻，这辆雷克萨斯LX570的内饰改装这要有三大项目：座椅，后排扶手，以及木地板。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0304397295c78161b937bc2ccf0cd898_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0304397295c78161b937bc2ccf0cd898_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0304397295c78161b937bc2ccf0cd898_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0304397295c78161b937bc2ccf0cd898_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>中排中央扶手展示：现在</b>不少的百万SUV改装中最受追捧的项目，除去主副驾驶可以拥有扶手箱以外，中排座椅中央也拥有一个百宝箱式的中央扶手，其功能用途甚至可以和MPV中常见的吧台功能相媲美！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-26373ae5caf20299692dbb06dbb8a98a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-26373ae5caf20299692dbb06dbb8a98a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1440&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-26373ae5caf20299692dbb06dbb8a98a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-26373ae5caf20299692dbb06dbb8a98a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>造型还是很别致的嘛</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-abe0f32e852b144bf96827ece7bf23f2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-abe0f32e852b144bf96827ece7bf23f2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1440&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-abe0f32e852b144bf96827ece7bf23f2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-abe0f32e852b144bf96827ece7bf23f2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>刚刚改装完工绷带还来不及拆</p><p>说到中排安装扶手的好处：具有储物，冷藏，电子调节与一体，加入这项配置之后，还起到分割左右座椅，具有提升内饰气质的加分作用，实际视觉效果一流，仿佛真正的百万豪车就应该是这个样子！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d66a2f35f038f5f115015595b95d37e2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d66a2f35f038f5f115015595b95d37e2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d66a2f35f038f5f115015595b95d37e2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d66a2f35f038f5f115015595b95d37e2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-afc1e9ea0b308bbab33143dee8792cc3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-afc1e9ea0b308bbab33143dee8792cc3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-afc1e9ea0b308bbab33143dee8792cc3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-afc1e9ea0b308bbab33143dee8792cc3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>木地板改装</b>，一个豪华的SUV内饰一定会让你第一眼看上去像是包间一样不失体面，木地板在哪里都能体现出一种亲切感，一种舒适性，一种高端品质，木地板已经被广泛运用于中大型商务车，房车，保姆车等内饰，像雷克萨斯这样的高端SUV怎能轻易错过！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-82b50c344d972c47484d42d0e60fc00c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-82b50c344d972c47484d42d0e60fc00c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-82b50c344d972c47484d42d0e60fc00c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-82b50c344d972c47484d42d0e60fc00c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>座椅包覆，</b>内饰色彩自定义是内饰改装常改的项目，这辆雷克萨斯的内饰卡其色真皮包覆质感是非常棒的，比原车黑色的内饰包覆比起来多了一份可观赏</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-63466208dfd592ade1d13996de99f150_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-63466208dfd592ade1d13996de99f150_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-63466208dfd592ade1d13996de99f150_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-63466208dfd592ade1d13996de99f150_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>归根结底，同款车型都有不同的价位，不同的配置，内饰的奢华程度才是定义雷克萨斯LX570档次感的标准。</p>",

            "upvote": 0, 
            "title": "西安改个车：车主花费6万改装路虎发现5，网友：看起来很带感！", 
            "content": "<p>对于有一定消费能力的SUV消费者来说，路虎发现是一个不错的选择，其品牌力和产品力在同款车型中也是有口皆碑的。</p><p><b>这两年，SUV市场竞争力尤为激烈，从销量来说，路虎的表现却大不如前，发现5的出现并没有令其起死回生，反而遭到不少网友的吐槽，认为路虎发现在软装方面的造诣还是有待提高。</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c52dd72f70d3d7a382d1394895ac4f6b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c52dd72f70d3d7a382d1394895ac4f6b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;480&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"480\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c52dd72f70d3d7a382d1394895ac4f6b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c52dd72f70d3d7a382d1394895ac4f6b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>其实，小编认为各花入各眼，有时候一个人对于一个品牌产生偏见，无论看哪里都不会顺眼的，不过这不妨碍一些路虎粉对于“男人腿”的执念，曾经的路虎以这样的形象深深扎根于消费者的观念里，影响至今，品牌形象屹立不倒。</p><p><b>西安一位路虎狂热爱好者购得路虎发现5之后，就将这款车的内饰加入了自己的理念和设计进行了内饰翻新，改装效果依旧是各花入各眼，不妨一起来看一下，这样的改装有哪些可取之处！</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3a7091275293cae24220921ad880cb2e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3a7091275293cae24220921ad880cb2e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3a7091275293cae24220921ad880cb2e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3a7091275293cae24220921ad880cb2e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-911ca8ffc285320a7f23ca483ac9b19c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-911ca8ffc285320a7f23ca483ac9b19c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-911ca8ffc285320a7f23ca483ac9b19c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-911ca8ffc285320a7f23ca483ac9b19c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>整车的内饰以红色作为主打色，必须要承认的是，这样的内饰颜色并不被所有人所接受，有人喜欢，自然有人反感，不过小编所欣赏的是这位路虎车主的大胆，勇于将这样争议性比较的颜色进行内饰的添加，绝对是一位有想法，有个性的主儿！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-64571e98f41f0789a1a2b8d47ffdf464_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-64571e98f41f0789a1a2b8d47ffdf464_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-64571e98f41f0789a1a2b8d47ffdf464_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-64571e98f41f0789a1a2b8d47ffdf464_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>同时，这样的内饰还融入了MPV的舒适品质，许多SUV的内饰最大烦恼来自于座椅，座椅的这辆路虎内饰将7座改为了4座形式，同时将座位后移，侧壁造型，以及中央扶手完美地简直“不可思议”，主副驾驶座与后排座椅之间也拥有了绝对的空间！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-bea30028902d89da4c72df27ee31b85e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-bea30028902d89da4c72df27ee31b85e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-bea30028902d89da4c72df27ee31b85e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-bea30028902d89da4c72df27ee31b85e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>那么，这些留下来的空间做了什么呢？</b>吧台！在SUV中设置吧台是一件不容易的事情，也有人认为这怎么可能呢？还是那句话，各花入各眼！对于有些人来说，高品质的内饰配置，舒适的内饰改装，便捷的内饰装备才配得上路虎发现这样的高端SUV。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-79ab9150343fe987eb068aaf0e6698ea_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-79ab9150343fe987eb068aaf0e6698ea_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-79ab9150343fe987eb068aaf0e6698ea_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-79ab9150343fe987eb068aaf0e6698ea_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>内饰娱乐化的立体音响，多样化的储藏柜，多功能的杯托，使得这样的内饰吧台非同凡响般的存在！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8e1d0979b9a5a5897d4c6d56e16c35e6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8e1d0979b9a5a5897d4c6d56e16c35e6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8e1d0979b9a5a5897d4c6d56e16c35e6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8e1d0979b9a5a5897d4c6d56e16c35e6_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>内饰灯改装其中有顶灯，氛围灯，本身没有什么值得吐槽的，最多起到一个照明效果，不过看到上图中的瑰红色光线的时候，还是吓一跳，好在有色彩灯光变幻，不然这样的改装效果还真有点儿KTV蹦迪的意思。不得不说这位路虎车主的偏好真的是与众不同。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-05dcbdda63132148a69d4fdf0bec14e1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-05dcbdda63132148a69d4fdf0bec14e1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-05dcbdda63132148a69d4fdf0bec14e1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-05dcbdda63132148a69d4fdf0bec14e1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>每个人对于爱车的内饰都有自定义的需求，这也是为什么路虎车主要以改装内饰来彰显个性，由此可见，内饰改装的市场需求还是与日俱增的</p>",

            "title": "改个车：丰田塞纳改装需要多少钱？家庭商务两用内饰的最佳改装！", 
            "content": "<p></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b3f61f887ea27bdb415522fc6891ddf9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b3f61f887ea27bdb415522fc6891ddf9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1333&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b3f61f887ea27bdb415522fc6891ddf9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b3f61f887ea27bdb415522fc6891ddf9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>丰田塞纳</b>作为日系MPV中的后起之秀，在价位，车型外观，内饰配置方面深得消费者的喜爱！也成为许多人心目中家用版MPV的不二之选，作为家用来说，其实内饰的配置尤为重要。</p><p>同时，在改装市场上面，更是将丰田塞纳的内饰玩出了新花样。本案中是一辆6万改装的丰田纳塞内饰，其效果完全不输商务接待用车！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-06412b0f0de34c3b124ff3e766a270cf_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1498\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-06412b0f0de34c3b124ff3e766a270cf_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1498&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1498\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-06412b0f0de34c3b124ff3e766a270cf_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-06412b0f0de34c3b124ff3e766a270cf_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>许多首次购买MPV的消费者反应：选车是非常纠结的过程！确实，除去丰田塞纳以外，现在用作家用的MPV中，别克GL8，宝骏730，艾力绅，奥德赛等是市场上比较热销的MPV。同时，它们都有一个共同的特性：<b>内饰空间虽大，但是和正真商务接待之用的MPV之间还有所差距。</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2cd775de048f9da87858586bf0076b15_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1498\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2cd775de048f9da87858586bf0076b15_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1501&#39; height=&#39;2000&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1501\" data-rawheight=\"2000\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1501\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4906a040e2ad4f552b654e0893d74191_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4906a040e2ad4f552b654e0893d74191_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这辆丰田塞纳的内饰改装，力求在有限的内饰空间里面，合理布局，大胆创新，做到真正的美观，舒适，甚至力求和埃尔法等豪华商务车相媲美。在6万的预算里面，这辆丰田塞纳内饰改装的表现究竟如何呢？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9f17c367c3c2693c118fadd116461c5f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1501\" data-rawheight=\"2000\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1501\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9f17c367c3c2693c118fadd116461c5f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1501&#39; height=&#39;2000&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1501\" data-rawheight=\"2000\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1501\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9f17c367c3c2693c118fadd116461c5f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9f17c367c3c2693c118fadd116461c5f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>内饰整体氛围得益于内饰灯光的衬托，车顶<b>迈巴赫九宫格</b>，多种光线色彩变化，内饰照明效果与打造浪漫车室氛围相结合，<b>菱形侧壁灯与条形LED装饰灯</b>，多种造型多种光线色彩为内饰添加了无与伦比的魅力。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f750ffa3baa7ef7377e0ac4215b276df_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1501\" data-rawheight=\"2000\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1501\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f750ffa3baa7ef7377e0ac4215b276df_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：普瑞维亚内饰改装，谁说“子弹头”不适合安装航空座椅？", 
            "content": "<p>丰田旗下的MPV中，普瑞维亚算是出现比较早的一款，虽然丰田塞纳作为后起之秀，在市面上的销售量一直不错，但是提起”大霸王“”子弹头“的名号，丰田普瑞维亚就真的是无人不知，无人不晓。可见这款车在人们的心目中有多经典！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b44d59698b284078f7dd62b6a2966075_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"962\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b44d59698b284078f7dd62b6a2966075_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;962&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"962\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b44d59698b284078f7dd62b6a2966075_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b44d59698b284078f7dd62b6a2966075_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这样识别性较高的外形，使得普瑞维亚十几年来，在外观上面保持着老样子，同时内饰的空间质感也是一大卖点，作为商务车，它能够确保极佳的灵活性，使得消费者可以按照自己的意愿对车内空间加以调整和利用。</p><p><b>而本案中，就以丰田普瑞维亚这款车型的内饰改装为例，一起来看一下这款经典车型的内饰应该是什么样子的！</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-55d46335be99f4a799c675b81e28cc86_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-55d46335be99f4a799c675b81e28cc86_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-55d46335be99f4a799c675b81e28cc86_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-55d46335be99f4a799c675b81e28cc86_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>中门位置</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8d55399b6f277f3fc8817cf48d65a6db_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8d55399b6f277f3fc8817cf48d65a6db_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1440&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8d55399b6f277f3fc8817cf48d65a6db_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8d55399b6f277f3fc8817cf48d65a6db_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>木地板改装</p><p>其实这款普瑞维亚更偏向于家用，没有哗众取宠的配置，致力于家用版的舒适感，和居家般的亲切感。<b>越来越多的人将木地板融入到商务车的内饰中去，即便这样的配置褒贬不一，但是事实证明木地板确实是提升MPV内饰气质的一个顶好项目。</b></p><p>整洁，美观，便于清理，提升内饰档次的效果绝对是物美价廉的改装项目！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-327fb6ca57e0974fd0b4cb23a6d96853_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-327fb6ca57e0974fd0b4cb23a6d96853_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-327fb6ca57e0974fd0b4cb23a6d96853_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-327fb6ca57e0974fd0b4cb23a6d96853_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>航空座椅</p><p>对于许多商务车里说，安装航空座椅势必会令内饰空间感到狭小，丰田普瑞维亚也不例外，其内饰的宽度在同款车型中是不占什么优势的，自然中排座椅安装航空座椅也会令过道处没有任何空间，但是俗话说，上帝为你关上一扇门，必将为你打开一扇窗。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-43d195e18ef85080e6512d6f851d91aa_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-43d195e18ef85080e6512d6f851d91aa_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-43d195e18ef85080e6512d6f851d91aa_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-43d195e18ef85080e6512d6f851d91aa_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>因为商务车安装航空座椅存在着无过道这种普遍的，致命的问题，自然也会衍生出相对应的解决办法——滑轨。</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d41cc6e1001561c52b88a8c09c35fb6c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d41cc6e1001561c52b88a8c09c35fb6c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d41cc6e1001561c52b88a8c09c35fb6c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d41cc6e1001561c52b88a8c09c35fb6c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-07d04e0df51d6b5bfa7edfdc475330ac_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-07d04e0df51d6b5bfa7edfdc475330ac_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-07d04e0df51d6b5bfa7edfdc475330ac_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-07d04e0df51d6b5bfa7edfdc475330ac_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>汽车内饰的滑轨装置不是什么新鲜事儿，同时在木地板上安装滑轨，可比单独的主副驾滑轨要美观的多！只要你的大霸王能容得下两张航空座椅的宽度，依靠滑轨就能解决没有过道的问题！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-71c8dfd704342e160091f3dd68d1941d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-71c8dfd704342e160091f3dd68d1941d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-71c8dfd704342e160091f3dd68d1941d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-71c8dfd704342e160091f3dd68d1941d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d0b16399140e834081114eb275891c2b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d0b16399140e834081114eb275891c2b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d0b16399140e834081114eb275891c2b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d0b16399140e834081114eb275891c2b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>丰田普瑞维亚内饰每一处原装配置本身就不是省油的灯，加入木地板以及更为舒适的航空座椅之后，内饰更是别具一格，虽然比不上埃尔法的豪华，倒也丝毫不掉档次！</p>",

            "title": "改个车：3万改装玩具搬家工，拖挂式房车，你想要的我都有！", 
            "content": "<p>今年8月份的北京房车车展对于国内房车市场的兴荣与否有了最直观的数据反应，各大房车生产商百花齐放，百家争鸣，车展上的房车成交量与往年相比也是逐年增长，从另一方面反应了人们对于消费观和生活方式的追求有了多样化的认识，房车成为了部分人生活中必不可少的产物！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-634be12b1663205e2b9d0a96c36769be_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-634be12b1663205e2b9d0a96c36769be_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1440&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-634be12b1663205e2b9d0a96c36769be_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-634be12b1663205e2b9d0a96c36769be_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>很多人都说房车是有钱人的玩物，普通的中产阶级是望尘而莫及的，事实上，非也！之所以有这样的误解，说明许多人对于房车的多样化形式存在认识不足，少见多怪。随着汽车内饰改装的兴起，人们将房车也玩儿出了新花样！</p><p><b>今天改个车就带大家见识一辆拖挂式房车的内饰改装，由一辆玩具搬家工拖挂式内饰改装而来。</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-54e0d2b85711d5f47f261f4d71eaa831_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1440\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1440\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-54e0d2b85711d5f47f261f4d71eaa831_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ff660348c074b367e1c01db0bdd32bde_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ff660348c074b367e1c01db0bdd32bde_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>玩具搬家工拖挂式房车顾名思义，整车内饰空间并不像传统意义上的自行式房车，具有一车多用的功能，改装目的，<b>令其拥有房车应有的功能以外，还保留其托运物件的实用性，这辆车的内饰可以容纳ATV摩托车等，出门游行的不二之选！</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5d77f7639eee320a8dd213f7ea6d6ec5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5d77f7639eee320a8dd213f7ea6d6ec5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0ed1609635c5374b30ddb44333077e9c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0ed1609635c5374b30ddb44333077e9c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>卫生间，空调，冰箱，灶台，储物柜，电视机等，</b>自行式房车拥有的硬件设施，这辆拖挂式房车的改装内饰全都有，配置齐全周到，事实上这样的单面改装，设施集中也是受限于可实施性，逆变器，水箱的集中对于拖挂式房车来说是布局上最好的安排。<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-69fc9bd21ec4fe561cc72ee5d8e97498_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-69fc9bd21ec4fe561cc72ee5d8e97498_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-69fc9bd21ec4fe561cc72ee5d8e97498_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-69fc9bd21ec4fe561cc72ee5d8e97498_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-753777d99c3b67eeb1df33d82bde5363_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-753777d99c3b67eeb1df33d82bde5363_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-753777d99c3b67eeb1df33d82bde5363_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-753777d99c3b67eeb1df33d82bde5363_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>其效果我们也看到了，这样的布局真的为内饰节省了不少的空间！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-808ce68ed2f165fadaa7bdd200bcddc4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-808ce68ed2f165fadaa7bdd200bcddc4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-808ce68ed2f165fadaa7bdd200bcddc4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-808ce68ed2f165fadaa7bdd200bcddc4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9207729b98aef28161f6e344b59e8153_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9207729b98aef28161f6e344b59e8153_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9207729b98aef28161f6e344b59e8153_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9207729b98aef28161f6e344b59e8153_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这辆拖挂式房车还做了吊柜，内饰灯等，我们可以看到内饰造型木柜多处镶嵌了航空铝，硬度值较高，在开合的过程中避免磨损，还能起到装饰的作用。顶部风扇灯一体，还在吊柜处安置了条形灯，内饰效果下来是比较完美的。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f6629073c5b279aa345f65b5cd118d7a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f6629073c5b279aa345f65b5cd118d7a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：5万改装丰田酷路泽内饰，中排座椅平躺效果展示！", 
            "content": "<p><b>丰田酷路泽作为SUV中的代表型知名品牌，具有非常大的市场影响力，同时也拥有SUV普遍存在的内饰问题——座椅舒适度与空间的协调，成为内饰改装中非常大的一个需求比例。</b></p><p>西安一位丰田酷路泽主，花费五万做了内饰改装，以达到商务车的舒适以及越野车的简洁！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1ac937024434028684ca37624d1ededc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"936\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1ac937024434028684ca37624d1ededc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;936&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"936\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1ac937024434028684ca37624d1ededc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1ac937024434028684ca37624d1ededc_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这辆丰田酷路泽的改装项目主要在内饰座椅！当然，其他方面的软包也是非常重要的一环。比如，前后排座椅以及门板处的包覆，都以中排改装座椅为同一颜色，同一材质。换掉原车清新寡淡的配色，改装之后的丰田酷路泽内饰果然不同凡响！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-365af33467fc865b9b1608023d056873_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-365af33467fc865b9b1608023d056873_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-365af33467fc865b9b1608023d056873_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-365af33467fc865b9b1608023d056873_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>前排座椅包覆</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e9460c8bfd107721fef4fbf7047e57ce_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e9460c8bfd107721fef4fbf7047e57ce_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-25188a6b05a6d64dee6cc1ca09d0ea66_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-25188a6b05a6d64dee6cc1ca09d0ea66_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1bcfa206ac63c2276b605b59e73bdc28_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1bcfa206ac63c2276b605b59e73bdc28_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1440&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1bcfa206ac63c2276b605b59e73bdc28_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1bcfa206ac63c2276b605b59e73bdc28_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>两个座椅之间的过道</b>不仅仅是丰田酷路泽这样的SUV才有的烦恼，许多中大型商务车甚至都有这样解决不了的难题，过道空间要是没有留够，那后排上客的时候就很尴尬了，而本次改装效果，我们可以看到，中排过道还是非常给力的，第三排上客再也不用担心这样的问题！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-826f48ac7415c9292f198b9af5b5d95d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1440\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-826f48ac7415c9292f198b9af5b5d95d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：5万改装别克GL8内饰，小小的改变内饰会发生怎样的变化？", 
            "content": "<p></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d4ae07ca758fb3e6710620ee53b50f9d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d4ae07ca758fb3e6710620ee53b50f9d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d4ae07ca758fb3e6710620ee53b50f9d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d4ae07ca758fb3e6710620ee53b50f9d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>别克GL8作为家用版常见MPV，其内饰改装需求群体最为庞大！在小编看来，这款MPV改装需求之所以名列同款车型前列，无非两种原因：</p><p>1、<b>其销量在同款车型中除去五菱宏光，以别克GL8为最，消费者群体基数庞大；</b></p><p>2、<b>别克虽然有”完美MPV“的美誉，但是真正用作商务接待来讲，即便最高配别克GL8也不够上档次，内饰空间还是比不上奔驰商务，所以别克GL8低配版销量远高于高配！人们往往会以内饰改装来弥补低配和高配之间的差距！</b></p><p>那么，要想一辆别克GL8低配版秒变旗舰版，都需要哪些配置上面的改装呢？西安五万改装别克GL828T案例，小小的改变内饰会发生怎样的变化呢？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f709f13954b1422869029af45e9047b9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"520\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f709f13954b1422869029af45e9047b9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;915&#39; height=&#39;520&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"520\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f709f13954b1422869029af45e9047b9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f709f13954b1422869029af45e9047b9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>1.内饰改装中央扶手</b>是别克GL8必改项目，就一个多功能的中央扶手对于一辆车的内饰提升效果不言而喻，是使其区别于五菱宏光最直观的配置之一。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ecf5efd05bb347b1a739912e1ed5cdfe_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"520\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ecf5efd05bb347b1a739912e1ed5cdfe_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;915&#39; height=&#39;520&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"520\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ecf5efd05bb347b1a739912e1ed5cdfe_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ecf5efd05bb347b1a739912e1ed5cdfe_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3218726faa0b99bb5908301aa5886346_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"520\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3218726faa0b99bb5908301aa5886346_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;915&#39; height=&#39;520&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"520\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3218726faa0b99bb5908301aa5886346_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3218726faa0b99bb5908301aa5886346_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>此款中央扶手无论是从外观还是功能方面都比原车配置要好很多，内置冰箱，USB接口，双杯托设置是最实用的一款，虽然称不上豪华，但是绝对当得起实惠！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-01194e4d95509df8fd0baabfd084b94e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"520\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-01194e4d95509df8fd0baabfd084b94e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;915&#39; height=&#39;520&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"520\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-01194e4d95509df8fd0baabfd084b94e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-01194e4d95509df8fd0baabfd084b94e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>2.<b>迈巴赫九宫格顶灯！</b>拥有5色光线变化的九宫格顶灯安装是不少别克GL8改装车主的最爱，内饰照明效果一流，最重要的是作为家用版来讲，这样的灯光变化效果实在令人惊艳，和最爱的人一起同坐一辆别克GL8，在灯光氛围的衬托下，何其的浪漫。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8e785081e03441c8c7ffdee7cfccfdb4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"520\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8e785081e03441c8c7ffdee7cfccfdb4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;915&#39; height=&#39;520&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"520\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8e785081e03441c8c7ffdee7cfccfdb4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8e785081e03441c8c7ffdee7cfccfdb4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>3.<b>木地板改装</b>，说实话，低配别克GL8改木地板之前的底盘造型，还不如五菱宏光，如此内饰根本配不上别克GL8的外观，这辆车的底盘改装木地板采用柚木材质，防裂变，防水性能等非常不错！舒适方便清理，实用还美观。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ccb90c4461ae3934618a8648adb7eace_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"520\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ccb90c4461ae3934618a8648adb7eace_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;915&#39; height=&#39;520&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"520\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ccb90c4461ae3934618a8648adb7eace_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ccb90c4461ae3934618a8648adb7eace_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>4.<b>灯光脚踏。</b>别克GL828T版最常改的就是迎宾脚踏，内饰的脚踏的高档程度直接影响别克GL8内饰的档次感，这款不锈钢迎宾脚踏在市面上是非常流行的一款，氛围灯一起，连接内饰都能拥有浪漫光景！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0f4007e2064c797ca210a5e8c9af7886_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"520\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0f4007e2064c797ca210a5e8c9af7886_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;915&#39; height=&#39;520&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"915\" data-rawheight=\"520\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"915\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0f4007e2064c797ca210a5e8c9af7886_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0f4007e2064c797ca210a5e8c9af7886_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>5.<b>航空座椅。</b>这款航空座椅为老款，应车主要求，改装效果还是不错的。无论从舒适度，还是美观度，在原车的档次上提升不止一个level。</p>",
