            "title": "改个车：5万改装奔驰威霆内饰，快来看看都包括了什么？", 
            "content": "<p>内饰改装对于大多数威霆车主来说是非常有必要的！空有大气的外观，和响亮的品牌名气有时候和空有一身美丽的皮囊，而没有内涵的美女是一样的！因此，做个内饰改装，使其符合高端商务车定位，成为众望所归！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2f67748975800af52c2158829b0ea699_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2f67748975800af52c2158829b0ea699_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2f67748975800af52c2158829b0ea699_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2f67748975800af52c2158829b0ea699_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>小编搜罗了改装市场上奔驰威霆内饰的案例，并咨询了部分奔驰威霆车主对于内饰改装的看法和预算！</p><p>其中预算5万左右进行内饰改装的车主还真不少，那么这样的预算，在内饰改装市场上都包含了哪些项目，我们就以这位西安车主的改装威霆商务车为例，一起来看一下吧！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c1eedbcb56fb263c89295fd30bc183a0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c1eedbcb56fb263c89295fd30bc183a0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c1eedbcb56fb263c89295fd30bc183a0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c1eedbcb56fb263c89295fd30bc183a0_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>门板</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fa820e07899236f3bddfe777fd517ceb_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fa820e07899236f3bddfe777fd517ceb_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fa820e07899236f3bddfe777fd517ceb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fa820e07899236f3bddfe777fd517ceb_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>方向盘</p><p>1，为了使内饰看上去美观大气上档次，这辆奔驰威霆在门板处和方向盘处加入了显档次的桃木件装饰，握感更加舒适，耐磨性更强！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ae72907a9e5fef56afa351f967dd06c5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ae72907a9e5fef56afa351f967dd06c5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ae72907a9e5fef56afa351f967dd06c5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ae72907a9e5fef56afa351f967dd06c5_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-61e662705978f875adbceb5f32ed33ac_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-61e662705978f875adbceb5f32ed33ac_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-61e662705978f875adbceb5f32ed33ac_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-61e662705978f875adbceb5f32ed33ac_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>航空座椅</p><p>2，内饰添加了两张航空座椅，功能性极强，加长版的奔驰威霆内饰空间可以说非常宽裕，加上大块头的航空座椅，丝毫都不觉得拥挤。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-16865ecfd618502d8fdb08887351777a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-16865ecfd618502d8fdb08887351777a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-16865ecfd618502d8fdb08887351777a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-16865ecfd618502d8fdb08887351777a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>3，迈巴赫顶灯，内饰灯光改造是很多大型商务车的必做项目，这辆奔驰威霆做了12宫格的内饰灯光改装，自带氛围灯效果，灯光变换开启之后，浪漫非常！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-01ac89c1bc4cbdd17b075669a39afe37_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-01ac89c1bc4cbdd17b075669a39afe37_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-01ac89c1bc4cbdd17b075669a39afe37_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-01ac89c1bc4cbdd17b075669a39afe37_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>4，遮光帘打造，现下不允许在玻璃上贴能见度比较低的遮光膜，但是作为商务车想保护内饰的私密性，那窗帘是必不可少的了！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a23a1e75cc4fffb7d116e4e84c618400_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a23a1e75cc4fffb7d116e4e84c618400_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a23a1e75cc4fffb7d116e4e84c618400_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a23a1e75cc4fffb7d116e4e84c618400_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>5，木地板改装，底盘木地板铺覆，加上同款手工脚踏制作，成就舒适的乘坐体验！<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f058604f65170476105214dd146b9332_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f058604f65170476105214dd146b9332_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f058604f65170476105214dd146b9332_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f058604f65170476105214dd146b9332_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>6，内饰功能添加，在祝福驾驶的后排位置安装了小桌板，以方便中排位置的乘客可以放置小物件。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9def271b8bfbab6ca6f47c6a99aefb7f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9def271b8bfbab6ca6f47c6a99aefb7f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9def271b8bfbab6ca6f47c6a99aefb7f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9def271b8bfbab6ca6f47c6a99aefb7f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>7，中央扶手，手工定制中央扶手进行包覆，将两个杯槽拓展为前后共四个，后方空出暗格箱，可以放置水壶，考虑到烧水问题，在中央扶手的后还有USB接口</p>",

            "title": "国产大通房车长轴版，GGC只改装了5个配置，舒适感提升了两倍！", 
            "content": "<p>国产房车发展到现在，市场需求有了明显的起色，也促进了国产房车的生产，从性能和内饰上面有了质的飞跃，每次看房车展的时候，你会发现，人流量最多的展区绝对是进口的房车展区。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-019c3634c68c6b86baf9bd2295b8c7d2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-019c3634c68c6b86baf9bd2295b8c7d2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-019c3634c68c6b86baf9bd2295b8c7d2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-019c3634c68c6b86baf9bd2295b8c7d2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>现下，国产B型和C型的自动式房车是销量最多，也是最实际的。而在房车使用上，消费者对于内饰舒适度的要求也是近乎苛刻，特别是见识过国外豪华套餐式的内饰装潢，每个房车发烧友都赞不绝口。</p><p>可是小伙伴们，国产房车车型虽然单一，但是对比之下，还是有不少做得不错的，小编这次为大家带来的是国产大通B型房车的内饰案例。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-44435be0ea3a553f0929b28ca178e036_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-44435be0ea3a553f0929b28ca178e036_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-44435be0ea3a553f0929b28ca178e036_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-44435be0ea3a553f0929b28ca178e036_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>细分下来，这辆国产大通B型房车加长版的内饰改装可以分为５大板块！卫生间，厨房吧台，双人床，双人座椅，行政桌！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a307af99441c49480a2737cac6a5e3cf_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1430\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a307af99441c49480a2737cac6a5e3cf_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;1430&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1430\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a307af99441c49480a2737cac6a5e3cf_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a307af99441c49480a2737cac6a5e3cf_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>平面展示图</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3806dd2cbff45a29112e30dc57ab0bc1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3806dd2cbff45a29112e30dc57ab0bc1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3806dd2cbff45a29112e30dc57ab0bc1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3806dd2cbff45a29112e30dc57ab0bc1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>双人床</p><p>一、大通B型房车的床位大多是以横切的形式出现，所以在内饰改装的时候，并没有在这一布局上面别出心裁，因为是加长版，所以在横切床上尽可能地拓展其宽度，可以满足两人共躺！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6cb6c4291d48f129b5b3e5322b1ff2d7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6cb6c4291d48f129b5b3e5322b1ff2d7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6cb6c4291d48f129b5b3e5322b1ff2d7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6cb6c4291d48f129b5b3e5322b1ff2d7_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>厨房吧台区域</p><p>二、车门的左手边设计了内置厨房吧台，原车外饰功能自带灶台，可以在外面进行野营，遇上雨雪天无法外出的情况下，在内饰就能完成简单的烹饪。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-042e980297f1788716cbc666e3b98791_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-042e980297f1788716cbc666e3b98791_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-042e980297f1788716cbc666e3b98791_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-042e980297f1788716cbc666e3b98791_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>微厨房设计</p><p>三、厨房位置进行巧妙的复合柜台设计之后，可以将安置更多的功能性配置，比如说，一侧可以放置电冰箱，食物储存箱，厨房台面下格可安防暗格，抽屉。<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dde191f14c287d4028a2377f993f77ac_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dde191f14c287d4028a2377f993f77ac_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dde191f14c287d4028a2377f993f77ac_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dde191f14c287d4028a2377f993f77ac_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>卫生间内部展示</p><p>四、卫生间设计在厨房吧台的同一侧，与横切床毗邻，所以内饰空间不会如C型房车那般。但是该有功能用途却一样不少！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066da173e50a309d2517702fd2223f44_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066da173e50a309d2517702fd2223f44_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066da173e50a309d2517702fd2223f44_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066da173e50a309d2517702fd2223f44_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>客厅位置</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c0e2d50b0a2e5cc5b41e62fcfa80d8c5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c0e2d50b0a2e5cc5b41e62fcfa80d8c5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c0e2d50b0a2e5cc5b41e62fcfa80d8c5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c0e2d50b0a2e5cc5b41e62fcfa80d8c5_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>航空座椅对卡座</p><p>五、大通房车长轴版的内饰空间确实富足，一般的B型房车满足不了的对卡座形式，在这辆车里却可以进行这样的布局，在宽度上我们可以看到卫生间和对卡座椅几乎没有留下空隙，这就是B型房车唯一的缺点。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-135b936f86d3aad6fb150025236ec52c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-135b936f86d3aad6fb150025236ec52c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-135b936f86d3aad6fb150025236ec52c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-135b936f86d3aad6fb150025236ec52c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>不可否认的是，这辆国产大通B型房车的内饰改装效果还是非常具有情调的。其驾驶体验舒适度最起码在原有基础上翻了两倍不止，功能性更是不输给C型房车</p>",

            "title": "GGC大通B型房车改装，后置床设计，卫生间，厨房一应俱全的布局！", 
            "content": "<p>大通为底盘的改装房车在目前改装市场大火！小型而便捷的操作手感，停车位也比较方便，成为国内房车市场上的新宠儿，但是大通B型房车的内饰空间比较小，有时候可能装不下各位车主想要的配置。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4aaa4657ab6f3e6465d67af899c39e45_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4aaa4657ab6f3e6465d67af899c39e45_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4aaa4657ab6f3e6465d67af899c39e45_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4aaa4657ab6f3e6465d67af899c39e45_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>事实上，一个B型房车的内饰配置不宜过多，不过基于各位房车发烧友对于房车的配置幻想，小编只能说：只要内饰布局对了，只有你想不到，没有B型房车做不到的！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9fcdd73c436e551bf147a2fa1b9355a8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9fcdd73c436e551bf147a2fa1b9355a8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;635&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b6540ddd4b64580fe4f00233760a58ab_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b6540ddd4b64580fe4f00233760a58ab_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>左：中排床模拟 右：后视角配置展示</p><p>大通房车中排配置使用情况：</p><p>内饰除去客厅以外，你想要的卫生间，厨房，组合柜等配置也可以一应俱全！中排的连坐沙发加座椅形式，非常方便得可以在中排位置进行一个组合床，与后切床一起在内部形成两个横切床！</p><p>当然，你想要的卫生间，在连排沙发后方的位置，可以打出1.5平米的空间来，安置一个卫生间！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b46c219ddbf43dbef0dddfb3be2fdc24_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b46c219ddbf43dbef0dddfb3be2fdc24_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;635&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8c47e22423010e395bb7c30da76157eb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8c47e22423010e395bb7c30da76157eb_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>总控屏</p><p>一个合格的房车，水箱和电箱的供给非常重要！在厨房背面有一个总控制屏，控制屏按钮的个数，有时候决定了你房车的功能性，而这辆大通B型房车的控制屏上有总开关，顶灯，阅读灯，外部灯带，独立水暖，客厅暖风挡和热水。</p><p>几乎C型房车能够满足你的，这辆大通B型房车也可以！</p>",

            "upvote": 0, 
            "title": "改个车：丰田考斯特改装，内饰别有洞天，当之无愧的“陆上公务舱”！", 
            "content": "<p>素有“陆上公务舱”之称的丰田考斯特，外观低调不张扬，成为许多公务人士的会议座驾。</p><p>许多单位都配有一辆丰田考斯特，它常常是以公务出行，商务接待等面貌视人，这样的丰田考斯特在内饰上面的要求就非常高了，所以在改装市场上，也是常常出现丰田考斯特的身影。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc7045bcaa13b299eb3e18d85328b5ca_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"751\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc7045bcaa13b299eb3e18d85328b5ca_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;751&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"751\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc7045bcaa13b299eb3e18d85328b5ca_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc7045bcaa13b299eb3e18d85328b5ca_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>本案中为大家带来的就是丰田考斯特13座设计，做了内饰升级的丰田考斯特，才拥有商务车该有的品质和形象！</p><p>1.乘客舱后排布局以2+3+4的座椅布局方式呈现，所以承载量相对于商务车来说是有很大优势的，且不至于被称作“客车”来对待！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3d36ab9ff5de66f928b8a8314c15bdca_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"751\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3d36ab9ff5de66f928b8a8314c15bdca_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;751&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"751\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3d36ab9ff5de66f928b8a8314c15bdca_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3d36ab9ff5de66f928b8a8314c15bdca_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>2.上车的对门是汇报席，多功能办公桌是许多常规MPV商务所不能做到的。所以这是丰田考斯特作为商务车的优势所在，内部空间有很大的可塑性！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e9ddda4f98051278b75ed26f0694938e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"749\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e9ddda4f98051278b75ed26f0694938e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;749&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"749\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e9ddda4f98051278b75ed26f0694938e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e9ddda4f98051278b75ed26f0694938e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>单人汇报席</p><p>3.办公桌前放置了一张纳帕真皮包覆的单人椅，与后排座位形成面对面的单人汇报席。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-73322ad67974eb977d586a913901954b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"751\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-73322ad67974eb977d586a913901954b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;751&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"751\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-73322ad67974eb977d586a913901954b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-73322ad67974eb977d586a913901954b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>4.全车座椅采用纳帕真皮包覆，兼具舒适触感和高档美观的质感！作为商务接待是非常体面的改装项目！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d99e0619331c0c5f1c9ffb9f484f726f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"751\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d99e0619331c0c5f1c9ffb9f484f726f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "content": "<p>Hello各位车友们好，这里是改个车GGC。如果你也有一辆短轴中顶的大通V80想要改装房车，又不知道怎么将其进行内饰布局，才能满足自己的旅行需求，甚至和C型房车配置所媲美！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4aaa4657ab6f3e6465d67af899c39e45_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4aaa4657ab6f3e6465d67af899c39e45_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：5万改装高顶威霆，内饰究竟能做到什么样子？", 
            "content": "<p>奔驰威霆作为商务车来说是当之无愧的王中之王！内饰空间当真霸气！所以大多数车主在进行内饰改装的时候，对奔驰威霆内饰的期望值还是很高的。下面小编为大家简绍的是5万改装的高顶威霆，内饰究竟能做到什么样子？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9307fdd2752e61776549ed13a6c8df28_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9307fdd2752e61776549ed13a6c8df28_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9307fdd2752e61776549ed13a6c8df28_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9307fdd2752e61776549ed13a6c8df28_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>奔驰威霆内饰空间虽然很大，但是做高端商务内饰，座位数还是需要控制一下，本案中，在内饰添加了隔断，将内饰分为2+4的座椅布局，驾驶室2座，隔断后舱4座！下面我们主要来看一下商业接待区，也就是隔断后区位置。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0cb867b64788271b73ab9421e6c15378_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0cb867b64788271b73ab9421e6c15378_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0cb867b64788271b73ab9421e6c15378_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0cb867b64788271b73ab9421e6c15378_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>后区位置连坐沙发，可前后移动也可平放，正真的坐躺两用，后座车壁处改装侧壁储物柜，内置USB插口，还能轻松收纳小物件，符合人体工学设计，真正享受舒适实用的奢华内饰配置！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9307fdd2752e61776549ed13a6c8df28_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9307fdd2752e61776549ed13a6c8df28_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9307fdd2752e61776549ed13a6c8df28_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9307fdd2752e61776549ed13a6c8df28_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>奔驰威霆内饰宽度的影响下，侧壁储物柜的宽度也非常的理想，储物柜上方利用桃木件安装窗台，带有杯托，放置水杯，手机等随身携带物品。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-074ec5d4c4348341c325eea06af3d294_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-074ec5d4c4348341c325eea06af3d294_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-074ec5d4c4348341c325eea06af3d294_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-074ec5d4c4348341c325eea06af3d294_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>隔断处反向座椅，可调节伸缩，中间带有单独的中央扶手，可满足四人面对面的座谈环境！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1972939573d6358a10ba5515d001cd94_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1972939573d6358a10ba5515d001cd94_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1972939573d6358a10ba5515d001cd94_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1972939573d6358a10ba5515d001cd94_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>侧壁储物柜的功能处各有还有隐藏式小桌板，作为商务车来说，敌人座谈环境会更加的理想。</p><p>隔断处带有升降电视，双喇叭，立体音效非常棒！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e61eea749f3a411c3c06154fa7b90e9b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e61eea749f3a411c3c06154fa7b90e9b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e61eea749f3a411c3c06154fa7b90e9b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e61eea749f3a411c3c06154fa7b90e9b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>顶灯个性化装饰与天窗相得益彰！营造出奢华高端商务内饰！</p>",

            "title": "GGC教你福特全顺高顶内饰如何布局？打造舒适且高档B型房车！", 
            "content": "<p>福特全顺这款车型运用领域非常广，商务接待，保姆车，房车它都能驾驭，只要开不坏，车主可以根据内饰的配置和修改来决定这款车的用途！改装市场需求比较大的是福特全顺改装高端商务。</p><p>但是小编发现将其进行房车内饰改装的车主也不少。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2d18c97891b6c9a0d03e979472ff6882_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2d18c97891b6c9a0d03e979472ff6882_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2d18c97891b6c9a0d03e979472ff6882_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2d18c97891b6c9a0d03e979472ff6882_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>那么，福特全顺这款B型房车如何进行内饰布局，满足房车需求的同时，打造高档内饰呢？一起来看一下下面这款案例！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-70ae58250111f71293c83a3d03449abb_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-70ae58250111f71293c83a3d03449abb_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-70ae58250111f71293c83a3d03449abb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-70ae58250111f71293c83a3d03449abb_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>配置分配图</p><p>从内饰分配图中我们可以看出，这样的内饰布局丝毫不输C型房车，C型房车该有的配置它一个不少。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0d83ca78dcb47ae0bee5cc99e9935f85_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0d83ca78dcb47ae0bee5cc99e9935f85_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0d83ca78dcb47ae0bee5cc99e9935f85_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0d83ca78dcb47ae0bee5cc99e9935f85_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>1.厕所！很多B型改装的房车里面由于空间的有限，厕所这个配置是没有的，所以在横切床和中座之间安装卫生间是一次大胆而精彩的尝试！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-929ca86e7db161f4133d8e6832c994f4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-929ca86e7db161f4133d8e6832c994f4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-929ca86e7db161f4133d8e6832c994f4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-929ca86e7db161f4133d8e6832c994f4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>2.客厅。如果说非要在你的福特全顺房车里面要求有一个可以座谈的“客厅”，不妨试试这样进行房车布局，就算实现不了对卡座形式，也可以将驾驶室的主副驾驶进行旋转式改装！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-81a56a0c0b3ccb3786a703fb709765f6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-81a56a0c0b3ccb3786a703fb709765f6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-81a56a0c0b3ccb3786a703fb709765f6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-81a56a0c0b3ccb3786a703fb709765f6_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>3.娱乐设备。一般福特全顺改装商务车的时候都会在驾驶室和后车室增加隔断，但是如果改装房车的话，就满足不了隔断的空间，这样一来许多车主想在内饰做一个娱乐化装置就显得没有地方了，这时候建议可以安装吸顶电视，或者直接将这项配置省掉，因为大多数时候，满足你的是手机。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1a986d063b1ebe2a14329e501ab7ea4c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1a986d063b1ebe2a14329e501ab7ea4c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1a986d063b1ebe2a14329e501ab7ea4c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1a986d063b1ebe2a14329e501ab7ea4c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>4.冰箱，如果你的房车里面放不下一个冰箱，那它一定不是一个合格的房车，当然，多大的房车放多大的冰箱，在福特全顺B型房车里面像这样的放置位置，其实足够了！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e6e8f6499c16986a4155c87a6411d587_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e6e8f6499c16986a4155c87a6411d587_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e6e8f6499c16986a4155c87a6411d587_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e6e8f6499c16986a4155c87a6411d587_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>5.厨房，你可以想象长途旅行过程中，拥有这样一个“厨房”能带来多大的便利，柜台上方平面电磁炉，带盖水槽加折叠水龙头用来洗水果之类的，方便安全还使用，遇上阴雨天，不用出车门也能解决吃喝问题！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-95a9db02c28a7a9ae48b4b31f63fd471_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-95a9db02c28a7a9ae48b4b31f63fd471_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-95a9db02c28a7a9ae48b4b31f63fd471_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-95a9db02c28a7a9ae48b4b31f63fd471_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>6.床位！横切床的设计，虽然比不上C型房车床位面积大，但是节约了其他设备的空间，同时，紧靠后车门，下方做成储物间，存放物品，拿取也比较方便！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fe88abd940f82f0aa8f0043f04c58368_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fe88abd940f82f0aa8f0043f04c58368_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fe88abd940f82f0aa8f0043f04c58368_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fe88abd940f82f0aa8f0043f04c58368_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>所以小伙伴们学会了吗，像福特全顺这样的B型房车内饰改装，其实还是有不少容量和空间的</p>",

            "title": "改个车：开了5年的丰田海狮！车主“突发奇想”做改装，效果堪比喜提新车！", 
            "content": "<p>本案中小编来聊聊内饰改装对于一辆旧车的影响力！<br/>以丰田海狮为例，很多人心中都有一辆开不坏的神车，丰田海狮这款商旅车就是其中的佼佼者！一位西安车主买的丰田海狮已经开了5年，说起来算是老车，除去车皮小面积刮伤，内饰老旧，其他部件基本上没有什么折旧的地方！<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-25ad150e923ff2e278d62b48c9fcb21b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-25ad150e923ff2e278d62b48c9fcb21b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-25ad150e923ff2e278d62b48c9fcb21b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-25ad150e923ff2e278d62b48c9fcb21b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/>这位西安车主表示：本打算换一辆新车，将这辆丰田海狮折旧卖出去，但是身边有朋友不久前将自己的商务车做了一个内饰改装，内饰效果似乎比原车上档次很多，于是心一痒痒就也想为自己的丰田海狮做个内饰上的升级。<br/>本案中记录了这辆丰田海狮从拆卸到完装的部分。<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6880dddb270a263a951e654871850845_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6880dddb270a263a951e654871850845_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6880dddb270a263a951e654871850845_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6880dddb270a263a951e654871850845_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/>木地板铺装<br/>1.首先，内饰拆装之后几乎只剩下了车皮，先从底盘改装开始，使用柚木木材，做了个木地板的改装，上车之后的踩踏舒适感更强！看上去非常的清目！<br/><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6bec614fb7893bf0a903c64e122696e1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6bec614fb7893bf0a903c64e122696e1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6bec614fb7893bf0a903c64e122696e1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6bec614fb7893bf0a903c64e122696e1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/>车壁处造型<br/>2.在车皮框架上订做了木板造型，掏出了比较实用的节点，准备进行包覆！<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7b6d8be7afd44cbf3e0413b04bb79511_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7b6d8be7afd44cbf3e0413b04bb79511_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7b6d8be7afd44cbf3e0413b04bb79511_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7b6d8be7afd44cbf3e0413b04bb79511_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/>吧台<br/>3.在驾驶室和后车室做了个造型吧台隔断，内置包括茶壶箱，抽屉等储物空间！<br/><b>做完这些功能性的软装添加，就是内饰的包覆情况！</b><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9c6b488cbab6521d3137eac654ee1279_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9c6b488cbab6521d3137eac654ee1279_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9c6b488cbab6521d3137eac654ee1279_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9c6b488cbab6521d3137eac654ee1279_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><br/>后车室格局<br/>内饰包覆与航空座椅包覆皮质一致！所以内饰整体感会让这辆丰田海狮看上去更加的高级！<br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-15be9fb62708328d284c12bb6d0386b7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-15be9fb62708328d284c12bb6d0386b7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：本田艾力绅改装木地板，前后对比反差大！确定是一辆车？", 
            "content": "<p>本田艾力绅内饰改装是常有的事儿，西安一位车主喜提本田艾力绅，不满内饰配置，做了一个内饰改装，本案记录了这辆本田艾力绅的内饰改装变化过程。前后变化反差到底有多大？一起来看一下吧！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f4da5e8f389483bd994a68da6e0dc7f6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f4da5e8f389483bd994a68da6e0dc7f6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f4da5e8f389483bd994a68da6e0dc7f6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f4da5e8f389483bd994a68da6e0dc7f6_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>本田艾力绅这款车的动力性能是不错的，说起内饰的包覆以及座椅真的一言难尽，但是由于预算有限，艾力绅车主选择性地做了一些改装。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-61db35d54f0318f3421c2d1a99c670b0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-61db35d54f0318f3421c2d1a99c670b0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-61db35d54f0318f3421c2d1a99c670b0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-61db35d54f0318f3421c2d1a99c670b0_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>原车底盘的包覆情况</p><p>首先是底盘，车主抛弃了原车的底盘包覆，做了隔音和止震之后，决定在底盘内饰做一个大换血！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8284e93bec1085e5fa6c8da207082099_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8284e93bec1085e5fa6c8da207082099_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8284e93bec1085e5fa6c8da207082099_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8284e93bec1085e5fa6c8da207082099_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>拆装之后的底盘</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d663a7aad06c0349e490920761c9c92a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d663a7aad06c0349e490920761c9c92a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d663a7aad06c0349e490920761c9c92a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d663a7aad06c0349e490920761c9c92a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>拆装之后的底盘</p><p>底盘进行座椅拆卸，甚至连垫子都被揭掉。可以看到本田艾力绅的底盘情况，在同类型车里面，虽然“个头”有点儿矮，但是宽度一点儿也不输阵！将隔音棉和止震板添加之后，就开始了木地板的拼接！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4a4211a605b13d908a756590fca5a72e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4a4211a605b13d908a756590fca5a72e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4a4211a605b13d908a756590fca5a72e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4a4211a605b13d908a756590fca5a72e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>当然，在进行木地板拼接之前，需要进行木地板的打底！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7871b304addbb1674259cdd29bc84fb8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7871b304addbb1674259cdd29bc84fb8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;1333&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7871b304addbb1674259cdd29bc84fb8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7871b304addbb1674259cdd29bc84fb8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>全部完成之后，在木地板上面添加了滑轨，以便座椅加上之后可以进行前后的移动！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9895ca773b4483cbf34ee97c387dc631_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9895ca773b4483cbf34ee97c387dc631_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9895ca773b4483cbf34ee97c387dc631_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9895ca773b4483cbf34ee97c387dc631_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>木地板脚踏</p><p>地板制作完成之后，在内饰添加了木地板的脚踏，这样的套件看上去使得内饰拥有了完整度！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7c75375b0909a1217ba5b3c1e1a9c0fd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7c75375b0909a1217ba5b3c1e1a9c0fd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7c75375b0909a1217ba5b3c1e1a9c0fd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7c75375b0909a1217ba5b3c1e1a9c0fd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>中排效果</p><p>改了木地板之后，西安车主并没有换掉原车的座椅，不过整体的效果并灭有受到影响，整个内饰看上去清新雅致不少！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-040518610ebfa1127b48bf852302c6ba_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-040518610ebfa1127b48bf852302c6ba_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;1333&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-040518610ebfa1127b48bf852302c6ba_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-040518610ebfa1127b48bf852302c6ba_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>全车内饰图</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c4e91dfb975c071c1ed9e120a95d0565_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c4e91dfb975c071c1ed9e120a95d0565_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c4e91dfb975c071c1ed9e120a95d0565_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c4e91dfb975c071c1ed9e120a95d0565_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>电动中门</p><p>当然，除去木地板的改装效果呈现之外，本田艾力绅车主还为自己的车安装了电动中门，作为家用来说，这一配置应该是全车最大的亮点了！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cfdbaabe8fe6e8b6ae077656787c1c66_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cfdbaabe8fe6e8b6ae077656787c1c66_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cfdbaabe8fe6e8b6ae077656787c1c66_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-cfdbaabe8fe6e8b6ae077656787c1c66_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>吸顶屏幕</p><p>在本田艾力绅车内安置吸顶屏也是非常实用的一个配置，原本简陋的内饰里终于有了电子设备。对提升内饰的档次感起到了至关重要的作用！</p><p>不得不说，这辆本田艾力绅内饰改装前后的变化太大！</p>",

            "title": "改个车：百万奢华内饰，怪不得它是奔驰凯伦宾威，贫穷限制了我的想象！", 
            "content": "<p></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-489b8c43c739005d5f6dad225fa95b3e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"634\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-489b8c43c739005d5f6dad225fa95b3e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;634&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"634\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-489b8c43c739005d5f6dad225fa95b3e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-489b8c43c739005d5f6dad225fa95b3e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>凯伦宾威这款房车在国内的销量一直以来名列前茅。以宇通、奔驰等底盘生产的而来的房车，也是各有各的魅力，而凯伦宾威内饰的布局可以说是大同小异的。</p><p>所以小编本案中为大家展示的是一款奔驰凯伦宾威内饰装潢的豪华，谁说买不起就不能涨涨见识吗？<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3da0b163281dc11481d07fe9ec3aa8f9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3da0b163281dc11481d07fe9ec3aa8f9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;635&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3da0b163281dc11481d07fe9ec3aa8f9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3da0b163281dc11481d07fe9ec3aa8f9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>以奔驰为底盘的凯伦宾威似乎在宽度上要比大通为底盘的房车要窄一点儿，而在高度上却比其略高，值得一提的是，这款房车的妙处就在车体的构架，一侧得以延申，所以内饰的空间事实上是要比大通凯伦宾威要宽敞的！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1f123b80acc834f2476b1fb0eb13f562_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"638\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1f123b80acc834f2476b1fb0eb13f562_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;638&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"638\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1f123b80acc834f2476b1fb0eb13f562_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1f123b80acc834f2476b1fb0eb13f562_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>前车位置</p><p>身处内饰，你也一定会被这样奢华的内饰装潢所惊艳。奔驰凯伦宾威是车，更像房！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-22e522ab34882bf8f427191567f83441_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"634\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-22e522ab34882bf8f427191567f83441_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;634&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"634\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-22e522ab34882bf8f427191567f83441_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-22e522ab34882bf8f427191567f83441_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>额头处</p><p>C型房车特有的额头，很多人对于带有额头的房车望而却步，认为不是非常安全，确实！C型房车不适合在市区里开，遇上限高，一不小心就会被“爆头”！但是，这样的额头也是非常迷人的，额头处带有天窗，下面就是床铺，遇上天气好的时候，这个位置是最惬意的！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-52126cbbaffcabff334001eefe417228_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"638\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-52126cbbaffcabff334001eefe417228_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;638&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"638\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-52126cbbaffcabff334001eefe417228_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-52126cbbaffcabff334001eefe417228_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>客厅位置</p><p>车体构架有了延申，整个内饰的可活动空间就大了许多！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-16289a0bdc115c21845c5e8f9cf3f501_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"638\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-16289a0bdc115c21845c5e8f9cf3f501_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;634&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"634\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-58ef46de6eb35c8ee9f8c752275a1d6e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-58ef46de6eb35c8ee9f8c752275a1d6e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>灶台台面</p><p>进口电磁炉，翻盖水池，加折叠水龙头，标准化的微型厨房配置！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f4498ef242e5b938c8afd69d1460c655_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"638\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f4498ef242e5b938c8afd69d1460c655_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;638&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"638\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f4498ef242e5b938c8afd69d1460c655_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f4498ef242e5b938c8afd69d1460c655_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>对卡座式客厅</p><p>真皮对卡座沙发，满满的欧式风格客厅！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ddc381bdecf0a14abc3e8fe23a7c7d00_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"634\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ddc381bdecf0a14abc3e8fe23a7c7d00_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;634&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"634\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ddc381bdecf0a14abc3e8fe23a7c7d00_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ddc381bdecf0a14abc3e8fe23a7c7d00_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>卫生间装潢</p><p>一个C型房车的装潢档次如何，有时候取决于卫生间，一个将房车归于自己生活的人，一定会在意自己的房车卫生间状况，内饰配置中马桶，淋浴是不会缺的，可是很多房车会忽略卫生间的通风问题，而奔驰凯伦宾威在车顶处安装了排气扇！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a2865cd5548b08df46d17e6fd0f31913_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"638\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a2865cd5548b08df46d17e6fd0f31913_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "西安改个车：大众凯路威改装，7大配置展示，这才是商务车该有的样子！", 
            "content": "<p>作为商务车改装中最常见的一款车型，大众凯路威以特有的亲切之力博得了中国消费者的青睐，同时，差评也随之而来，甚至有网友评论大众旗下的商务车是“金玉其外败絮其中！”。和真正豪华的商务车没得比！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a166554a8dd4f3e4a19bf39ace02bd4a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a166554a8dd4f3e4a19bf39ace02bd4a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a166554a8dd4f3e4a19bf39ace02bd4a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a166554a8dd4f3e4a19bf39ace02bd4a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>但是像大众凯路威这款商务车，进行一个内饰改装之后？又会是什么样子呢？本案，小编就为大家带来一组大众凯路威内饰改装之后的豪华案例，告诉你，什么才是商务车该有的样子！</p><p>顾名思义，商务车多用于商务洽谈，接待客户，公司，老板阶层的消费者众多。一个体面的内饰环境是相当重要的！下面就改装7大配置展示，教你如何装扮自己的商务车！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-786c5b5f0752f9e2256757cecdb9230e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"668\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-786c5b5f0752f9e2256757cecdb9230e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;668&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"668\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-786c5b5f0752f9e2256757cecdb9230e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-786c5b5f0752f9e2256757cecdb9230e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>一、大众凯路威的驾驶室仪表台确实是一大硬伤，塑料质感太浓厚，大多数的车主在进行内饰改装的时候，会将仪表台做一个象征性的包覆，如果考虑到安全问题！可在门板处做包覆，或者给方向盘处增加一些部件，使驾驶室看上去不会单调到清汤寡水！<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8ac1fa1ceb382eb62dfebf4c17ad82c2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"665\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8ac1fa1ceb382eb62dfebf4c17ad82c2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;667&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-39ea6b892beceba91f9e237a7d7b8050_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-39ea6b892beceba91f9e237a7d7b8050_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>四、桃木件采用国际进口清漆符合ISO9001认证标准，无甲醛。运用于车壁装饰，甚至于内饰地板的全铺，奢华质感瞬间袭来！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-491f741a5eb59033cd76ad0b895a6ac4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-491f741a5eb59033cd76ad0b895a6ac4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;
