            "title": "改个车：依维柯C型房车改装，8张图告诉你什么才是国产房车该有的样子！", 
            "content": "<p>作为房车发烧友最为偏爱的一款房车，依维柯成为当仁不让的人气王！其中，C型依维柯房车由于空间大、乘坐舒适、可以装载更多的配置和储物空间而备受青睐。在改装市场上也常常会出现它的身影！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-125fe5c6dd020a7573b11c43ab335e54_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-125fe5c6dd020a7573b11c43ab335e54_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-125fe5c6dd020a7573b11c43ab335e54_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-125fe5c6dd020a7573b11c43ab335e54_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>本案中小编为大家带来的就是这款房车的内饰改装案例，考虑环保、轻质、贴心、舒适的基础上，选用最适合房车的材质，打造出了符合国人生活习惯的依维柯C型房车！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1d32796e1a90960f62be1e9a4cbb221e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1d32796e1a90960f62be1e9a4cbb221e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;635&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1d32796e1a90960f62be1e9a4cbb221e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1d32796e1a90960f62be1e9a4cbb221e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>1.C型房车特有的宽额头，为内饰提供了一个得天独厚的床位。其中床铺中间区域可以翻转，推上去就是一台电视，实用娱乐两不误！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f2c1f27e156db7afe064f1be2fd00189_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f2c1f27e156db7afe064f1be2fd00189_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;635&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f2c1f27e156db7afe064f1be2fd00189_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f2c1f27e156db7afe064f1be2fd00189_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>2.C型房车特有的对卡座形式，是房车旅行途中最为重要的设施。对卡座位置的设计正好邻着窗户，可以享受到沿途一路的好风景！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-47f2a46f890082f22dba1206c5642c9d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-47f2a46f890082f22dba1206c5642c9d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;635&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-47f2a46f890082f22dba1206c5642c9d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-47f2a46f890082f22dba1206c5642c9d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>3.同时也是多功能配置，布质坐垫，触感舒适，对卡座中间的小桌板可以升降，将桌板降下来放上垫子可形成一张小床！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9e37ae01266813138d8d507f7938836d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9e37ae01266813138d8d507f7938836d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;635&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9e37ae01266813138d8d507f7938836d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9e37ae01266813138d8d507f7938836d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>4.依维柯C型房车的宽度绝对是其他房车不能比拟的！在小编所见过的C型房车里面，很少有房车内饰可以放下衣橱，而这辆房车在横切床和对卡座的夹角位置居然可以留出立体衣橱，床头柜等！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b151a483213e63c6491e0d9180b231cb_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b151a483213e63c6491e0d9180b231cb_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;635&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b151a483213e63c6491e0d9180b231cb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b151a483213e63c6491e0d9180b231cb_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>5.这辆依维柯C型房车的内饰床设计非常的矮，而且床位面积很宽！可容纳两人休息，最重要的是，横切床下方有脚台，是非常贴心的“卧室床”设计标致！<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4a84afdd9c0632b7adf09eec743f0fd7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4a84afdd9c0632b7adf09eec743f0fd7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;635&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4a84afdd9c0632b7adf09eec743f0fd7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4a84afdd9c0632b7adf09eec743f0fd7_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>6.依维柯C型房车一个必要的内饰配置就是灶台，车门左手边配置了电磁炉，带盖水槽，折叠水龙头等厨房必备设施。出行路上遇上阴雨天，不用出车门，就可以在内饰简单地解决饭食问题！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4f4010ebaaecd876fb8a568fa4adfdd4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4f4010ebaaecd876fb8a568fa4adfdd4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;635&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4f4010ebaaecd876fb8a568fa4adfdd4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4f4010ebaaecd876fb8a568fa4adfdd4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>7.C型房车里面常备的一个配置就是卫生间，C型依维柯内饰空间自然是不能小看，在厨房和横切床的夹角处就是卫生间！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-43f3126e4e46879fc78365ebdcda833b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-43f3126e4e46879fc78365ebdcda833b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;635&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"635\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-43f3126e4e46879fc78365ebdcda833b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-43f3126e4e46879fc78365ebdcda833b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>8.卫生间最重要的就是防水，所以内饰改装的用材与其他位置的装潢大不相同！墙面，地面可以看出这辆依维柯C型房车的内饰改装是非常考究</p><p>本案中所呈现的每一个局部是对品质的精益求精，局部之和成就了经典的整体，互相映衬，相得益彰，成为一种新境界，达到1+1＞2的效果。</p>",

            "content": "<p>炎炎夏日，许多房车自驾游的朋友们也都陆续回到了自家的空调房，而这段时间却成了房车内饰改装的火热阶段！</p><p>近期，有网友咨询，凉爽的秋天即将到来之际，想结伴几个好友一起房车自驾游，那么如何能将一辆核载6人的房车进行合理布局，使其能睡下更多的人？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6a9ebb6c0192e6624ec181d48ed3f266_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6a9ebb6c0192e6624ec181d48ed3f266_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6a9ebb6c0192e6624ec181d48ed3f266_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6a9ebb6c0192e6624ec181d48ed3f266_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>小编这就为大家带来一辆核载六人的大通底盘——凯伦宾威，其内饰改装布局优势就是”床多“！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b31a61affc72ea86b6037f567568886e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b31a61affc72ea86b6037f567568886e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b31a61affc72ea86b6037f567568886e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b31a61affc72ea86b6037f567568886e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>首先，先来看看这辆房车的内部配置，各种生活设备在13平米的内饰空间里面可以说是应有尽有，不能说是包罗万象，最起码可以满足一室一厅一厨一卫的标准配置！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1bf82fa1558be80f7e6c82e5b612f9be_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1bf82fa1558be80f7e6c82e5b612f9be_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1bf82fa1558be80f7e6c82e5b612f9be_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1bf82fa1558be80f7e6c82e5b612f9be_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>如果说整个内饰可以看成一间小卧室的话，那么进入凯伦宾威房车的车门左手边就是一个厨房，组合柜台面有电磁炉设施，还有洗菜池，远途的时候，就算不方便做饭，也可以煮些方便面来吃！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fa0f3632af77c245d6decef824ece4ac_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"999\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"999\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fa0f3632af77c245d6decef824ece4ac_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;999&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"999\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"999\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fa0f3632af77c245d6decef824ece4ac_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fa0f3632af77c245d6decef824ece4ac_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>最令人意想不到的是，内饰床位布局多的情况下，这辆内饰使用面积不足13平的凯伦宾威还能腾出一间浴室的空间！马桶，淋浴一样不落！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a04028499fb0d3d4195648e4b0cd9fdc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a04028499fb0d3d4195648e4b0cd9fdc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a04028499fb0d3d4195648e4b0cd9fdc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a04028499fb0d3d4195648e4b0cd9fdc_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cade2c35d28c45cd431d49d2b8c77a18_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cade2c35d28c45cd431d49d2b8c77a18_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cade2c35d28c45cd431d49d2b8c77a18_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cade2c35d28c45cd431d49d2b8c77a18_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这辆T型凯伦宾威也没有宽大的额头，所以上方的床位是没有的。安置了一台电视，旁边还能放置路由器！</p><p>看完这些附加条件，我们来着重观摩一下这辆凯伦宾威的内饰床位布局！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4b27f109f467b052ed5e45fd9c0e7144_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4b27f109f467b052ed5e45fd9c0e7144_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4b27f109f467b052ed5e45fd9c0e7144_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4b27f109f467b052ed5e45fd9c0e7144_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>在厨房相邻的位置，改装了两张上下铺式的单人床，满足两个成年男子的身高尺寸！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9222f4549e90ebc7108fb2ef9d7336df_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9222f4549e90ebc7108fb2ef9d7336df_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9222f4549e90ebc7108fb2ef9d7336df_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9222f4549e90ebc7108fb2ef9d7336df_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>对卡座的”客厅“位置也不能放过，需要的时候，可以将其折合成一张双人床，当然了，如果你想一个人睡的话，会更加宽敞的！</p><p>由于卫生间的位置在房车的后中部位，与对卡座位置的角落留出了一个空间，做成了一个高床，下面可以用来储物，而床铺的大小可容纳一米高的孩童！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-29d27ad13aaf6ce51e2365e985b5e8f5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-29d27ad13aaf6ce51e2365e985b5e8f5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;639&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"639\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-29d27ad13aaf6ce51e2365e985b5e8f5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-29d27ad13aaf6ce51e2365e985b5e8f5_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这样一辆大通凯伦宾威房车改装布局，其实满足3-5人的全家游，一般上T型房车出游，两到三人足矣，但是6人的核载量，怎么样也不会浪费了空间不是？这样的内饰布局还满意吗？</p>",

            "upvote": 0, 
            "title": "西安改个车：奔驰V260内饰奢华装潢，看完的人都想照着这个改一辆！", 
            "content": "<p>很多人印象里奔驰商务车一直以来就以奢华著称，最起码内饰是值得称赞的。事实上大多数人买来奔驰商务车之后，会因为期望过高，而觉得不过尔尔。那么奔驰商务车的内饰较同类型的优势究竟在什么地方？</p><p>当然是内饰空间！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-17dad956212bf7a9921c99e09495f7b9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-17dad956212bf7a9921c99e09495f7b9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;598&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-17dad956212bf7a9921c99e09495f7b9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-17dad956212bf7a9921c99e09495f7b9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>就奔驰V260这款商务车来说，比起威霆内饰其实是比较小的，但是与丰田，别克商务车比起来还是要宽阔的多！这在商务车内饰改装中有很大的优势！下面一起来看一组奔驰V260内饰改装效果。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1d1d5d8eb3a572bd34d5619d8ee67fd1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1d1d5d8eb3a572bd34d5619d8ee67fd1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;598&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1d1d5d8eb3a572bd34d5619d8ee67fd1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1d1d5d8eb3a572bd34d5619d8ee67fd1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>驾驶室：驾驶室直接影响驾驶体验，美观舒适的内饰环境，会提升驾驶员的驾驶手感，其中，在门板，仪表台，操纵杆等地方利用黑白檀木进行镶嵌，装饰！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-af01e887e1fa520b354ef145d497e72b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-af01e887e1fa520b354ef145d497e72b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;598&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-af01e887e1fa520b354ef145d497e72b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-af01e887e1fa520b354ef145d497e72b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>后车厢：隔断将驾驶室与后车厢进行分离，让奔驰V260的内饰拥有一个完整的座谈环境。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0e5db26ae1ead4497be54d8a534b1b07_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0e5db26ae1ead4497be54d8a534b1b07_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;598&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0e5db26ae1ead4497be54d8a534b1b07_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0e5db26ae1ead4497be54d8a534b1b07_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>超大屏电视，在隔断处可以自由升降，让奔驰V260拥有豪华震撼的视觉盛宴。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-82e540c2c6a5700fbfa6f2a7d08d6e59_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-82e540c2c6a5700fbfa6f2a7d08d6e59_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;598&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-82e540c2c6a5700fbfa6f2a7d08d6e59_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-82e540c2c6a5700fbfa6f2a7d08d6e59_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>隔断下方做了吧台，吧台台面非常窄，因为内饰无法像奔驰威霆一样，做一个带有台面的吧台供使用，但是吧台的实用性丝毫不减，全息屏设置，可对上方电视进行点播，也可以触屏式控制内饰电源。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-857349071b46a4e5cd72a912e168586e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-857349071b46a4e5cd72a912e168586e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;598&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-857349071b46a4e5cd72a912e168586e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-857349071b46a4e5cd72a912e168586e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>下方隔断安置插孔，放置咖啡机。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-288b101f2ff50c76c3b01ba96e653e30_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-288b101f2ff50c76c3b01ba96e653e30_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "西安改个车：依维柯房车改装，核载5人的B型自动挡内饰，这样布局才够生活！", 
            "content": "<p>依维柯房车在本来就小众的的房车支流里面占有非常高的比例，本案就与这些依维柯房车拥有者，进行一次内饰布局的探讨。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-100d82a483484482a0490f316a03e821_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-100d82a483484482a0490f316a03e821_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-100d82a483484482a0490f316a03e821_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-100d82a483484482a0490f316a03e821_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>以核载5人的B型自动挡依维柯来说，如何进行内饰布局，才能令其顶着B型房车的体型，干着C型房车的事儿呢？一起来看一下这辆依维柯B型房车的内饰改装布局！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-72de5a43bc810360061fc86cbfdd788c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-72de5a43bc810360061fc86cbfdd788c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-72de5a43bc810360061fc86cbfdd788c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-72de5a43bc810360061fc86cbfdd788c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a1e98e1d8ee7673bdc6eb676f3900280_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a1e98e1d8ee7673bdc6eb676f3900280_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a1e98e1d8ee7673bdc6eb676f3900280_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a1e98e1d8ee7673bdc6eb676f3900280_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第一：座椅布局。作为一辆房车来说，核载量一般不会超过5人，所以在座椅的布局上面确实是一个难以行调和的难题。这辆依维柯房车以2+3的形式，将后座进行如上布局！以此为后方的房车布局让出更多的空间！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-434435dfe8bf83df7a64558165e1a194_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-434435dfe8bf83df7a64558165e1a194_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-434435dfe8bf83df7a64558165e1a194_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-434435dfe8bf83df7a64558165e1a194_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第二：微型厨房一体。包含上方吊柜和下方组合柜的形式，在吊柜与组合台的车壁中做了五个浅格，一开始是考虑到车里做饭可以放置调料，后来调料没怎么放，倒是成了各种零食，卫生纸之类的聚集地，不过优点就在于可以随手放，行车途中也不会担心会掉下来。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-35bfc7657c5a76e967dce2f160208115_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-35bfc7657c5a76e967dce2f160208115_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-35bfc7657c5a76e967dce2f160208115_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-35bfc7657c5a76e967dce2f160208115_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>厨房中应该有的电磁炉，洗菜池应有尽有。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-56eadfbd0fed615001881601f98a8e69_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-56eadfbd0fed615001881601f98a8e69_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-56eadfbd0fed615001881601f98a8e69_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-56eadfbd0fed615001881601f98a8e69_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>下方的柜子分为冰箱和三段抽屉式组合柜！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-62f3a10af428b96941e8085194b0bf60_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-62f3a10af428b96941e8085194b0bf60_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-62f3a10af428b96941e8085194b0bf60_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-62f3a10af428b96941e8085194b0bf60_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-708b0b137f8bc5eb5b144f47682cd566_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-708b0b137f8bc5eb5b144f47682cd566_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;1333&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-708b0b137f8bc5eb5b144f47682cd566_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-708b0b137f8bc5eb5b144f47682cd566_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第三，别以为这是一辆依维柯B型房车，就装不下大家要的卫生间！纵切床的布局可以为你想要的卫生间让出足够的空间，当然不要指望内饰空间会有自家厕所的大，但是终究可以满足你方便，梳洗的基本需求！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-17d208b8e75efdd5a240b0bafc617fca_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-17d208b8e75efdd5a240b0bafc617fca_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-17d208b8e75efdd5a240b0bafc617fca_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-17d208b8e75efdd5a240b0bafc617fca_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第四，值得一提的是上述所有的配置能够有充足的位置得以装潢，都得益于这张床的方位朝向，打破了大多数B型房车横切床的局部！<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9c1162b5c6072753bd6fc1da9c6f57f8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9c1162b5c6072753bd6fc1da9c6f57f8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9c1162b5c6072753bd6fc1da9c6f57f8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9c1162b5c6072753bd6fc1da9c6f57f8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>这样的布局，不仅能有卫生间，厨房，就连床头柜也能拥有！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c1a39fcbcfeef194bdc31d4da6e248e6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c1a39fcbcfeef194bdc31d4da6e248e6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c1a39fcbcfeef194bdc31d4da6e248e6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c1a39fcbcfeef194bdc31d4da6e248e6_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第五，整个内饰的装潢可以看出，这是一辆充满生活化的依维柯房车，所以当你看在车顶的时候，同样会被精致的顶灯设计折服！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-80c7b4b5511bc9345086d287a6748292_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-80c7b4b5511bc9345086d287a6748292_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-80c7b4b5511bc9345086d287a6748292_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-80c7b4b5511bc9345086d287a6748292_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第六，见了许多辆的房车，没有一个会在车头部位拉一个窗帘，而这辆的窗帘设计，是将驾驶座包含在内的，可见车主非常注重房车生活隐私性。</p><p>这样具有生活气息的布局和内饰装潢，实在是依维柯B型房车中难得一见的</p>",

            "content": "<p>大众凯路威在MPV市场上有着无可撼动的地位，在商务车内饰改装中，大众凯路威算是常客，但是大费周章进行大改的凯路威还真的不多，小编本案带来的大众凯路威内饰改装中，是一款为数不多的豪华内饰改装精品！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fa0cd8cb4967d1f166525b4b244edaab_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fa0cd8cb4967d1f166525b4b244edaab_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9eebfebdfec71267f4537267f77971a5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9eebfebdfec71267f4537267f77971a5_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>三，隔断处打造利用率，实用性超高的吧台。</p><ol><li>拉伸式小桌板，放置水杯，文件，小物品。</li><li>小桌板下方放置储物箱，随身携带物品均可放置！<br/></li></ol><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1ff74b0d04a291c1cb4563917fd3a4a6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1ff74b0d04a291c1cb4563917fd3a4a6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d98efe638e121823959d0ae8583907b4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d98efe638e121823959d0ae8583907b4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>四，超舒适航空座椅与沙发床打造顶级内饰乘车体验。</p><p>后舱位置严格说起来为四座，可旋转式航空座椅与连排沙发床形成四人面对面座谈形式。满足你的商务洽谈需求！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8d12f259db66a8e2a48c864bf4f02e83_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8d12f259db66a8e2a48c864bf4f02e83_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "upvote": 0, 
            "title": "改个车：福特全顺中顶改装商务车，看一辆“货车”的蜕变！", 
            "content": "<p>在汽车改装行业中，各种形形色色的车型都有，需要大改的车辆里面，福特全顺算是其中最多的一款。下面带来一辆中顶福特全顺改装商务车的案例，实拍改装现场施工过程！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-27422e547a7d0625a5c4fe9af1fe898a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-27422e547a7d0625a5c4fe9af1fe898a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-27422e547a7d0625a5c4fe9af1fe898a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-27422e547a7d0625a5c4fe9af1fe898a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>福特</p><p>第一步：福特全顺中顶内饰拆装。拆装内饰是一门技术活儿，需要专业人士来完成，内饰各种走线与部件亦是非常繁琐的！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-507dd0bd47f76b1a98a29b7e1b5f3e80_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-507dd0bd47f76b1a98a29b7e1b5f3e80_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-507dd0bd47f76b1a98a29b7e1b5f3e80_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-507dd0bd47f76b1a98a29b7e1b5f3e80_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第二步：内饰添加隔音棉和止震板。福特全顺的原车内饰隔音效果不佳，用作商务接待是不够上档次的，而为了减少震动产生的噪音，通常会在车壁或底盘处铺上止震板，以减少车壁的震动带来的噪音。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e2d72a31cb5c57c8c4293589f7b5a5bd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e2d72a31cb5c57c8c4293589f7b5a5bd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e2d72a31cb5c57c8c4293589f7b5a5bd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e2d72a31cb5c57c8c4293589f7b5a5bd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-222e3635dd59fb04987cbde43565a34d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-222e3635dd59fb04987cbde43565a34d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-222e3635dd59fb04987cbde43565a34d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-222e3635dd59fb04987cbde43565a34d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第三步：内饰装潢。汽车内饰装潢有时候和家装相差无几，但是更加了解福特全顺内饰线路走向和车体构架，才能改装出奢华而上档次还符合需求的内饰。</p><p>车主对于这样一辆福特全顺的改装要求就是上档次，商务接待不掉面子，撑得起大场面。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bc5101a1addc9aa791b3dab030be5be0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bc5101a1addc9aa791b3dab030be5be0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bc5101a1addc9aa791b3dab030be5be0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bc5101a1addc9aa791b3dab030be5be0_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>当然，从这样的需求来看，除去内饰基本的配置，还需要一些装饰性还实用的配置进行点缀。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c97c9f90c9f0ee1388d5baf855a57ed6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c97c9f90c9f0ee1388d5baf855a57ed6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c97c9f90c9f0ee1388d5baf855a57ed6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c97c9f90c9f0ee1388d5baf855a57ed6_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>首先，在福特全顺内饰中增加了隔断，在隔断处安装了升降显示屏，立体音响，还有多功能吧台设计，外加两个隐藏式多功能座椅。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0edc5c4b307b026ec84a03aa2ab959d3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0edc5c4b307b026ec84a03aa2ab959d3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;1333&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0edc5c4b307b026ec84a03aa2ab959d3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0edc5c4b307b026ec84a03aa2ab959d3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>值得一提的是，吧台的多功能储物柜内置吧台电子触控屏，调节隐藏座椅，内置冰箱，电视开关等。真正的奢华标致！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-84c94229e2b0ef43a789f3f8b8b5dce6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1000\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-84c94229e2b0ef43a789f3f8b8b5dce6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;1000&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1000\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-84c94229e2b0ef43a789f3f8b8b5dce6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-84c94229e2b0ef43a789f3f8b8b5dce6_b.jpg\"/></figure><p></p>",

            "title": "改个车：福特全顺内饰升级，改装前后“大变身”！5张实拍图着实惊艳！", 
            "content": "<p>福特全顺说起来也算是一款神车！广泛应用于商务接待、客运通勤、物流运输等多种范畴，可以满足多种差异行业多样化的需求，并具有强大的改装车定制属性，因此你见到的福特全顺常常会有多种面貌。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-592e1c70011363aa68d86159abc04144_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-592e1c70011363aa68d86159abc04144_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-592e1c70011363aa68d86159abc04144_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-592e1c70011363aa68d86159abc04144_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>本案中，带来的是西安车主改装一辆福特全顺做商务车接待之用的案例，经过了内饰拆卸，改装，定制之后，这辆福特全顺会经历怎样的“大变身”？一起来看一下吧！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-92a97d880391e242d9616b2742fce0d2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-92a97d880391e242d9616b2742fce0d2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-92a97d880391e242d9616b2742fce0d2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-92a97d880391e242d9616b2742fce0d2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>改装前：拆卸之后的福特全顺几乎只剩下车皮，车厢的空间如此之大，难怪会作为货车被利用起来，不过如此宽阔的内饰倒是留下了更多改装的空间！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6007b54edd0b98ccafba766cb8e6c607_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6007b54edd0b98ccafba766cb8e6c607_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6007b54edd0b98ccafba766cb8e6c607_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6007b54edd0b98ccafba766cb8e6c607_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>隔音棉添加</p><p>即便全顺的空间大，底盘性能好，用作拉货绰绰有余，但是用作商务接待之时，它首先要解决的问题是隔音和震动。</p><p>一般来说汽车上用来降噪的材料有两种，隔音棉与止震板！</p><p>第一步，拆卸之后，车顶，车壁，甚至是底盘，在全车覆盖性地铺上了一层隔音棉！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2c7d3b4188a92b49c7cab470c5b7fbd4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2c7d3b4188a92b49c7cab470c5b7fbd4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2c7d3b4188a92b49c7cab470c5b7fbd4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2c7d3b4188a92b49c7cab470c5b7fbd4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>车壁止震板添加</p><p>底盘止震板添加</p><p>第二步，在车壁和底盘位置加上了止震板。在外界有噪音源的情况下，福特全顺车壳很容易随着噪音源产生振动，形成非常严重的噪音污染，影响我们的驾驶体验，止震板的添加能够制止车身震动。</p><p>解决完上述问题，就到了最关键的一步——内饰装潢！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-acc6104eae5e294f755ff09721098491_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-acc6104eae5e294f755ff09721098491_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;667&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-acc6104eae5e294f755ff09721098491_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-acc6104eae5e294f755ff09721098491_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>1.吊柜安装，储物放置，展现多功能！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-11ba0bb83d900c85dfbb8feecf44d304_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-11ba0bb83d900c85dfbb8feecf44d304_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;667&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-11ba0bb83d900c85dfbb8feecf44d304_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-11ba0bb83d900c85dfbb8feecf44d304_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>2.隔断添加，使得内饰成为独立的空间，设计吧台，安装电视音响等设备，使得功能性与娱乐性兼具！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-56b8e5b435f93fd35d1b40f55cf1322d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-56b8e5b435f93fd35d1b40f55cf1322d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;667&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-56b8e5b435f93fd35d1b40f55cf1322d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-56b8e5b435f93fd35d1b40f55cf1322d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>3.车顶部造型灯设计安装，氛围灯与内饰照明灯兼具！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-04a8bc3558050af2420f13ce17e9b61b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-04a8bc3558050af2420f13ce17e9b61b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;667&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-04a8bc3558050af2420f13ce17e9b61b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-04a8bc3558050af2420f13ce17e9b61b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>4.后排座躺两用沙发床，舒适性极佳！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9f2c78057034099a1c55d7665878c351_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9f2c78057034099a1c55d7665878c351_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;667&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9f2c78057034099a1c55d7665878c351_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9f2c78057034099a1c55d7665878c351_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>5.360度可旋转航空座椅安装，可满足对坐式谈话场景！</p><p>这辆福特全顺的内饰改装前后变化着实惊艳，改完后整体设计风格高端奢华，焕发出引领潮流设计的动感魅力，符合商务车接待等多种大场面需求。</p>",

width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-55d288e6c4174c1d22fc9d326e4aa423_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-55d288e6c4174c1d22fc9d326e4aa423_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>4.内置九宫格顶灯</p><p>七彩变化的九宫格顶灯对于内饰的作用非常明显，效果相当不错！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c810c7e395fe848fdc7043c5f65b9e76_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c810c7e395fe848fdc7043c5f65b9e76_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e5029a0e2bb8560b54c97866e084b178_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e5029a0e2bb8560b54c97866e084b178_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0b8d42cf53a445f3ecce70d37798b216_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0b8d42cf53a445f3ecce70d37798b216_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "content": "<p>不同于大众系列方盒子一样毫无设计感的MPV车身，大众途昂这款SUV有着独特的魅力，整体显得非常威猛，不输给车体设计的是自身的内饰空间。<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8e273dad74153ae3fd7530b44b6f01ad_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8e273dad74153ae3fd7530b44b6f01ad_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8e273dad74153ae3fd7530b44b6f01ad_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8e273dad74153ae3fd7530b44b6f01ad_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>对于以下这款大众途昂改装内饰的奢华与功能性，得益于宽阔的空间才能施展！那么这样大众途昂都做了哪些项目上的变动呢？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-44ba70dd5abe6eb7022896c90e9bb41d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-44ba70dd5abe6eb7022896c90e9bb41d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-44ba70dd5abe6eb7022896c90e9bb41d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-44ba70dd5abe6eb7022896c90e9bb41d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>一，座位数量改变！</p><p>虽然大众途昂的内饰空间不小，可改造性很强，但SUV就是SUV，MPV商务车车尚且7座，像别克GL8这样的商务车，至多七座就已经很了不起了，所以大众途昂5到7座的设定，使得乘坐体验略显拥挤！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-08350918b880dea9e706c80d001d5d9a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-08350918b880dea9e706c80d001d5d9a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-08350918b880dea9e706c80d001d5d9a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-08350918b880dea9e706c80d001d5d9a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>西安一位车主在购得大众途昂之后，就将其进行了座位数量的改装，将6座改为了4座！值得一提的是，要改变座位数，需要在上牌之前，如果是上牌之后，改变座位数量就需要到车管所报备！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-87fbc83fb83c3328ace98ced132d7cb4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-87fbc83fb83c3328ace98ced132d7cb4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-87fbc83fb83c3328ace98ced132d7cb4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-87fbc83fb83c3328ace98ced132d7cb4_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c5cbb6af5b0ea0b4311eac8edc48febb_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c5cbb6af5b0ea0b4311eac8edc48febb_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c5cbb6af5b0ea0b4311eac8edc48febb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c5cbb6af5b0ea0b4311eac8edc48febb_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>二、内饰包覆</p><p>黑白配是永恒的经典，一个黑白相接的包覆，会让途昂的内饰提升不止一个档次。</p><p>从车门，车壁，仪表台，座椅等几乎进行了全车的覆盖性包覆！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-03108d1ce898a77cdae7b8319072c044_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-03108d1ce898a77cdae7b8319072c044_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-03108d1ce898a77cdae7b8319072c044_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-03108d1ce898a77cdae7b8319072c044_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>三、定制吧台</p><p>西安车主取消6座的主要原因之一，丢掉令人拥挤的两个座位，腾出更多的空间来，做了一个更具功能性的吧台。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-667a95046612777900d0a3932d21fce9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-667a95046612777900d0a3932d21fce9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-667a95046612777900d0a3932d21fce9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-667a95046612777900d0a3932d21fce9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>吧台为纯手工定制，菱形包覆工艺，让整个吧台在内饰改装中成为亮点！抽屉，暗格应有尽有，放置水壶，水杯等非常方便！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-064ccb0f16577e9936e038a9c6256a6f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-064ccb0f16577e9936e038a9c6256a6f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-064ccb0f16577e9936e038a9c6256a6f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-064ccb0f16577e9936e038a9c6256a6f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>四、木地板</p><p>木地板不只是中大型车辆的专属，大众途昂这样的内饰空间也是可以打造木地板，西安车主更是大胆地为自己的SUV做了成品木地板，妥妥地家用配置，舒适，温馨！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fad5a29dbf0a91acc53e886d08f5a9dc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fad5a29dbf0a91acc53e886d08f5a9dc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fad5a29dbf0a91acc53e886d08f5a9dc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fad5a29dbf0a91acc53e886d08f5a9dc_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>像大众途昂这样一辆SUV也可以同时拥有奢华质感和强大的功能性！</p>",

            "content": "<p>别克GL8的销量在商务车里面势不可挡，本期，小编又为大家带来了别克gl8内饰改装案例，改装项目比较多，基本涵盖全车内饰，改装后效果超乎想象，一起来看一下改装后效果图：</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bf5c5ef8dc1710055ceb372834e1b00f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bf5c5ef8dc1710055ceb372834e1b00f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c18b62c66067fab88af533ebfa19aedb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c18b62c66067fab88af533ebfa19aedb_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><ol><li>桃木装饰内饰件。</li></ol><p>这辆别克GL8为商务版28T，内饰要求高端，大气，上档次，设计师利用少面积桃木装饰来提升档次感，车门把守处，小内饰件，方向盘等部位加上了桃木件！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d4943e592613be9e3b90499d037ed7ba_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d4943e592613be9e3b90499d037ed7ba_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d4943e592613be9e3b90499d037ed7ba_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d4943e592613be9e3b90499d037ed7ba_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-16b037698752612ed0908018d1d07829_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-16b037698752612ed0908018d1d07829_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-16b037698752612ed0908018d1d07829_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-16b037698752612ed0908018d1d07829_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>2.考拉灰翻毛皮顶部包覆，带纹路！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a459301913cf0fa41019ef5496fc3482_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a459301913cf0fa41019ef5496fc3482_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a459301913cf0fa41019ef5496fc3482_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a459301913cf0fa41019ef5496fc3482_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>灰色的翻毛皮包覆绝对不掉价，触感柔软舒适，视觉上还带来暖洋洋的温馨质感，细看之下还带有纹路，档次感会因为这样的纹理而提升二倍效果！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2cd839d9251d486d014d6d7c1a033046_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2cd839d9251d486d014d6d7c1a033046_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2cd839d9251d486d014d6d7c1a033046_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2cd839d9251d486d014d6d7c1a033046_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>特别是在这种质感的翻毛皮顶棚包覆上还做了星空顶，多了一份躺在车里数星星的情趣！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7dff24bd16714a99337931e875d0c562_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7dff24bd16714a99337931e875d0c562_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7dff24bd16714a99337931e875d0c562_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7dff24bd16714a99337931e875d0c562_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>3.成品木地板改装。</p><p>这辆别克GL8的内饰改装选用了游艇木，色泽非常艳丽，成品木地板的好处在于舒适感和实用性。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f79caf04d02db772a6b978c74457fa05_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f79caf04d02db772a6b978c74457fa05_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f79caf04d02db772a6b978c74457fa05_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f79caf04d02db772a6b978c74457fa05_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>很多朋友在车里放置一次性木地板脚垫的理由是一样的——打理起来方便！但是改装木地板最起码是要玩三年以上的，做成品木地板似乎更加省时省力！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dbd6a124d61edc33a8b0a7f07e946988_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dbd6a124d61edc33a8b0a7f07e946988_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dbd6a124d61edc33a8b0a7f07e946988_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dbd6a124d61edc33a8b0a7f07e946988_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>4.白色牛奶丝窗帘。这种布料优点在于轻盈、柔软、手感滑爽、悬垂。遮光度好，常常被用在豪华车窗帘。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a180fb8c643d6ef3cb1293fe0d8821c6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a180fb8c643d6ef3cb1293fe0d8821c6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a180fb8c643d6ef3cb1293fe0d8821c6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-a180fb8c643d6ef3cb1293fe0d8821c6_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>5.电动中门，电动尾门。无论是用作家用，还是用作商务，为了安全和体面，像别克GL8这样有牌面的商务车，都需要一个不需要动手就能自行开关的电动门配置！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-11160b0b073f0b42c07d593fc036ec7e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-11160b0b073f0b42c07d593fc036ec7e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-11160b0b073f0b42c07d593fc036ec7e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-11160b0b073f0b42c07d593fc036ec7e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>6.吸顶电视。</p><p>必要的娱乐装置项目还是要做的，必须承认的是，即便这项实用率不高，像是摆设一样的配置，确是每辆商务车必不可少的配置！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-93648155d05fac0eef9c3038cdca4eed_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-93648155d05fac0eef9c3038cdca4eed_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-93648155d05fac0eef9c3038cdca4eed_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-93648155d05fac0eef9c3038cdca4eed_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>7.九宫格七彩变换灯！</p><p>九宫格的内饰灯造型并没有什么其他的特色，只有当变换灯开启的时候，七色光相互交换，太过于耀眼夺目，绝对是你没有见过的，最不一样的28T！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ea2a2b8bab1856ab7e42dfe9bf38f3f0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ea2a2b8bab1856ab7e42dfe9bf38f3f0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ea2a2b8bab1856ab7e42dfe9bf38f3f0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ea2a2b8bab1856ab7e42dfe9bf38f3f0_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0363cd40d9ea8473603a7101be606431_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0363cd40d9ea8473603a7101be606431_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0363cd40d9ea8473603a7101be606431_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0363cd40d9ea8473603a7101be606431_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>除此之外，还有自动折叠后视镜，全车隔音，专用背板桌，扶手冰箱等，简直是别克GL8内饰的一次“大变脸”！这样的改装，各位还喜欢吗</p>",
