            "upvote": 0, 
            "title": "改个车：特斯拉 model X内饰7座改6座，舒适满分！", 
            "content": "<p>许多人都会将特斯拉model X这款车型看作成普通的轿车，事实上，它是介于SUV和轿跑车之间的跨界车，是一款正真意义的SUV车型！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0aea8e3b12fdc5f536267d15be12b82f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0aea8e3b12fdc5f536267d15be12b82f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;506&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0aea8e3b12fdc5f536267d15be12b82f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-0aea8e3b12fdc5f536267d15be12b82f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-89289bead820f00a0591a63a43f8ca88_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"550\" data-rawheight=\"348\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"550\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-89289bead820f00a0591a63a43f8ca88_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;550&#39; height=&#39;348&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"550\" data-rawheight=\"348\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"550\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-89289bead820f00a0591a63a43f8ca88_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-89289bead820f00a0591a63a43f8ca88_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>特斯拉 model X最大的吸睛之处在于后部配备鹰翼门，可以向上折叠的方式打开，十分酷炫！当然，就是这一与众不同的设计，让这辆SUV价格斐然。</p><p>Model X采用的七座布局设计，是这辆SUV唯一不合理且勉强的地方，二三二的座椅布局即便是鹰翼门的设计也令人乘坐感不佳！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-701665caa386f01fa851f684494c54bc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-701665caa386f01fa851f684494c54bc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;506&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-701665caa386f01fa851f684494c54bc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-701665caa386f01fa851f684494c54bc_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>特斯拉 model X改装在原有的基础上将中排三座座椅拆除，让后换上舒适度更高的航空座椅，航空座椅的占用空间比原车座椅大出不少，所以中排座椅只有两个！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f376bc9f2d970e0033d180ee6da520bd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f376bc9f2d970e0033d180ee6da520bd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;506&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f376bc9f2d970e0033d180ee6da520bd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f376bc9f2d970e0033d180ee6da520bd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5ee17267a8a99022a6bc094f765e4b8b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5ee17267a8a99022a6bc094f765e4b8b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;506&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5ee17267a8a99022a6bc094f765e4b8b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5ee17267a8a99022a6bc094f765e4b8b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>之所以将中排改成航空座椅，而不顾及三排座椅空间的原因，就在于最后一排的两个座位可放下以拓展后备箱空间，所以利用率其实不高。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6d80208bcff059e9dd4743e7a7042d75_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6d80208bcff059e9dd4743e7a7042d75_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;506&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6d80208bcff059e9dd4743e7a7042d75_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6d80208bcff059e9dd4743e7a7042d75_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>上车之后将航空座椅往后调，拉出中排座椅和主副驾驶座之间的距离，舒适度满分！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7a05c616294e6f8310167befd182a0f2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7a05c616294e6f8310167befd182a0f2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;506&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7a05c616294e6f8310167befd182a0f2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7a05c616294e6f8310167befd182a0f2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6e8e9c3804121073880d6f20d9bb4ce8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6e8e9c3804121073880d6f20d9bb4ce8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;506&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6e8e9c3804121073880d6f20d9bb4ce8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6e8e9c3804121073880d6f20d9bb4ce8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>特斯拉 model X的车身重心比较低，其实这样的车型无论是乘坐体验，还是上车就座方便程度，安装航空座椅都是不二之选！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-de7c74277c6c9e66fade7a30ae813878_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-de7c74277c6c9e66fade7a30ae813878_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：依维柯房车改装内饰，网友：这才是真正在车上过日子的人", 
            "content": "<p>很多热衷房车生活的朋友都知道一款名叫“依维柯”的房车，其市场占有率极高，因此，在改装市场上的活跃度也比较高。</p><p>其中内饰改装比例占9成以上，由此表明，即便是以奢华舒适著称的依维柯房车也满足不了车友五花八门的出行需求！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-86d289d81326660e435926a43c224191_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-86d289d81326660e435926a43c224191_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-86d289d81326660e435926a43c224191_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-86d289d81326660e435926a43c224191_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>一位西安房车发烧友购得一辆依维柯C型房车之后，前前后后不同程度做过三次改装，其中一次大改还为房车内饰做了一个风格基调。正如网友所说：恐怕真的只有愿意在车上过日子的人，才有这样的魄力这么折腾自己的车子！</p><p>下面是西安车主实拍依维柯房车改装的内饰，一起来感受一下吧！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a2a996164ede3b696f987a4b03e073d8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a2a996164ede3b696f987a4b03e073d8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a2a996164ede3b696f987a4b03e073d8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a2a996164ede3b696f987a4b03e073d8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>整体的内饰改装偏中式！采用了大量的“红木”做改装材料，内饰随处可见的吊柜，冰箱，卫生间等配置均采用了红木。</p><p>红木的木质较重，给人感觉质量不错，材质硬，强度高，耐磨，耐久性好。最主要的是车主选择的木材颜色较深，多体现出古香古色的风格！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-418ed9c263013525b0908fcf1482fa8b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-418ed9c263013525b0908fcf1482fa8b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：别克GL8改装，模仿完“埃尔法”的脸，还敢挑战它的内饰？", 
            "content": "<p></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ba942e20929844729943fe16a902da8d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"518\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ba942e20929844729943fe16a902da8d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;518&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"518\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ba942e20929844729943fe16a902da8d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ba942e20929844729943fe16a902da8d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>近段时间，别克GL8改装雅典娜大包围火了！其外观酷似埃尔法蒙娜丽莎版，引得网友一直尖叫，乍一看以为是埃尔法呢。</p><p>大面积的进气格栅设计，威武霸气，侧裙装饰，立体感十足！后包围扰流板加上运动排气，视觉感冲击强！能“山寨”得如此不留痕迹，堪称改装史上里程碑之作了吧！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4a6a7047605cdc6daeecbf9baabd106b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"600\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4a6a7047605cdc6daeecbf9baabd106b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;600&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"600\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4a6a7047605cdc6daeecbf9baabd106b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4a6a7047605cdc6daeecbf9baabd106b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>不过依旧有网友调侃道：GL8永远都是GL8，乌鸡永远变不了凤凰！如此赤裸裸的蔑视，可不仅仅是对别克GL8外观的吐槽，要想拥有一辆“内外兼修”的豪华商务，除去大包围，内饰的乘坐体验一样不能缺失！<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a31ff57e80ac765757915efe96d3af84_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a31ff57e80ac765757915efe96d3af84_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;506&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a31ff57e80ac765757915efe96d3af84_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a31ff57e80ac765757915efe96d3af84_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>一起来看一下这辆别克GL8雅典娜款的内饰设计，是否可以和与豪华著称的埃尔法内饰一较高下！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a2ba7c068d93818ecb39a805e4c309ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"613\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a2ba7c068d93818ecb39a805e4c309ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;613&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"613\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a2ba7c068d93818ecb39a805e4c309ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a2ba7c068d93818ecb39a805e4c309ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-236f97560eb657e48b9eaae06a0c0235_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"521\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-236f97560eb657e48b9eaae06a0c0235_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;521&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"521\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-236f97560eb657e48b9eaae06a0c0235_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-236f97560eb657e48b9eaae06a0c0235_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>1.特制脚踏与门槛侧踏板！这样的脚踏与侧踏板没有特别花哨的个性化定制，简约而不简单的铆钉纹路定制是这辆别克GL8内饰中最为平凡而使用的设计！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b4c117f29ef52bd405a0977a07daf374_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"505\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b4c117f29ef52bd405a0977a07daf374_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;505&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"505\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b4c117f29ef52bd405a0977a07daf374_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b4c117f29ef52bd405a0977a07daf374_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>2.灰白绒翻毛皮加上九宫格定制，是车顶部改装效果最为明显的两项，灰白绒翻毛皮质感是整个内饰中最为上档次的设定，加上九宫格与氛围灯的烘托，怎一个浪漫了得！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e0c999863e17a1d9c7dad99785afb449_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"456\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e0c999863e17a1d9c7dad99785afb449_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;600&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"600\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-09f597dcab0d61cb16a2b3393d04dfbb_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-09f597dcab0d61cb16a2b3393d04dfbb_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>4.正副驾驶后背加桌板！放置水杯零食都是小儿科，最重要的是，自带手机无线充电功能，就算远行途中手机忘记带充电线，也能令手机充饱电！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb59784289f0dd9b79120ccc8111606d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"506\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb59784289f0dd9b79120ccc8111606d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：别克GL8改装，25S内饰不上档次咋整？西安车主的经验之谈", 
            "content": "<p>别克GL8的25S在商务车市场上面国民度真的高 ，虽然同是商务车，25S却偏家用多一点儿，内饰空间不够是其一，其二就在于25S的车型设计在细节方面和同款28T多少有些差距。</p><p>25S的指导价格不贵，性价比是其销量极高的一个主要原因！当然也有不少消费者吐槽别克GL8的内饰不上档次。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7efcf4069b3ceff02a2cca557ecf0206_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7efcf4069b3ceff02a2cca557ecf0206_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7efcf4069b3ceff02a2cca557ecf0206_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7efcf4069b3ceff02a2cca557ecf0206_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>那么对于别克GL8中25S的内饰改装案例，有哪些令人比较满意的呢？西安一位别克GL8的车主将自己的25S前后做过好几次的改装，在这分面超有话语权。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-463c22631f52b2194838ee6ee28e5a94_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-463c22631f52b2194838ee6ee28e5a94_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-463c22631f52b2194838ee6ee28e5a94_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-463c22631f52b2194838ee6ee28e5a94_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>问：这辆25S前后改过哪些配置？</p><p>答：电动中门，木地板，吸顶电视，中央扶手，迎宾脚踏，轨道亮条太多了！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6eef566d0679811349592d9dc57bc63c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6eef566d0679811349592d9dc57bc63c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6eef566d0679811349592d9dc57bc63c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6eef566d0679811349592d9dc57bc63c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2fa408684eafb7d2dbff191c22fb5436_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2fa408684eafb7d2dbff191c22fb5436_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2fa408684eafb7d2dbff191c22fb5436_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2fa408684eafb7d2dbff191c22fb5436_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>问：有哪些东西觉得不太有必要吗？</p><p>答：都还行，主要看喜不喜欢，我个人就喜欢给自己的车做一些别人的车子里面没有的东西，喜欢鼓捣这些。要非说一个没必要的话，就是使用次数没有那么多的吸顶电视了，但是你说不经常用吧，少了这东西自己也觉得不行，放着不看比没有看着要好！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3465058af88b410d3e73fd50452d28ab_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3465058af88b410d3e73fd50452d28ab_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3465058af88b410d3e73fd50452d28ab_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3465058af88b410d3e73fd50452d28ab_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-694e8cd5f3e198a74ef80a7cceff38e0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-694e8cd5f3e198a74ef80a7cceff38e0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-694e8cd5f3e198a74ef80a7cceff38e0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-694e8cd5f3e198a74ef80a7cceff38e0_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>问：很多人觉得木地板的改装没有必要，甚至在发生车祸的时候，有可能会造成二次伤害，您觉得呢？</p><p>答：确实是谁用谁知道，一开始改木地板也是觉得大家都改，自己也改来看看，说白了从众嘛，现在看来可改可不改，。</p><p>但是家用的话，回去清理起来确实比较方便，小孩有时候在车上不爱穿鞋子，木地板的用处这时候才知道。至于二次伤害，问题不大，就算重大车祸，你试试这木地板能起来么，车壳子变形，我这地板都未必能翘起来，车祸不是你想得那样！折不了。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1dba248e7303486c95aec81021d4c888_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1dba248e7303486c95aec81021d4c888_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1dba248e7303486c95aec81021d4c888_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1dba248e7303486c95aec81021d4c888_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>问：改了这么多项目，利用率最高的是哪个？</p><p>答：车子的内饰改装和家装可不一样，你改了就能用到，哪有利用率高不高这一说呀，那你非要问的话，肯定是电中门么，哪次上下车不都要用一次的。</p>",

            "upvote": 0, 
            "title": "改个车：别克GL8改装，28T的内饰不好看？试着改改这几处！", 
            "content": "<p>别克GL8目前销售的两款商务车里面，28T的内饰配置总的来说要优于25S，但是内饰空间和整体的档次感还是比不得奔驰商务，虽然有着“陆上公务舱”之称，别克GL8的内饰与名头还是名不副实！</p><p>如果你买别克GL8是用于商务，大多数车主选择28T才能满足其高端场面！至于那些令人吐槽的内饰，如果不满意，试着改改这几处！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-43c6e13ea1e394654566c10ac2b58118_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"1200\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-43c6e13ea1e394654566c10ac2b58118_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;1200&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"1200\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-43c6e13ea1e394654566c10ac2b58118_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-43c6e13ea1e394654566c10ac2b58118_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f853d6aa0f3f11e796d2a77e59265066_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f853d6aa0f3f11e796d2a77e59265066_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f853d6aa0f3f11e796d2a77e59265066_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f853d6aa0f3f11e796d2a77e59265066_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第一：二排航空座椅两只。说实话，别克GL8的内饰原装座椅用作商务是不够档次的，不放置两把舒适性，功能性极强的航空座椅还真的不行呢。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bf85a2a336a5939ec74cb51f31f539e4_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bf85a2a336a5939ec74cb51f31f539e4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-32084cee290c0c06fc3e599f148c6ff1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-32084cee290c0c06fc3e599f148c6ff1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第二：座椅包覆。为了内饰座椅配色的统一，正副驾驶座和第三排座椅做了包覆，与航空座椅同等面料，同等工艺的包覆手法，同时，为了让内饰空间在视觉和使用上面能够得到扩展延申，将第三排的座椅后移，保证了中间位置的宽敞！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-403c3ba740afc764c8a78a108c2fa7c3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-403c3ba740afc764c8a78a108c2fa7c3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-403c3ba740afc764c8a78a108c2fa7c3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-403c3ba740afc764c8a78a108c2fa7c3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第三：新款脚踏。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a82e5354bfda90cd1f835fabb6d54249_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a82e5354bfda90cd1f835fabb6d54249_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a82e5354bfda90cd1f835fabb6d54249_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a82e5354bfda90cd1f835fabb6d54249_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c92c439ce482b1b39449b38c57f2b863_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c92c439ce482b1b39449b38c57f2b863_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c92c439ce482b1b39449b38c57f2b863_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c92c439ce482b1b39449b38c57f2b863_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第四：南美柚木——原木色一号木地板。木中之王南美柚木的性能之高，在别克GL8内饰中起到的作用溢于言表，虽然不少车主改装完木地板之后，对这项改装褒贬不一，但是告诉我们，改装一个地板，对于商用别克GL8的诱惑还是不小的！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3465058af88b410d3e73fd50452d28ab_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3465058af88b410d3e73fd50452d28ab_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "upvote": 0, 
            "title": "改个车：丰田塞纳改装，如何实现内饰美观统一？这项配置火了！", 
            "content": "<p>丰田塞纳的公路驾驶性和安全性在商务车中是值得称道的，也因此受到了国内广大消费者的青睐，这样一辆很有市场的车型，也被越来越多的人要求内饰的档次感，但是在大多数的出厂商务车中，内饰设计无法满足形形色色的商务人士。</p><p>于是我们在改装市场上就经常会看到丰田塞纳的身影，那么丰田塞纳内饰改装，要如何才能实现所谓的档次感？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-21328391c48fbc1d998b47b350c76901_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-21328391c48fbc1d998b47b350c76901_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1333&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-21328391c48fbc1d998b47b350c76901_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-21328391c48fbc1d998b47b350c76901_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>其实内饰的美观统一，在视觉上就能实现一定程度的档次感！丰田塞纳的内饰大体分为两款，第一款：灰白！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5b907e61194e53737e7b4ac57a86ad55_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"600\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5b907e61194e53737e7b4ac57a86ad55_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;600&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"600\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5b907e61194e53737e7b4ac57a86ad55_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5b907e61194e53737e7b4ac57a86ad55_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第二款：棕红！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-38a585557ca039e96e49aae6838648f1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-38a585557ca039e96e49aae6838648f1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1333&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-38a585557ca039e96e49aae6838648f1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-38a585557ca039e96e49aae6838648f1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>丰田塞纳的座椅，其舒适度在商务车中是数一数二的，不敢说奢华上档次，最起码不丢商务人士的面子！所以你会发现内饰改装丰田塞纳座椅的消费者还是挺少的！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6516325d857d14f1e433fdf76ec7eeb8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6516325d857d14f1e433fdf76ec7eeb8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1333&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6516325d857d14f1e433fdf76ec7eeb8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6516325d857d14f1e433fdf76ec7eeb8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>那么丰田塞纳改装内饰项目中有最常改的地方在哪里呢？没错，就是木地板没跑了，不少网友对于木地板改装还是颇有微词，之所以这么多人乐此不疲地为商务车改装木地板，致使这项改装配置成为流行，就在于木地板的舒适和宾至如归的质感。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-260371f7ab612360bb49fe0265621ed7_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-260371f7ab612360bb49fe0265621ed7_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1333&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-260371f7ab612360bb49fe0265621ed7_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-260371f7ab612360bb49fe0265621ed7_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>针对两款不同内饰，如何将大众钟爱的木地板进行添加，从而实现内饰美观统一呢？</p><p>一、棕红内饰配置色泽度饱和的棕红色游艇木，防腐，防霉，不易变形！内饰配色热情奔放，具有</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-627f1d92a780e1bf35765894797f35cc_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-627f1d92a780e1bf35765894797f35cc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1333&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-627f1d92a780e1bf35765894797f35cc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-627f1d92a780e1bf35765894797f35cc_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>二、灰白色内饰配置浅黄色南美柚木地板，这款丰田塞纳配置高于棕红色内饰塞纳，所以车主愿意花费更多的预算去选择改装质量更好的南美柚木，而浅黄色木地板与灰白色内饰的色彩搭配打造出高端静谧的简约风格！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9f281d231f3dad4a5e5711c97e6302ac_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"600\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9f281d231f3dad4a5e5711c97e6302ac_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;600&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"600\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9f281d231f3dad4a5e5711c97e6302ac_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9f281d231f3dad4a5e5711c97e6302ac_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0735f040390a0f163428b2dff9bbc1f1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"600\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0735f040390a0f163428b2dff9bbc1f1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;600&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"600\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0735f040390a0f163428b2dff9bbc1f1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0735f040390a0f163428b2dff9bbc1f1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p></p>",

            "url": "https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/76377112", 
            "userName": "改个车", 
            "userLink": "https://www.zhihu.com/people/1576ccbf9fd3b4e526179a77a60a477e", 
            "upvote": 0, 
            "title": "改个车：福特全顺改装家用内饰，客厅装在车上，还能晒衣服！堪比房车", 
            "content": "<p>福特全顺中顶是商务车中的常改车型，说起这辆车，其用途也是五花八门，直到现在都有人问，“福特全顺是货车吗？”可以是，也可以不是！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2af95f4bfa08d43701985ae5b268a32e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2af95f4bfa08d43701985ae5b268a32e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2af95f4bfa08d43701985ae5b268a32e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2af95f4bfa08d43701985ae5b268a32e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>福特全顺的用途有时候其实是根据内饰改装来决定的，有改装豪华用作商务车的，也有改装较多座椅用作客车的，甚至它宽大的内饰使得不少小康家庭觉得它作为家用来说，其实也可以是一辆房车！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-73e8c7c1afb1f0971db4c355e215a880_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-73e8c7c1afb1f0971db4c355e215a880_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-73e8c7c1afb1f0971db4c355e215a880_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-73e8c7c1afb1f0971db4c355e215a880_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>一位西安车主，将自己的一辆福特全顺做了内饰改装，其目的就是为了家用。车主喜欢自驾游，特别喜欢中长途的自驾游，有时候结伴两三个好友车门，就缺一辆房车，但是买房车的花费却令其觉得不值得，尤其是房车的许多功能其实在旅行途中用不上！</p><p>于是将自己的福特全顺做了改装，有个睡觉的地方，就达到了自己的改装目的！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-522334ea9367594e54b5761c883efd14_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-522334ea9367594e54b5761c883efd14_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-522334ea9367594e54b5761c883efd14_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-522334ea9367594e54b5761c883efd14_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>整个福特全顺内饰改装最大的亮点有5处：</p><p>1.联排对卡座，联排对卡座是整个内饰改装案例中最有特色的。底部安装了四条奔驰滑轨，也就是说，对卡座可以移动，中间放置可升降桌，活脱脱一个“客厅”就出现在了车里！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f9a7474f6e500341344700a7c501c62f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f9a7474f6e500341344700a7c501c62f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f9a7474f6e500341344700a7c501c62f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f9a7474f6e500341344700a7c501c62f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>一个联排座椅就可坐三人，所以乘客量是完全没有问题的，最值得一提的是，需要过夜的长途旅行中，这样的沙发式座椅靠背可以放平，并将两个座椅拼接一个可以容纳三个成人的床位就可以出来了！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7eaf79eb0071d8279fca9384814915b5_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7eaf79eb0071d8279fca9384814915b5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7eaf79eb0071d8279fca9384814915b5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7eaf79eb0071d8279fca9384814915b5_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>2.主副驾驶座的包覆，由于沙发式座椅是后来车主自选安装的，为了让内饰看起来整体，车主要求将主副驾驶座做一个包覆，用料和皮质力求与后排沙发座椅统一！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-40051857e1526b7969a391e88d6cfd70_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-40051857e1526b7969a391e88d6cfd70_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-40051857e1526b7969a391e88d6cfd70_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-40051857e1526b7969a391e88d6cfd70_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5a48ec9dbf94c898ac02c4bc81540a3d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5a48ec9dbf94c898ac02c4bc81540a3d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5a48ec9dbf94c898ac02c4bc81540a3d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5a48ec9dbf94c898ac02c4bc81540a3d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>3.木地板的改装，将车子当家的车主，大多会在车里做一个木地板的改装，舒适是其次，主要还是需要一个居家的气氛！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b6965f63b3f79c90fd38270195435402_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b6965f63b3f79c90fd38270195435402_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b6965f63b3f79c90fd38270195435402_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b6965f63b3f79c90fd38270195435402_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>出去木地板改装为全顺内饰带来居家气氛之外，车主在后舱做了一个衣物晾晒的横杆，有时候出去方便洗漱，挂个湿毛巾，或者晾晒衣物，可谓居家典型改装了！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8f6a0e684eedc4da3a7c86c650c6cf0f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8f6a0e684eedc4da3a7c86c650c6cf0f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8f6a0e684eedc4da3a7c86c650c6cf0f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8f6a0e684eedc4da3a7c86c650c6cf0f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>4.空调，能将小超人空调安装到内饰的，对于车内饰的依赖程度是不低的，根据需求，可以取舍！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9bfe1440b37f06195ab1eed0eccd2211_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9bfe1440b37f06195ab1eed0eccd2211_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9bfe1440b37f06195ab1eed0eccd2211_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9bfe1440b37f06195ab1eed0eccd2211_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>5.逆变器1500W，后箱预留开关，出门在外对于电的需求量是极大的，手机充电，空调运转供电，所以需要长旅的朋友们逆变器的改装是非常有必要的。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-574ee20b316828281daba08333e86810_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-574ee20b316828281daba08333e86810_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-574ee20b316828281daba08333e86810_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-574ee20b316828281daba08333e86810_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>车主对于这样简化版的改装还是比较满意的，虽然没有奢华的内饰，但是毕竟实用，有了它，远行旅途不比房车差</p>",

            "title": "别克GL8改装五大项目，有了这个装置，没带充电线，手机也能充饱", 
            "content": "<p>其实作为一款商务车来说，别克GL8确实有负于自己的定位，大多数人对别克GL8的要求不是商务，而是家用，原因之一就在于，作为商务车来说，别克GL8的内饰空间与同级别商务车比起来还是有些差距的！但是用作家用来讲，别克GL8无论是28T，还是25S都是非常划算的！<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-537d08bbcc1711094e29aa88ee3a0c21_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-537d08bbcc1711094e29aa88ee3a0c21_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;667&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c388c326e1724611cc5fbc242e32acd1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c388c326e1724611cc5fbc242e32acd1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>1、Avenir中网，别克车的车头车尾部大都千篇一律，Avenir中网的出现受到一致好评，逐渐成为别克车改装中网的一个流行趋势，总之一句话，改装效果不赖！<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-247efd4017b7868bd22437f32b4d1f97_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-247efd4017b7868bd22437f32b4d1f97_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "content": "<p>号称“完美MPV”的别克GL8，在内饰上一直受到吐槽，别克商务在内饰方面确实没办法和奔驰商务相比较，但是受众却特别广，正因如此，别克GL8成为了改装市场的常客，内饰案例也数不胜数。今天，我们就一起来一辆内饰17项改装项目的别克GL8。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc08266d1348fa8bc8d7ea6e5f066f46_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc08266d1348fa8bc8d7ea6e5f066f46_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ae6fe37a25d67d085fbae826ea084992_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ae6fe37a25d67d085fbae826ea084992_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>2.主驾驶六项电动，副驾驶4项电动调节座椅，提高乘车舒适度！<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-417b3fb7476c9f2f0a0c514b6dd14b7e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-417b3fb7476c9f2f0a0c514b6dd14b7e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：汽车改装大包围需要办理些什么手续才能合法上路？", 
            "content": "<p>很多车主都有改装车的需求，但是对于改装方面的知识却非常欠缺，一不小心就会违反交通法律法规，根据网友的问题集合，小编针对“汽车改装大包围”的问题做了一个集合！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb9531ced207c5627ccea6c1a9b750e9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb9531ced207c5627ccea6c1a9b750e9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb9531ced207c5627ccea6c1a9b750e9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb9531ced207c5627ccea6c1a9b750e9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>所谓汽车改装大包围是指，汽车外形上的前包围，侧包围，后包围，前后保险杠加两侧的侧裙，尾翼等！</p><p>那么汽车改装大包围需要办理些什么手续才能合法上路呢？汽车改装大包围办理手续程序：</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-31c020ee081787da729b3fa89a0cd9c8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-31c020ee081787da729b3fa89a0cd9c8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-31c020ee081787da729b3fa89a0cd9c8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-31c020ee081787da729b3fa89a0cd9c8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>1、要先去车管所办理变更登记，自受理之日起，一个工作日内会给出准予或者不予变更的决定。</p><p>2、如果车管所同意改装大包围，就可以去改装。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8801d34e5dcb876dfe7970212445631_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8801d34e5dcb876dfe7970212445631_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2000&#39; height=&#39;1500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2000\" data-rawheight=\"1500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8801d34e5dcb876dfe7970212445631_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8801d34e5dcb876dfe7970212445631_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>3、完成改装后，车主还需要再到办理变更登记的地点提交机动车所有人的身份证明原件和复印件、机动车登记证书、机动车行驶证、《机动车变更登记申请表》。</p><p>4、将《机动车登记表(副表)》车辆照片一张送交所辖区交警支(大)队车管部门。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1003cf120a18af54979c8724a57464a6_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1003cf120a18af54979c8724a57464a6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "content": "<p>英国豪华轿车、跑车和SUV品牌的捷豹，作为皇家用车，一度在中国市场上面叱诧风云，然而，即便出身高贵如捷豹，也并非没有短板，近几年在国内的销量并不高！虽然外观辨识度极高，内饰纯手工，时间长了也会产生视觉疲劳。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d5c21d1364f81614a5206fda5e0abf9f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"498\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d5c21d1364f81614a5206fda5e0abf9f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;598&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef4bf80e7212e6ea8fe4e7b855961bad_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef4bf80e7212e6ea8fe4e7b855961bad_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>驾驶室：轿车内饰空间不大，所以做到节俭美观，不繁琐是不容易的。</p><p>亮点一：座椅拼接包覆。整个内饰以黄色纳帕皮和深咖色纳帕皮做拼接。在座椅包覆上面起到了非常好的点缀作用，整体效果怎一个“赞”字了得！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-84216f359708476456f35caafcebdf65_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-84216f359708476456f35caafcebdf65_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;598&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-84216f359708476456f35caafcebdf65_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-84216f359708476456f35caafcebdf65_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d683a81bd1794590c6578a63a5ab0625_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d683a81bd1794590c6578a63a5ab0625_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;598&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d683a81bd1794590c6578a63a5ab0625_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d683a81bd1794590c6578a63a5ab0625_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>亮点二：豹纹桃木装饰，在中控台，方向盘，门板，甚至是仪表盘处，安装上了豹纹桃木件儿做装饰，增加手感，减少内饰的磨损，最主要的是上点档次。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f72f9111b0342a9e0bf1ea682c6b3737_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f72f9111b0342a9e0bf1ea682c6b3737_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;598&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f72f9111b0342a9e0bf1ea682c6b3737_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f72f9111b0342a9e0bf1ea682c6b3737_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-61fab3a1849dc7d2cb73f04461b3dbff_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-61fab3a1849dc7d2cb73f04461b3dbff_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;598&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-61fab3a1849dc7d2cb73f04461b3dbff_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-61fab3a1849dc7d2cb73f04461b3dbff_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>就连仪表台上方也做了个性化的包覆，菱形缝制工艺，让捷豹的仪表台高端尽显！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-66c38d5826d5c44ced7e219145bfc417_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"674\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-66c38d5826d5c44ced7e219145bfc417_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;674&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"674\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-66c38d5826d5c44ced7e219145bfc417_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-66c38d5826d5c44ced7e219145bfc417_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>亮点三：座椅个性化点缀，座椅靠枕处打印了豹头标识，霸气又有格调，当然，整个后排座椅处也是一大亮点，隐藏式扶手，让连排座椅在四人乘坐的情况下，将后方座椅分割成两个独立座椅，也可三人乘坐！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-124cc128f019831008b0a696080c0a74_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"598\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-124cc128f019831008b0a696080c0a74_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "改个车：想给车子换个颜色行不行？改装车是非法的吗？", 
            "content": "<p>首先改装车分为多种，内饰，外观，性能，给车子换颜色属于外观改装。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-22101f4376e843af90c9598d7154b939_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-22101f4376e843af90c9598d7154b939_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-22101f4376e843af90c9598d7154b939_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-22101f4376e843af90c9598d7154b939_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>外观改装不是不允许，但是改之后一定是需要到车管所登记的，忘记备案，或者不备案的改装，自然是非法，所以想给车子换个颜色，完全没有问题，只是变更过程有些麻烦。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4256e47f5233f6836b6f8245acf52c66_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"600\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4256e47f5233f6836b6f8245acf52c66_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;600&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"600\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4256e47f5233f6836b6f8245acf52c66_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4256e47f5233f6836b6f8245acf52c66_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>而且，车身改色最好不要超过三种颜色，同时，工程专用黄，消防专用红，救护车，警车，行政专用色尽量避开。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-96c4415069975edce3eeb8925da7eb8b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"600\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-96c4415069975edce3eeb8925da7eb8b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;600&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"600\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-96c4415069975edce3eeb8925da7eb8b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-96c4415069975edce3eeb8925da7eb8b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>其二，改装车之性能改装，最好不要，特别是发动机，会影响到安全问题，当然属于不合法的，不仅会对自身造成影响，而且严重会影响道路安全，对自己对他人造成安全隐患的改装，是不可以的！<br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-13c69fef46726d29bd7b49c80ffa0d95_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-13c69fef46726d29bd7b49c80ffa0d95_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-13c69fef46726d29bd7b49c80ffa0d95_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-13c69fef46726d29bd7b49c80ffa0d95_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>其三，内饰改装，像家装一样，汽车改装也分为硬装和软装，内饰改装可以理解为软装，是为了提高乘坐舒适度，美观度。</p><p>一般上进行内饰改装不改变其座位数，即车总质量不能变，所以内饰改装一般上是没有问题的，当然从2008年至今，半数的车主买来车之后都做过不同程度的改装，其中多数在内饰改装上下功夫。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ed42c3ff1b49c8b9a021f4830d62de38_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ed42c3ff1b49c8b9a021f4830d62de38_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ed42c3ff1b49c8b9a021f4830d62de38_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ed42c3ff1b49c8b9a021f4830d62de38_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>所以改装车非法吗？要分情况”改装车“这个词但现在听起来还是非常刺耳，且带有偏见的，其实改装也是有细分领域的，不能一竿子抡死一船。</p>",

            "title": "房车里的这些电器配置你还在用吗？省省了！费钱不说，还用不到！", 
            "content": "<p>房车这种领域，虽然偏小众，在国内发展的时间也不长，但是有些东西，其实已经随着科技的发展被迫淘汰了，尤其是电器类的产品，有些设置已经在房车中显得无足轻重。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d857f7b1c778ce641c577e4b4d528864_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d857f7b1c778ce641c577e4b4d528864_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d857f7b1c778ce641c577e4b4d528864_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d857f7b1c778ce641c577e4b4d528864_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>所以买房车的朋友们，还在按照老一套标准化的配置要求自己的房车吗？不！特别是在房车改装成为热门的当下，有些刚买新车还没有来得及带它出过远门的朋友们，千万不要再照葫芦画瓢地为自己的房车做电器配置了，你要知道，除去油费意外，开房车的花销中还有水电的供给问题。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94a0777f316efdb457f54a02fdaab3a3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94a0777f316efdb457f54a02fdaab3a3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94a0777f316efdb457f54a02fdaab3a3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94a0777f316efdb457f54a02fdaab3a3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>用水就不用小编多说了，不该省的是一滴水都省不下来，那么房车配置中那些耗电的电器设备，又该如何取舍呢？</p><p><b>1，电视机</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e0023f34afeac7ee58891c5ee514f3ae_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e0023f34afeac7ee58891c5ee514f3ae_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;666&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"666\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e0023f34afeac7ee58891c5ee514f3ae_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-e0023f34afeac7ee58891c5ee514f3ae_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>不管是哪种型号的房车，好像无一例外的都有电视机这个配置，但是各位房车车友们，你们扪心自问，电视机在你们的出行途中，利用率到底高不高！大部分的车友给出的答案是，其实没有看过几次！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8041f1f1a3a668808f1753f423101754_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8041f1f1a3a668808f1753f423101754_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;1333&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"1333\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8041f1f1a3a668808f1753f423101754_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8041f1f1a3a668808f1753f423101754_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>移动网路数据普及，自己手机，电脑上面包月的流量估计都用不完，娱乐这件事情，其实大多不考电视机了，而且电视机最大的一个安全隐患就是，大多数在房车内添加电视设备的，安装方式都是伸缩可旋转的，加固老化之后，笨重的电视机就会出现安全隐患，这可不是闹着玩儿的！</p><p><b>2，橱柜电磁炉</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b3c788c3547c8a0176acc7c146a6e077_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b3c788c3547c8a0176acc7c146a6e077_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b3c788c3547c8a0176acc7c146a6e077_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b3c788c3547c8a0176acc7c146a6e077_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>说实话，房车里面装电磁炉，如果是在冬天也许还能少个水，但是别指望它能煮什么饭，一般家用电磁炉五分钟的事儿，到房车橱柜电磁炉可能就需要双倍的时间，而且夏天房车里面不开空调都呆不住，更何况是在房车里面做饭。</p><p>完全可以带一个移动电磁炉储存起来，不用的时候收着，用了再拿出来，不要觉得麻烦，安装橱柜电磁炉才是麻烦！</p><p><b>3，大型洗衣机</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-17894707892ff5540053fe7646fe51f2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-17894707892ff5540053fe7646fe51f2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;900&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"900\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"900\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-17894707892ff5540053fe7646fe51f2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-17894707892ff5540053fe7646fe51f2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>不开玩笑，这绝对是最不可取的电器设备，大部分的人开房车出门超不过两个月，除非你就住在车里！</p><p>优点：洗衣服方便，大件儿可能也刚刚够用（前提是你水箱里的水足够），缺点：占地方，而且利用率几乎为零。首先你的水泵不足，其次，开房车除去旅行，你不会真在房车里面过日子，大多数人，会为了水的充足，选择下车并手洗，或者存着，回家洗！</p><p><b>4，220V电冰箱</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8e0ca34b4a17e166586de88205454b1e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8e0ca34b4a17e166586de88205454b1e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8e0ca34b4a17e166586de88205454b1e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8e0ca34b4a17e166586de88205454b1e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>逆变器要开，就意味着要费电，而且你不会二十四小开着逆变器的，虽然用不了多少电，但是基本上也是摆设，但是说实话，这种电器设备，小编不是劝各位不要装，毕竟冰箱在房车里面的利用率还是挺高的，但是房车专用冰箱似乎才是首选吧！</p><p>各位玩儿房车的车友们，你们房车中还有哪些不合理配置值得吐槽呢</p>",

width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;750&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-52bb09d8f004db0dc8fc860e2b2c3b87_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-52bb09d8f004db0dc8fc860e2b2c3b87_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>首先，别克GL8最常被车主改的部位就是座椅。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bdc88f3dfbf8d00cf52df222dbb5530d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"750\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bdc88f3dfbf8d00cf52df222dbb5530d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;
